ẏe chāriṅkara bhārā yahuṁ na sahilā mahī
deba bhaṇḍāra māna āṇile sabunti jūra kari | 5 |
yama debatā rahi na pārilā sañjibanī pure | 6 |
īśvara indra kobera bahuta yuddha kale
ẏe chāri bhāinta sāṁgrāme debe hāri paḷāile | 7 |
yāa bābu āmbha āsya gheni brata bhāigoṭi | 11 |
bhāta piṭhā māgilā beni śagaḍa tāhāra pitā mātāṅku | 16 |
bhala bhala loke sañchi thaānti sabongkāḷe
dui śagaḍa pūroi dui haḷa yoḍi āṇai begi begi | 18 |
kehi na jāṇu ẏethuṁ hoiyibā bāhāra | 20 |
ẏehāra parā putra goṭiki go paṭhiāa kāhiṁki | 22 |
ẏe yogāḍa leuṭi āsibā prāẏeka maṇu
yebaṇa jaṇe yāi go poḍābaḷi ehā ki na jāṇu | 23 |
śate candra jiṇi ẏehāra badana goṭi
ki ẏe citrasena naḷakubera kāmadeba heṭi | 24 |
ki abā ẏehākai na pārilu poṣi
akāraṇe bināśa na kara āmbhaṅku diasi | 25 |
kointāẏe boile muṁ rahiḷi ẏehāra purī
pāpa puṇye rahili muṁ ẏehāra ghara adheka ābori | 26 |
mohora karme se yebe hoilā ẏemanta
dharma ki gacchai ye hoile nisata | 27 |
tetiśa baraṣa beni māsa koḍiẏe ye dine
pāḷi paḍai go baka rākṣasa bhojane | 28 |
sabonge tohora ye ẏetheṁ rahilā tini māsa
tu kemante narabaḷi go debuṭi rākṣasa | 29 |
kointāẏe boile mote na bola go ẏehā
āpaṇe yāhā kari karma boli tāhā | 30 |
putra nohai ki tora śatr̥ mahātmāṇī | 31 |
paṇḍita jane bolanti bābu ẏe mahata
par adukheṇa kātara ẏe para dukheṇa hita | 32 |
baḷada haḷe poḍhua haḷe oḍāiṇa nelā
snāhāna kari āsi rodara taḷaku ohlāilā | 35 |
ḍāhāṇa kareṇa bhāta bāma kare piṭhā
bāma kare piṭhā goṭāẏe goṭāẏe garbhaku kṣepai | 37 |
pabanahuṁ bega kari se karai bhojana | 38 |
rākṣasa bijekalā kare śūḷa duigāṭi gheni | 39 |
bhojana karante diśilā rahura teja prāẏe | 40 |
uttiṣṭha kipāiṁ karu re muṇohi mohora | 41 |
brikodara bacana na śuṇai bhmañjibāra rase | 42 |
ḍāka yahuṁ na śuṇilā pabana tanaẏe
daitara garjante kampilā ye sapata brahmāṇḍa
bhmañjai bhīmasena beni kare bistāriṇa tuṇḍa | 44 |
na śuṇai māruti badhīra mata jāṇi | 45 |
kopeṇa beni śūḷa ye bulāi asura
tahiṁ na mānilā se māruti paracaṇḍā | 47 |
bhīmasena upare rurddva bāhu kari kachādi | 48 |

div.note: yahuṁṇa beḷa ye hoi pahara tini
beḷa uchura gheni kopabhara huai asura

lg.l: tāhā na mānilā bhīma bhmañji bāra rase | 50 |
bhmañjaṇa śarīra yahuṁ hoilā tāra tuṣṭa
bāmakare darāṇḍi dhailā datyara beni bhmaja
sañchaẏe moḍhā tu re aṭu duṣṭa ye danuja | 52 |
agyāna pāmara re gyāna tora nāhiṁ
bhmañjibāra beḷe śatr̥ku māri ta na yogāi | 53 |
jāṇili ẏe moḍhā ta mo tahuṁ baḷilā | 54 |
dānaba boilā tu re kāhiṁra brāhmaṇa
mohora muṇohi uttiṣṭa kalu keuṁṇa kāraṇa | 55 |
bhīmasena boilā ābara jībana tora kāhiṁ
sumara iṣṭa debatā re maribu āja tuhi | 56 |
hātha chaḍa brāhmaṇa ho asureśvara boli | 57 |
ḍāhāṇa kare māruti māilā bajra muthe | 58 |
bhīmasenara bajra mutha paḍilā asurara muṇḍe
bhīmaku peli dilā se paḍilā mahīthaḷī | 60 |
prathama yuddhe hārai se pabanara sute | 61 |
tu ye muṇohi mohora kalusi re naṣṭa
bikoti māṁsa tohora re bhakṣibi pāpiṣṭha | 63 |
dharma yuddha tohora mohora hoilā kiraṇṭa | 64 |
mandara māḍi yehne basai māhindra giri
dharma yuddhe hārili ho chaḍa dvijabara | 69 |
āre āre dānaba gyāna tora nāhiṁ
brāhmaṇa yuddha se kiraṇṭa loḍu kāhiṁ | 70 |
bhīmasena boilā mohora kiraṇṭa tohora kiraṇṭaki
āre kumbhīrī datyaku māili sura nadīra bhitare
tu uburi thilu paḍilu ẏete dine | 75 |
ẏete boli ātreṣiṇa māḍilā tāra taṇṭi
asura prāṇa chaḍilā beni cachu phuṭi | 76 |
jibhā bāhāra hoilā beni daṇḍa pariyante
asura keśa dhari rātra kāḷe nelā
nagraāḍa muhāṇe nei mūrtti kari thāpilā | 79 |
pāñche heṁ bāṭa chāhuṁ achanti basikari dvāra | 81 |
yujheṣṭhi boile māgo bahana hoi yibā
ẏe nagra loka samaste karibe ye pūjā
ẏe nagre bhīmaku puṇa karibeṭi rājā | 84 |
baḍa baḍa biṭapa ye gahana kaṇṭā bhumi
chāli na pāranti mātāẏe yujheṣṭhi deba svāmī | 86 |
yujheṣṭhi boile chāla dhura hoiyibā ẏe bana upekṣi
loḍiṇa nagra jane na pābanti yemante āmbhaṅku dekhi | 87 |
bhīmasena boilā mātā go śire mora basa
śire kointā debī basi hoile haraṣa | 88 |
ḍāhāṇa kandhe yujheṣṭhi bāma kandhe kiraṭī
dui kākhe basile nakuḷa sahadeba bhāi beni goṭi | 89 |
nagr̥ṁ bāhāra hoante rātra prahareka thilā
ẏekā praharake bhīmasena biśāśate yojana gala | 91 |
tahiṁra kūḷe prabeśa hoile yāi rajanī prabhāta hoẏe | 92 |
se nadīre bīre sārile prātaḥ srāhāna
dekhanti gaṇḍā hariṇa caranti paḷa pala
bolanti yujheṣṭhi bābu ẏe bana aṭai bhala | 95 |
rahile paṇḍu nandana ghora gahana aṭabyā
sukhe bihaḍanti bane se śūrabara pāṇḍabā | 96 |
baka datya badha hoilā yujheṣṭhiṅkara gyānu | 97 |
pāṇḍabe ye bāhāra hoile mahā niśākāḷe
mahā gahane paśile rajanī prasarara beḷe | 99 |
prabhāte nagr̥ṁ bāhāra honti ye purajana māne
dekhile bhīṣmarūpe chāhaṁi rākṣasa prajvaḷita naẏane | 101 |
daśa naha barājita taja tā bijuḷi | 102 |

div.note: dekhile mahā bismaẏe kari chāhuṁcchi naẏane |

lg.l: bistāra tuṇḍ ye hr̥de luḷai jibhā
kāhāra ghare hoithilā kāli ṭhākuraṅkara pāḷi | 105 |
triputi kari ho na pārilu ṭhākuraṅku | 107 |
kisa kisa yogāḍa paṇḍā he kisa dila kāli
bedaśarmaṇa boilā mu sambhabongeṇa kāli yogāḍa dili | 108 |
narabaḷi jaṇe kisa kala he dvijabara
mohora pure rahuthile mātā pāñcha putra
mora kaṣṭa dekhi dile se bhāinta | 110 |
nagra jana boile paṇḍā he manda kr̥tya kala
āpaṇe na yāi kimpe paraku peṣila | 111 |
yāhāku paṭhiāila dekha ni tohora pure
tatakṣaṇe dhāi gāiṁ dekhanti brāhmaṇa antapure | 112 |
dekhile se pure jana manuṣya kehi nāhiṁ
paṇḍāẏe moṇohi yogāḍa khāilā se durmukha brāhmaṇa
para karai niki ho āpaṇāra karyya | 115 |
cala ho bedaśarmaṇa paṇḍā he ẏe mahānagra rakha
aneka śītaḷa yogāḍa gheni pura jane
śagaḍa bhitare aneka śītaḷa yogāḍa se bhari
baka datya chamure prabeśa bipra yāi | 120 |
dūreṇa thāi bipra ye hoilā praṇapatya
binaẏa bhāba hoi stuti karai bahuta | 121 |
boilā purajana mānaṅku kopa na karibā debasvāmī | 122 |
kopa śānti karibā ẏe bhmabana deba rakṣa
mohora ghare pāḷi mote deba bhakṣa | 123 |
aneka baikulye tusti karai bipra trodhe
dekhai bipra alakṣaṇa baka rākṣasara kāẏe
svāmī tohora sañchilā sinā ẏekacatra nagrapura | 126 |
samasta purajana āmbhe achu tora garbhe
aneka doṣī āmbhe tote bhābe abhabe | 127 |
ẏete boli bipra asura bhmaja dhari
svāmī mote bhakṣyapāna kara boli asura bhmaja uchuḍi | 128 |
br̥kṣaku āujāi sinā thilā asura thāpi
asurkai dekhi niropai beda ye śarmaṇa
asura badha dekhi bedaśarmaṇaku tusti kari
tohora prasanne āmbhara kaṣṭa galā pāri | 132 |
mahata bheṭilu tu āmbhanta kalu he kāraṇa
ẏekacatrā nagra loke bedaśarmaṇaku kale pūjā
mahata āsre kalā prāṇī hoanti ẏemanta | 136 |
puṇya prasāde sehi nagre helā ṭhākurāṇī | 138 |
banaste baka rākṣasara mūḷe yeteka thilā dhana bhaṇḍāra
purajana māne se samasta kale jūra | 139 |
aneka susta pāile se nagra purajane
asuraku aneka bhaẏa upuju thilā mane | 141 |
asura nāśa galā sarilā svargara araṣṭi | 142 |
āpaṇe dukhe paḍi pāṇḍabe pheḍanti parara durgati | 145 |
ruṣi bipra tapodhane karanti tapa upaichā
durapada bhaẏaru kehi karantā nohilāka rakṣā | 148 |

div.note: tridaśa debe ye basi bhāḷile ākāśe

lg.l: ẏe chāri datyanta badha karibāra nimante
pāṇḍabe banabāsa hoile ẏethira ye arthe | 150 |
bana bhmabana rakṣā kale duṣṭanta nibāri
madhubane, hiḍimbaka bane ghaṭautkaṭaku kale adhikārī | 151 |
taba mukhum śuṇi citta hoiba mora dhani | 2 |
dvārikāku bije kale rāmakr̥ṣṇa beni bhrathe
hastināku bije kale dhr̥tarāṣṭaṅku dekhibā nimante | 4 |
dekhiṇa dhr̥tarāṣṭa aneka gaurobe kale pūjā
gobinde bije kale biduraṅku gheniṇa ẏekānte
bidure boile svāmī poẏe gale keuṁṇa bane
bāratā na pāilu keṇe gale chaḍa jaṇe | 7 |
bidura boile svāmī poẏe kemante bārata pāāntu
pañchāḷa deśaku ye bahana hoi yāntu | 8 |
khoji na pāilu bīre achanti kāhiṁ
ẏethaku cintā kara tu yadukuḷa sāiṁ | 12 |
svāmī pāṇḍabe yebe bratanti biṣṇuṅka āśrite
tohara cintā na kale se rājya pāibe kemante | 13 |
uṭhiṇa bidura ye śata sahasre daṇḍa pariṇāmi
byāsaṅku pūjā kale śrī uruṣottama debasvāmī | 16 |
nārāẏaṇa pucchā kale byāsaṅkara mukha chāhiṁ
bho byāse ẏetebeḷe pāṇḍabe rahichanti kāhiṁ | 17 |
pāṇḍabe rahichanti ye śrī rāmabeṇī tīrthara | 19 |
sabong kuśaḷe pāṇḍabe tahiṁ bratichanti kṣame
ẏehāra buddhibaḷe pāṇḍabe pāra gale māẏā | 24 |
jagannāthe boile byāse tumbhe droapdara deśaku yiba
byāsa kūṭa kari tahiṁ lakheka pātiba | 25 |
manabhedī nārāje se lākha jaẏe yiba | 26 |
taḷe dhanu ẏeka thoiba baḷa ẏekalakṣa | 27 |
lakṣe rājāṅku dekhāibā nā arjunara mahimā | 29 |
āmbhe beni bhāi yāuachu ugrasena sahite | 30 |
ẏe nārāja goṭi nei arjunaku deba
sadānanda mantrī jaṇāilā bije kale byāse | 35 |
pādya arghya dei praṇapatya byāsaṅka padmapāde | 36 |
byāse boile rājā parama kalyāṇa hoasi
saẏambara bidhana rājā pātilu ki biśeṣi | 37 |
tini tini naḷa āẏatana ẏeka bakharā goṭi | 39 |
chatra ghara māna hoilāni caubiṁśa ahibrata | 40 |
gaja śāḷamāna pāñcha mebaccha pandara sahasra ghara

lg.note: gaja śāḷamāna pāñcha padma pandara mebakṣa ghara |

lg.l: pāñcha yojana āẏetana chaẏeṇi kaṇaẏa ratnamāna | 47 |
aṣṭa ratna nirmita kale subarṇṇa thambara | 48 |
sehi thamba āujaṇā āhuṭa hātha subarṇṇa | 49 |

lg.note: pātra amanātya ye miḷibe tahiṁ jāṇi

lg.l: chāri chāri mahājana māna tuleṇa tāhāṅku | 52 |
aśva gajamānaṅku caraṇī piuṇī ghāsa bihiri
samasta sampādilā rājā aklā dr̥ḍha kari | 53 |
sādhu sadhu dhuni goṭiẏe kalu dvāpara yugaku | 54 |
dropada boile byāse arjuna yebe thāāntā
byāse boile rājā āmbhra bola kara
pāṇḍabe male boli ye sagsāra bāratā pāu
āmbhe ẏe kathāku ye parate na yāu | 58 |
ẏemānaṅkara putra se aṭanti pañchu bīre | 59 |
koḷe dhari dutīkr̥ṣṇa nāma dileka acyua | 60 |
ẏemānaṅkara thāānte ki pāṇḍabaṅkara hoiba paramāde
ẏe kathāku kebeheṁ āmbhe na yāu sagprate hāde | 62 |
mānabe pradāna karāibu ki tohora nandanī | 63 |
se lākha binddhaba ye kanyā debu tatakṣaṇa | 64 |
debe agocara se ye mānabe adr̥śa | 65 |
mānaba tāḷe sāta tāḷa debeṇa ẏeka tāḷa boli
deba tāḷe sata tāḷa rādhācatra ghaṭaṇa kali | 66 |
mānaba tāḷe aṇachāśa tāḷa hoila uccharga
tahiṁra upare basāile subarṇṇa ẏeka mācha
taḷe dhanuẏeka thoile baḷa ẏeka lakṣa | 69 |
tahiṁra taḷe thoile tīrtha jaḷaghaṭa goṭi | 70 |
byāse boile rājā śuṇa ho dropada nr̥patya
lakṣe baḷa pināka dharibāku kehu sāmaratha | 71 |
catrabhedī nārāja mācha bāmacachu yiba phuṭi | 72 |
ye lokha binddhara se indra gobinda phālaguni | 74 |
ẏehā tadana kari jāṇi thāasi tohora mane
pāṇḍabe rahichanti ye śrī rāmabeṇī kūḷe
lambita juḍā bāḷa puñjā ye kācheṭi
bhīmasena karatāḷi māri hasilā tāhā dekhi | 79 |
maṇiṣa bātuḷa ki prapañcha rūpa kāẏe
dekhili ki māẏe go anyākāra rūpa goṭāẏe | 80 |
cauda araṣa bane bulilu ẏemanta rūpa dekhilāta nāhiṁ | 81 |
sahadeba boile deba na kara upahāsya
āmbhanta kaṣaṇa nimante bije kale muni byāsa | 82 |
śata sahasra daṇḍa praḷambita hoi bhūmireṇa śoi | 84 |
byāsa boile ho tumbhe cihnila kesante
nija rūpa dhari se basile āstānara | 86 |
āsana dile nei kr̥ṣṇājina mr̥ga chala goṭiẏe | 87 |
kointāẏe trodha kale byāsaṅkara mukha chāhiṁ
tumbhara thāānte poẏe mora banaste bulanti dukha pāi | 88 |
hīna jana prāẏe nagre māganti ye bhikha
bāndhārī puaṅkara se sampada mohora puaṅkara ẏeḍe dukha | 89 |

div.note: praḷamba roma ye dauḍi jāṇi śira |
lambita badana jaṭā dauḍi jāṇi śire |

lg.l: ẏete jībana yāka āmbhara hoila asādhu | 90 |
chatrī paṇe jāta hoile ẏe mohora putre
kahante kontāṅkara trodha ye hoilā apāra
byāse kahile māgo trodha śānti kara | 92 |
ākāśa nāśa kale yahyṁ asura chāri bīre
tāhāṅkara bharā yahuṁ na sahilā medinī
aneka sānanda ye hele deba māne | 95 |
ẏebe puanta gheni sukha bhoga pāiba go māẏe
bhārā nibāraṇe tumbhe hoicha hoicha janama
apāda anteṇa go udita hoi dharma | 97 |
ẏekā śarīra goṭi bhogya chāri goṭi rāśi | 98 |
janma nakṣetre go pāile ẏete dukha
karama nakṣatre ẏebe bhmañjiba parama sukha | 99 |
dukha pāra galāni ẏebe aḷapa dina saha
rātra dibaseṇa caḷa ẏethem daṇḍeheṁ na ruha | 100 |
dropada rājā ye ẏebe karuacchi saẏambara
lakṣeka nr̥pati bije karibe tāhāra pura | 101 |

div.note: ẏeḍe kuḷara hoi muṁ jībana hoilā asādhu |

lg.l: tahiṁre bheṭa sinā puṇi hoiba samaste | 104 |
ẏethaku dropada rājya tiniśata pañchāśa yojana | 105 |
bābu arjuna tuhi se pāribu lākha binddha
śrī jagannāthe dile āmbhara haste nārāja manabhedī | 106 |
ẏe manabhedī nārāja tu sambhāḷasi yatane
ẏekā ghāntike bheṭaiṭi yāhāku karibu mane | 107 |
pabanahuṁ bege yibaṭi tumbhe samaste caḷi | 108 |
ẏete boli muni pādukā mantra dile
nimiṣake lakṣe yojana yāiṭi ẏe mantra paḍhi pādukā āuṁśile | 109 |
yujheṣṭhi deba pachārile byāsa muniṅkara pāśe | 110 |
dropatī prapata hoiba ki muni he mote
ābara kimpāi para sampada dekhi yibuṁ jhuri | 112 |
yujheṣṭhi boile deba kahila tumbhe mithyā
āmbhe śuṇilu ye dropadaṅkara saẏambara bāratā | 114 |
ẏehu bāratā yāi śubhilā tini pure | 116 |
ẏeḍeka dhārmika kāhuṁ ye hoilā dropate
byāse boile bābu śuṇa ho ādi kathā
tuhi se jāṇiachu nā tahiṁra bāratā | 118 |
droṇe dropadaku niāileṭi arjuna hāthe bānddha | 119 |
lājeṇa dropada tāra rājyaku na galā
kaurabanta jiṇima boli īśvaraṅku sebā kalā | 121 |
boile kaurobanta jiṇi na pāribu tohora bhaḷi | 122 |
bhārābhara nāśa karantā ye pāṇḍaba dhanurjaẏe
tāhāra hāthe bhīṣma droṇa samaste yibe kṣaẏe | 123 |
pīrati baḍhāa tu re arjunara tule
kaurabe nāśa yibe hāde ẏekā arjunara baḷe | 124 |
āmbhanta bariṇa se santati yagyaṁ kalā | 125 |
āmbhanta pūjā kari boilā dropadeśvara rāẏe
mote jāta kari deba ho dohitā goṭiẏe | 126 |
se kanyā goṭiki muṁhi arjunakaiṁ debi
tāhāra bacane āmbhe yāga āropaṇa kalu

div.note: kaurabanta jiṇiba boli ghora tapa kalā |

lg.l: tumbhara nāśagalā kathā manare karai bhranti | 131 |
arjuna na gale se saẏambara nāhiṁ | 135 |
caḷanti pāṇḍabe tahuṁ mahā toṣa mane | 137–9230 |

div.head: {@aṅgārapannaga yuddha@}

lg.l: gandhabong nadī ye bahai dakṣi ṇagāmī

div.note: arjuna binu kehi na jāṇḍi se lākhara bheda |

lg.l: prātasrāna sāribāku dekha jaḷa ye uddāna | 3 |
kete dūre bābu re achai jaḷaghaṭi
gandhabong nadī tīre yāiṁ prabeśa taḍati | 5 |
se nadī kūḷe ye toṭā bana
aneka kusuma abasante tahiṁ bahai basanta
toṭā dekhi praśaṁsā karai bīra pātha | 7 |
jagujana mohonī se rambhā tula jāṇi | 8 |
sabong aḷaṅkāra se ābharaṇa hoiṇa kaminī
stana jaṁgha yaubana saku phutiṇa diśanti | 10 |
amūlya biḷāsuṇī badhūka mañjuḷa bimba oṣṭi
puṣpa toḷanti biḷāsuṇī madhura gīta gābanti | 11 |
atianta sundara se ghārile madana jvare | 12 |
bhaẏeṇa saṅkoce se paḷāile tahuṁ bege
dhāiṁ yāi paḍile se aṅgārapannagara āge | 13 |
kāhāku dekhila lo tumbhara ẏeḍe bhaẏa citta | 14 |

div.note: amūlya biḷāsuṇī badhūka bimba oṣṭhi ḍāḷimba danta patni |

lg.l: kadaḷī patra jāṇi kampai tāra aṅga | 17 |
amara nāẏekara putra muṁ mo tahuṁ sandara ke āne | 18 |
sasasre kanyā gheni muṁ jaḷatrīḍā karai niti | 19 |
re re kāra kariṇa se bāsebara tanu | 20 |
bidyādhara binddhalā tīkṣa śaa munā gheni | 21 |
bhaẏe kari phālaguni nārāja tāhāra āmañchi | 22 |
puṇa puṇa bindhai se śacī debīra baḷā
āpaṇe śrīkara ye dhailā pātha dhanu
aṅgārapannaga pāda taḷe nārāja karai prācī | 26 |

div.note: śrīhaste dhariacchi indra kodaṇḍa samāna dhanu |
dekhi phālaguni ragheba śara bañchi (pā) guṇa āmañchi |

lg.l: na cihni beni bhrāthe karanti sāṁgrāma
nārāja māna tahiṁ na chaḍanti dharma | 27 |
arjuna mukhe cumba dei paḍai bhūmira | 28 |
śahasre paḍai yāi aṅgārapannaga pāda taḷe | 29 |
gandhabongku jiṇi na parilā śahasra ghāte | 30 |
beḷe beḷe kopa ye bāsabara bāḷe
na bindhu chedilā tāhā paṇḍura nandana | 32 |
aneka śahasra mote binddhalu re caṇḍāḷa
ẏe ghānti tu mora śahasra sambhāḷa | 38 |
bidyādhara boilā muṁ ẏe banara adhikārī
adabhmate moḍhā re kahuṁ paśilu mohora purī | 39 |
asthi māṁsa kāṭi tora āja debi biśābaḷa | 40 |
arjuna boilā tu re aṭu bāṭapaḍā
ẏehāṅkara bikaḷe tote na māribi ẏekabāre | 42 |
gandhabong kopa kalā pāthara bacana śuṇi
beni gadā bulāi dhāmai śira jhuṇi | 43 |
bāḷa dhari bāma āṇṭhu re śira pāḍi
ḍāhāṇa kare ghenilā bīra bije karṇṇa kaṭāri | 46 |
kāhāra putra tu re ke tohora jananī | 47 |
bidyādhara prāẏe tu ye diśu re sundara
mārite sata ye na baḷai mohora | 48 |
ẏesaneka samaẏe yujheṣṭhi āsanti gandhabong nadī kūḷe
gosāiṁ kāhāra kati se aṭai puruṣa
ẏeka puruṣaku yebe se nāśahiṁ kariba
patiṁ dehi patṁ dehi patiṁ dehi trāhi
dantare tiraṇa gheni kārpuṇya mate kahi | 53 |
anugraha kari nātha svāmī dāna debā | 54 |
na puṇa māri pakāi se kaicchā jagajjeṭhi | 55 |
bābu mohora rāṇa pāḍi ruhāa arjunaku
svāmī dana debā re ẏe kanyāmānaṅku | 56 |
yujheṣṭhi boile āmbhe manda kalu ẏe kathāra | 58 |
tā tahuṁ duṣṭa ẏe aṭai bhīmasena
arjuna tahuṁ chaḍāi niki ẏe karai nidhana | 59 |
āpaṇe dhāmanti deba dharma dharma sumari
āmbhara yibā yāẏe arjuna thāẏe ki rakṣā kari | 60 |
dhāmaiṁ pābani ye hāka diai dūre
rakṣā kari thāa bāb āsuchanti ṭhākure | 61 |
ṭhākuraṅkara āgyāṁ ye na māra ẏehāṅku | 62 |
yujheṣṭhi ḍāka dile raha raha pātha
na māra tāhāku re mohora śapatha | 63 |
anāsta nāśa karibā ho kebaṇa kāraṇa | 64 |
bābu re ẏekā puruṣaku sahasreka nārī

div.note: śaraṇa pañjara nātha pati dāna debā |
arjunaku na kahi puṇa nakarai nāśamāna |

lg.l: arjuna boile svāmī, ẏe se bāṭapaḍā
ẏehāku māile doṣa nāhiṁ, ẏe pr̥thīki mahābhārā | 66 |
sādhu mahiṁmā tora mānaba deha bahi
tini pure jiṇantā tini jaṇa āna kehi nāhiṁ | 69 |
trailokye ke ke tote pārantā jiṇi | 70 |
ākāśe jiṇi pārai mote bāsaba debatā
āna bhaḷi jiṇantā mote nāhiṁ bhmabana tini | 72 |
teṇu kari jiṇi pārai mote bāsaba debatā | 74 |
mañcheṇa arjuna jiṇi pārai ye mote
se mora sodara ye aṭai yugate | 75 |
yujheṣṭhi boile ho kisa tohora nāma
daśa doṣa aprādha mohora kṣamā karibāka svamī | 77 |
muhiṁ aneka doṣa kalaiṁ hoili dorehā
chedi pakāa deba ẏe mohora beni bāhā | 79 |
ẏe bhmaje svāmī muṁ ye dhaili tora bāḷa
mohora baḍa bhāgya dhaṁsi nohilita āne | 81 |
mukhe cumbana dei āuṁśai pāthara aṅga | 83 |
bābu tote jiṇi na parili sāṁgrāma prastābe
candra debatāṅka bīryye budha ye parakāśa | 85 |
trailokya nātha ẏe ye amara bhmabanuṁ
ẏekastari gaṇḍā yuga bhoga kale se mahāmanu | 87 |
ẏehi indra pade basile svarge yuga pañchāśa | 89 |
naba kanyā prabhāna hoile svarguṁ naba jāti | 91 |

div.note: ẏe mohora bhāgya muṁ dūṣita nohili āna jaṇe | |
bābu ẏe pr̥thīki dhariṇā aṭai somabongśa |

lg.l: se kanyāṅkara tahuṁ jāta naba putra
naba khaṇḍa kari pr̥thī bāṇṭi dile tāta | 92 |
tahuṁ se naba khaṇḍa nāma bahai medinī
prathama pradāna hoile yayātikai se deba kuḷara banitā | 94 |
kobera pada gheni basilā manu sāte | 95 |
ẏe yamara tahuṁ baḷe ghenile kāḷadaṇa baḷatkāra | 96 |
amara hoile saṅsāre kehi nāśa ye na galā | 97 |
manu rājā tahuṁ ye aneka sānanda hoilā
ẏehāṅkara nandana ye hoilā iḷā bīra
bhrathakhaṇḍa medinī ẏe debatānta bhoga karāilā | 101 |
bhūmanu bhoga kalā se ye bhutaḷa bhambanuṁ | 102 |
sabunti birathī kari mañche hoilā ẏeka chatrī | 103 |
kuru nāme tahuṁ ye putreka upujilā
bābu ẏehenneka mahimā ye acchi tumbhara bongśa
muhiṁ hāde indra debatāṅkara aṭai jyeṣṭha śiṣa | 106 |
mohora mātāra nāma aṭai jānakī | sarasvatī
bābu indra debatāṅkara yetebeḷe paḍai apacaẏe
svarge indra pada mote dianti debatāẏe | 108 |
aṅgeṇa bhogya muṁ karai dibya svarga
arjunna boile tu aṅge trailokya rakṣā kalu
aṅgāra nāma tu svamī, pratyakṣe bahilu | 110 |
pannaga nāma svāmī, bahilu kisa arthe
garuḍa bhaẏe rahi na pārile uḍaṅge
bābu mohora śaraṇa yāi paśile se svarge | 113 |
sarpe kiṅkara hoi lāgile mohora śarī | 115 |

div.note: citra bicitrara putra paṇḍu dhr̥ptarāṣṭa bidura
bedabyāsa jāta kale ẏe tini kumara |
paṇḍau rājā kṣetre indra rājā bīryye
pūbonga caritra kahili tumbhara ye pāśe
muhiṁ indra debatāṅkara aṭai naja śiṣye |

lg.l: samasta sarpaṅkara bikaḷa dekhili muhiṁ yebe
arjuna dekhai tāra garbhe pātāḷa bisvarga | 118 |
aneka yojana bistāra dekhilā beni ḍoḷe | 119 |
dekhiṇa arjuna śate sahasra daṇḍa pariṇāmi
yete doṣa kali mote kṣamā karibāka svāmī | 120 |
aṅgārapannaga boilā muṁ ānaku bhīṣma mūrtti diśai
tote ye sāṁgrame hārili, tu yeṇu mora bhāi | 121 |
bara māga pāthe ho debaiṁ muhiṁ tote
abhagate kisa bara māgibi deba svāmī
jāṇi anugraha mote karibā deba svāmī | 123 |
arjunaku dilā gandhabongā śahasra ye sāra | 124 |
aruṇa kiraṇa barṇṇa ẏeka ye bimāna
pañchāḷa deśe lākha binddhabu bīra pātha
bābu abhiṣeka kāḷaku purohita jaṇe loḍi
se tumbhara tule pañchāḷa deśaku yāāntu

div.note: arjuna boilā bara māgibāku samāna nuhai yugate |

lg.l: tahuṁ pañchabīre mātā gale bana ghora | 133–9363 |

div.head: {@pāṇḍabaṅkara kurāḷaśāḷe prabeśa@}

lg.l: bana gahana kandare chālai bīra peli
giri ḍiṅgara khāla ṭikare kontāẏe na pāranti chāli | 2 |
na dekhuṁ ẏehāra ta ẏeḍe bhīṣma mūrtti | 5 |
banaste acchi ẏe aneka kaṣṭa pāi
bhāinta māriba, daẏā ẏehāra ta nāhiṁ | 6 |
saẏambara saru teṇe dropatīki neiyāu āne | 8 |
stirī arthe ki se sodara marāibā | 9 |
ẏesaneka bichāri deba chālanti dhīra dhīra
āsa kinā boli ḍāka diai brikodara | 10 |
yujheṣṭhi boile tu ye pabanu bege chālu
tete bege āmbhe chāli ye na pāru | 11 |
bhīmasena boilā mote yebe goḍai napāra
tumbhe āga hua muṁ chālai tumbha pachara | 12 |
kointāṅka pāda bhīma māḍai dhāti dhāti | 13 |
āgare na chāla pachare oṭāri hoipaḍa | 14 |
bhīmasena bhmaja dhari kointā debī māẏe
ḍāhāṇa kāndhe yujheṣṭhi māma kandhe kiraṭī
dui kākhe nakuḷa sahadeba bhāi beni goṭi | 16 |
ẏekā rātrake gala śaẏe saturi yojana | 18 |
bhīmasenara tahuṁ ohlābanti sehi nadīra kūḷe
prāta srāhāna sārile sehi nadīra jaḷe
ratha gaja aśva ye pādānti gahane | 22 |
pañchāśa yojana thāuṁ paśi nuāranti bhitaraku | 23 |
uttara deśaru āsuchanti dui ruṇā chāḷiśi sahasra nr̥pati
paścima digaru āsanti ẏeka ruṇā pachāśa sahasra nr̥pati | 24 |
pūbong digaru āsuchanti sāta sahasra rāẏe
dakṣiṇa digaru tini sahasra nr̥pati āmbhe | 25 |
yujheṣṭhi boile ho paśibāku nāhiṁ bāṭa | 26 |
bābu nadīre pāṇi kete kaṇṭani bhīmasena
āho āmbhe kemante yibu yujheṣṭhi deba boile
dui kāndhe chāribhāi mathāẏe mātāṅku basāile | 29 |
bhmaja buḍi śira pariyante helā pāṇī
buḍi sabunti māruti pāri kari āṇi | 30 |
uttara kūḷe bīre ubhā ye hoile
aneka gahana sainya tahiṁ ye dekhile | 31 |
ratha gaja haẏa pādānti sainya thāṭha
pañchāśa yojana thāuṁ paśite nāhiṁ bāṭa | 32 |
bhīmasena bilā svāmī, muṁ hoithāi āṅe
mote goḍāi tumbhe āsa bege bege | 33 |
bhmaja hāboḍante ye gaje paḍanti ḍhaḷi
hāboḍā hāboḍi ghāẏe rathe heuchanti dhūḷi | 35 |
dibase bañchibā ẏe gahaḷa daṇḍa chaḍi
rātra hoile sinā yibā patha māḍi | 37 |
yujheṣṭhi bāṭa chaḍi rahile nima banikāẏe
yujheṣṭhi boile bhīma yāā tu ẏekāẏe | 38 |
ṭhāba goṭiẏe bābu tu khoji āsa yāi
susañcha sthāna hoiba āgama nigama bhūiṁ | 39 |
saini māḍi rahichanti pañcha ye yojana | 41 |
dvādaśa yojana āẏetana litāẏe ṭhāba nāhiṁ | 42 |
nagara paścima āḍe yamunā nadī kūḷe
tahiṁ ẏekā mātra dekhilā tucchā kurāḷaśāḷe | 43 |
bhīmasena bichārai ye dūreṇa thāiṁ chāhiṁ
rājāẏe basile ye maḍhare kehi nāhiṁ | 45 |
ẏethi āṇi ẏehikṣaṇi basaibi yujheṣṭhiṅka pāśe | 47 |
āmbhanta boli tāhā ye toḷāi acchi droapda | 48 |
mūrkha loke kahanti ki paṇḍitaṅkara bāṇī | 49 |
āmbhara nāśa galā cihna barṇṇa nāhiṁ
tote kisa bolibuṁ prakr̥ti ambhara manda
bhala kalu bābu yāiṁ re na kalu tahiṁ kaḷi dvnda | 51 |
ẏehi ye aṭai āmbhara parama bhāgya
rājāmānanta dekhi ye na kalu mane rāga | 52 |
yujheṣṭhi deba boile śuṇa re arjuna
brāhmaṇa rūpa thāu bhikṣā pātra gheni | 53 |
dadarā chatā kandhe hāthe hari gobinda muṇi | 54 |
sādhu sādhu boli praśaṁsā bīra kalā | 55 |
ṭhāba na pāilā ye dvadaśa yojane

div.note: oada sthānare goṭiẏe pothire adhikā pāṭha –
ẏethu anantare kathā śuṇa ho rājana |

lg.l: ānaku prāpata hoiba kāhuṁ ẏehu ṭhāba | 58 |
kurāḷaśāḷa tucchā hoiacchi rahibā deba āsa | 59 |
bhīmasena boilā bābu bhala ṭhāba kalu
svāmī khāla khuñcha kaṇā khaparā khāra bhumi
seṭhāre kemante rahibe yujheṣṭhi deba svāmī | 61 |
dharma nandana bolanti raha raha brikodara
se ṭhāba goṭi bābu baḍāi pabitra sthāna sāra | 62 |
puṇya dehā bhumi ẏe pāteka dahai sabongkāḷa | 63 |
dibaseka yebe bābu se sthānare rahi
chaḍa māsa pariyante ye pāteka hoẏe dahi | 54 |
ẏe kaṣṭa abasthāru karibā deba pāra | 66 |
he maheśvara deba taba caraṇe namami
caba padmapade śata sahasra daṇḍa pariṇāmi | 67 |

div.note: “dibaseka yebe bābu se sthānare rahi” pādānta pare adhikā pāṭha |
kāṭha loḍi na yibā agni loḍi na yibā

lg.note: ẏe ye śiśira śīta kāḷa lugā āmbhara nāhiṁ
pāuṁśa guḍāẏe pāḍi śoibā sustha hoi |
kointāẏe boile sehu ye durllabha sthāna
māhendra lagne śrī puruṣottama caraṇe namāmi |
taba bhagati gati bhābe śata sahasra pariṇāmi |
bhr̥tyara bhr̥tya deba sahasra daṇḍa pariṇāmi |

lg.l: yeṇu kari priẏa, hari dharanti hr̥da bhābe | 68 |
bhābāṅga puruṣa debi śaẏaḷa jana cintā
teṇu kari janārddana nāma bahanti sr̥ṣṭi karatā | 70 |
śrījagannātha nāma goṭi hr̥daẏare kara ṭhāba | 71 |
dharmaiṁ se tīra nāba hoilāka āsi | 72 |
se nābe basi nare taranti agāda jaḷa
nārāẏaṇa nāma goṭi aṭai beni kūḷa | 73 |
jaḷeṇa deba medāsura śarīra karddana kari
tāhāku medi, medinī nāma dile basundharī | 75 |
janme janme ghābai muṁ śrīkr̥ṣṇa nāma goṭi | 76 |
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa śata sahasra daṇḍa praḷambita | 77–9440 |
lg.head: {@draupadī vaẏambara@}
lg.l: badaẏanti agasti śuṇa kumbha ruṣira bāḷa
mohora bichāraku ẏe sthāna baḍa sukhī | 3 |
kāṭha loḍi na yibā agni lodi na yibā
ẏe māgha māsa āmbhara śīta basra nāhiṁ
pāuṁśa guḍāẏe pāḍi śoibā uṣuma hoi | 5 |
pañchu kaṭakara madhye se ye naranātha
ratnakhaṭe haṁsulī neta tuḷi pāṭa mucuḷā supāti
chāra pāuṁśa pāi se ye bhajile triputi | 8 |
āho bipada kāḷe yebe bichāra karai prāṇī
dukha sukha sahaṇā kṣatrīṅka dharma puṇi | 9 |
se āpaṇe kaṣṭa sahile saṅsāra tāraṇa nimante
tāhāṅkara carita śuṇile chaḍai durgati bipatye | 10 |
bāñcchā pūroi ẏe mahā pātaka harantā | 11 |
śrī mahābhārata śuṇanti pateka hoẏe dhvaṁsa | 12 |
brāhmaṇa sabhaku yāa brahmaṇa beśa hoi | 13 |
tumbhe ho thāa yāi brāhmaṇaṅkara meḷe | 14 |
yujheṣṭhi boile māgo ẏehikṣaṇi yāi pārai
tora pua bhīmā kopaku baḍa muṁ ḍarai | 15 |
aneka sampada gheni āsiacchi rājā mānagobinda
na puṇa tāhāra tule bhīmā karai dvanda | 16 |
lg.note: aneka sambhabone (sambhare) tahiṁ acchi māna ye gobinda |
lg.l: kointāẏe boile bābu bhīmā re mohora śapata
yujheṣṭhiṅka āgyāṁ tu na laṅghibu anubrata | 17 |
ādhyāna mantra pothi kākhare saburi acchi | 19 |
kāndheṇa chatā tathi prokṣaṇī ye śr̥ā
tambāra barṇṇa jāṇi bikāśai sabong kāẏā | 21 |
gaḍu tambā pātrī kaporā kareṇa japāmāḷī
chāẏā maṇḍopa bakṣiṇa āḍe brāhmaṇagkara sabhā
mahā sambhabonge ye āditya jyoti prabhā | 26 |
bipra pratakṣe diśanti brahmā rudra kobere | 27 |
sunāsīra nārāẏaṇa praẏe diśanti pañchu bīre

div.note: śr̥ā–śr̥ba | prokṣaṇī o praṇītā duiṭi pātra | prokṣaṇī –<lb/>pabitrajaḷa dhāraṇa pātra |

lg.l: baḍāi dhārmika se aṭai athabong bedī
guṇabanta brāhmaṇa se pāṇḍabanta rūpa chāhiṁ
ẏe pāñchaṅkara mūrati brāhmaṇa kuḷe nāhiṁ | 31 |
ākāśuṁ bije kale ki pañchu digapāḷe
kaṣaṇa dekhi bije kale rājya pāñchāḷe | 32 |
mānaba janma prāẏe na diśai ẏehāṅkara teja
anteṇa jāṇibā ẏe pāñchaṅkara baḷa bīryya | 33 |
guṇabanta lakṣaṇabanta dekhi basite dile ṭhāba
brāhmaṇaṅka sabhāre basile pañchu ye pāṇḍaba | 34 |
mahā sambhabonge basi achanti ẏe kanaka āsane | 35 |
nimiṣake moḍi pakāibi lakṣe rājāṅkara muṇḍa goṭi | 36 |
gaṅgāre srāhāna kari muṇohi karanti sabong rāẏe
uttara dakṣeiṇa pūbong paścima diga chāri
ye yāhāra āsane rājāẏe basanti ābori | 40 |
śrīkare arghya gheni dhr̥ṣṭa ye dyumana
ẏeka rājāke bacaṇa śate śate khadi
arghya āṇi thoila sabhāra madhya sthāne
agniru jāta mohora dohitā dropatī śuddha bāmā | 50 |
koṭiẏe ruṣi gheni homa kaẏe mahātmā bedabyāsa
mohora mana kāmanā kali yāhāra arthe
daibara bipāke se nāśa gale anamitte | 52 |
tāhāra tulya bara na pāili ẏe madhya bhmabane
ẏe lakṣe nr̥patiṅki kete puṇye pāi | 54 |
samaste baraṇa hoila tumbhe chāriruṇā lakṣe ye nr̥pati
kāhākaiṁ āsti karibi kāhākaiṁ karibi nāsta | 55 |
icchāẏe bariba kanyā mohora nohai yugate | 56 |
ẏe mahālākha mohora yehum binddhaba gosāiṁ
lākhara carita kahai śuṇimā sābadhāna hoi | 57 |

div.note: agiru jāta mora ye dopatīsu dharmā |

lg.l: kulāḷa catra prāẏe se bulai antarīkṣe
taḷe dhanu ẏeka achai baḷa ẏeka lakṣe | 59 |
tāḷekla upare kaneka paṭāẏe kaṇṭilā acchi sañche | 60 |
lakṣe baḷa dhanu dhari se paṭāra upareṇa uṭhi
tahiṁra gaḷe thoilā acchi tīrthajaḷa ghaṭī goṭi | 61 |
taḷaku heba dr̥ṣṭi uparaku hoiba muṣṭi
binddhaba nārāja catra bhedi mīna bāma cakṣu yiba phuṭi | 62 |
ẏehenneka sarūpe yeuṇa kṣatrī lakha binddhaba
mohora duhitā dropatīki se pradāna hoiba | 63 |
ye lākha binddhaba se labhiba kumārī
kanyā niante tāhāku na puṇa kara goḷa | 65 |
ẏethaku svāmī tumbhe kahibā dr̥ta bāṇī
tebe se sabhāku mohora dohitā parai āṇi | 66 |
samaste rājaẏe boile ẏehi se satya satya
yāhāra puṇya karma tāhāku kanyā parāpata | 67 |
tāhāku na sahi ye karita loḍai dvanda
saẏambara sthāna baraṇa lākha kathā nibartti
dropatīki āṇa bābu kanyā beśa karāi | 70 |
jāi yui mallī māḷatī nageśvara pākhuḍā
sugandha puṣpa dei sāñjoile kaberī bhārā | 75 |
na sahai sundarī bahuta ratna bhārā | 80 |
se beśa beśanamāna sundarī bujhai bimukha | 81 |
anaḷa jyoti ki se bikāśai deha phuṭi | 82 |

div.note: anaḷuṁ jāta ki se bikāśai teja phuṭi |
saṅpūrṇṇa yubā baẏasa se lahulī kumārī |

lg.l: aneka kanyā upare ye aṭanti rūpabantī | 84 |
ānaku nāẏekā se kr̥ṣṇākaiṁ aṭanti dāsī | 85 |
aneka beśa beśana ye hoiṇa yubatī
madhura rasa bādya bājai śuddha bāṇī
sahasre kanyā caḷanti āge puṣpa br̥ṣṭi kari | 90 |
dropatīra badana kehi na pāranti chāhiṁ
dhātrīgaṇamānaṅka mukha chāhiṁ samaste hoileka mohi | 94 |

div.note: madhura śabade beṇu bīṇā yantra dhuni |

lg.l: pūrṇṇamī candra jāṇi birājai badana jyoti | 97 |
lakṣe rājāẏe tumbhe ye basila āstāne
ẏe mohora bhagnī ye āṇili dropatī
kehi na kahanti tote tathya kathā māna | 103 |
tu ye hāndoḷāre basāi āṇilu dropatī
kehi na dekhile tāhāra cihna barṇṇa mūratī | 104 |
meḍharu ohlāi āṇa dorpatī ye bāḷī
rasāṇa patra praẏe diśai lalāṭa pāṭi
badhūka adhara ḍāḷimba bīja daśana bimbaoṣṭhī | 112 |
chāhānte batra naẏane hr̥daẏa yiba phuṭi
saṅsāra rakṣā nimante taḷaku kalā dr̥ṣṭi | 115 |
kiñchita kari se yebe chāhiṁba sabhāku
aneka puruṣa hatyā doṣa lāgiba ẏehāku | 116 |
pāpaku bhaẏe kari se hoilā māninī | 117 |
bho dharma debatā ẏe sabhāku na chāhuṁ
bhale ailu āmbhe apramāde ẏethuṁ yāuṁ | 118 |
apāṅga naẏane chāhiṁle sehi yiba phuṭi | 120 |
ẏe se deba kāryye jagata mohinī
riṣo bipra tapodhana tapa ye bhañjanī | 121 |

div.note: karṇṇa praḷambita ki, rañchita kāma doḷā

lg.l: tāmbuḷa bihūne ye adhare raṅga phuṭi
bāḷa ādityaṅkara teja bimbaku na ghaṭi | 125 |
sehi se tulya nohibe jahḍiba abaśya taḷe | 126 |
batiśa kaḷāre ki candramā taja ghoṭi | 129 |
mattapika cūtabana upekṣibe ẏehāra bākya śuṇi | 130 |
śarada pūrṇṇamī candra ye badana bhalā
rāhura teja lāgi se kaḷaṅka bahilā | 132 |
teṇu kari paṭāntara na ghaṭai śaśī | 133 |
na jāṇi paṭāntara karibā kehne jahna

div.note: limba sāhāḍāre lāgile se hoiba candana |

lg.l: kṣudra kundare dei ki ghaṭilā prabandha | 135 |
kr̥ṣṇamegha ude hoi yehne uḍanti baḷāke | 136 |
anādi aparṇṇā ẏe siddha ye sambhabi
śarīra barṇṇibāku kisa kṣama ye hoibi | 138 |
pr̥thiḷa susañcha sundara ẏe tohora bhmaja beni
jāti pākhuḍā jāṇi diśai lakha rekha
nohai ati sūkṣma nohai ati tīkṣa | 142 |

div.note: siddha sādhabī bandibāku ki saṁkṣepi kahibi |
nohai ati sūkṣma nohai ati śikha |
kanyāra śarīra śobhāku aḷaṅkāra diśe kṣīṇa |

lg.l: śarīraku bhārā boli aḷaṅkāra na bahi | 146 |
akṇaẏaru śateguṇ ateja ye ẏehār a| 147 |
kisa śobhabana kariba kaṇaẏa chara bhaḷi | 148 |
ẏe sabhāre nāhiṁ ẏehākaiṁ paṭāntara bara | 150 |
ẏehāra rūpaku sehi se śobhā paiba | 151 |

div.head: {@svaẏambara sabhāre rājāmānaṅkara svarūpa nirṇṇaẏa@}

lg.l: ẏemāne kebaṇa deśaru aile sanya gheni | 1 |

div.note: sukumārī stirīṅki ye bahuta aḷaṅkāra bhārā hoi |
“ẏehāra śobhā...pāiba” padapare goṭie pothire adhikā pāṭha–

lg.note: dropatīki keśinī ye meḍhare basāilā nei |
tathi upare dr̥ṣṭi dileka dropada dohita |
dekhile dvādaśa yojana pūrita lake rājāṅkara thāṭha |

lg.l: keśinī boilā rāẏe saẏambara kale tote | 2 |
tu debī bāluta ye na jāṇu go ẏehā
ẏe sabhara madhye ke mohora pati | 4 |
yehu lākha binddhaba se tohora bara | 5 |
dropatī boile ke kebaṇa deśara adhikārī
dhanabanta guṇabanta bibeka ke kebaṇa guṇe pracarī | 6 |
ẏehāṅkara guṇa sarūpa bujhai kinā adyāpi | 7 |
kāḷa bañchāẏe ẏe ye mānagobindara paṇe

div.note: keśinī boilā saẏambara kale tohora hite |
lakṣeka rājā basi achanti tohora nimante |
tāra tule rājāẏe pr̥thīre kehi nāhiṁ

lg.l: chālante bhumire abeṇṭa subarṇṇa padma phuṭai | 12 |
śarīra na chaḍai ẏe kāḷara yugate
dārā saṅgharaṇa kale ẏe pitāra nimante | 14 |
bhāradvādaśaṅkara nandana ẏe dekha guru droṇa
praśurāmaṅkara bidyāẏeṇa sakaḷa jiṇi pārai puṇa | 15 |
jiṇantā nāhiṁ ẏehāṅku ke trailokya maṇḍaḷe | 16 |
trijībī yoddhāẏe ẏehāṅku jiṇantā nāhiṁ pr̥thī | 17 |

div.note: pitāmātā ādi kari kahāku na kare namaskāra |
dhārmika bibeka jaṇe nāhiṁ ehā pari

lg.l: kr̥pa āchāryya go aṭai ẏehāṅkara nāma | 18 |
dekha sakhī śākalya deśara rājā śalya mahārathī
ẏehāṅkara dhanu dhaile trāsanti śrī puruṣauttama | 20 |
śaṅkuni mahāmantrī dekha go gāndhāra deśara
ẏehāra bongśa nāśa kalā bhariṇa patharaghara | 21 |
dekha dekha sakhī ẏe bhūrisabongā mahārathī

div.note: amara yoddhā ẏe aṭanti āchāryya kr̥pa |
indra śaṅkā karai ye bāraspatī pure |
biśeṣe parama kṣatrī ẏe somabongśa ādhipati |
ẏe se karṇṇa mahādānī kṣatriẏa mahārathī |
amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷa bajra chaurī abheda kapaca

lg.l: ẏe se jarāsandha magadha deśara nr̥pati | 25 |
teiśi kṣauṇī baḷa gheni ẏe ailā ẏethaku | 26 |
cedi deśara rājā go āṭai damaghoṣa
sāta kṣauṇī baḷa gheni helā parabeśa | 28 |
ẏe se rukuṇī ki go hoithilā bara | 29 |
nārāẏaṇa ra tule se aharniśi dvanda kari | 30 |
dropatī boile ẏeṇe tahiṁ nāhiṁ pirojana
daṇḍe kṣaṇe sinā go ẏehāṅkara jībana | 31 |
dekha dekha sakhī go kuṇḍī nagra rāẏe
rukma rukmaṇa rukabāhu rukamāḷi ẏe chāri tanaẏe | 32 |
duhitāra nāma ye ẏehār aaṭai rukuṇī

div.note: aṅga kari driyodhana ẏāku rakyeka dilā
aṅga deśa rājā boli nāma bolāilā |
samare dhanu ẏe yebe dharibāka chaḷe
sapata brahmāṇḍa jiṇi ẏe ye pārai abaheḷe |
dekha dekha sakhī go ẏe aṭai manda

lg.l: ma go bajragiri deśara rājā banamāḷī
beni marbhūta ratha gheni anubrate caḷi | 34 |
ati sijumāra go aṭai ẏehāra kāẏe
māḷaba deśa rājā ẏe aṭai kr̥tabarmā
naba kṣeuṇī baḷa go aṭai anubrate
kāśī deśara rājā go aṭai kāśīśvara
baḍāi pratāpī rājā ẏe jagate bikhyāti | 39 |
pañchāśa lakṣa haẏe tera kṣaunī pādānti | 40 |
kaḷiṅga deśara rājā ẏe aṭe kaḷiṅgasena
sakhī uḍaṅga deśara rājā ye madhukeśara
daśalakṣa yoddhā gheni go tohora āśe āẏe | 43 |
āṭha kṣauṇī baḷa gheni ẏe pañchāḷa deśe miḷi | 44 |
ḍāhāḷa deśara rājā go āṭe janārddana
śveta aśva padmeka tule kalāka gabana | 45 |
sātalakṣa rathī gheni bijaẏe kalā sehu | 46 |
khāñjaṇa deśara rājā go anupāma catrabratī
gaja aśva nāhiṁ tule tini koṭi rathī | 48 |
śate naḷa āẏatana ẏehāra mallāra nāme giri
paścima kośaḷe ẏehāku nr̥pati nāhiṁ samasari | 49 |
ratha gaja aśva tule ẏegāra kṣauṇī pādānti | 51 |
magha deśaa rājā go aṭai trigartti
pāñcha kṣauṇī baḷa tāhāra tinikoṭi ratha | 52 |
sāta kṣauṇī baḷa go tuleṇa ẏehāra | 54 |
duhāṁḷa dui padma baraḍa bāralakṣa gāī
aṇḍira bāra lakṣa batsā tiriśa lakṣa māī | 55 |
prathama cireka ye pr̥thīki duhim pakābanti | 56 |
kaṭaka beḍhi sātaghaḍi pariyante bahai kṣīra nadī
tāḷeka uccharge kṣīra bhai dhabaḷamukhī bhedi | 57 |
ẏehāra banaste sakhī go achanti yeteka jībajantumāne
samasta jība māne ye bratanti kṣīra pāne | 58 |
pūbong janme yebe praẏāge thāi jhāsi
tebe se ẏehāra go rājyeṇa biḷasi | 59 |
dekha dekha sakhī go śaradeśvara catrabratī
kañchana nāmeṇa rājā ẏe uttara dige bikhyāti | 60 |
śate siṁghara baḷa sakhī go kīñchaka senāpati
cira deśara rājā go bāmadeba bīra
ratha gaja aśva ẏehāra satara sāgara | 63 |
bīra deśara rājā go aṭai subāhu
sumanteka maṇi pāi dhaneṇa baḍa sāhu | 64 |
deba dānaba mānabe go na karai bhaẏe | 65 |
bhoṭa deśaa rājā go karṇṇakeśara bīra
sanya na āṇilā ratha tinikoṭi sāgara | 66 |
icchā hoile tāhākai barasi go māẏe | 67 |
bāstori padma sanya gheniṇa ẏehu āsi | 68 |
kāuṁrī deśara rājā go sakhī kāmapāḷa
āñcha kṣauṇī sanya gheni ailā rājadeba | 71 |
sanyabaḷa tule ẏehāra pāñcha ye sāgara | 72|
jāṇai sādhana bidyā ẏe samasta bidyamāne | 74 |
daśa marbhmata yoddhā gheni ailā tohora bhmabana | 75 |
chatra deśara nr̥pati go aṭai caṇḍabaḷī
asaṅkhya sanya gheni ẏe bhramai mahīāḷī | 76 |
chāri kṣauṇī baḷa gheni bijaẏe rājana | 77 |
rtha gaja aśva pādānti tāhāra aneka | 78 |
ratha gaja pādānti go tule nāhiṁ kicchi
anubrate ẏehāra kandhu na chaḍanti lachī | 80 |
ati puṇya sakhī go karithāi yebe
ẏe rājāa bhāriyā hua sakhī tebe | 81 |
ẏehā pitā sakhī go jaḷataraṅga nr̥pati
tāhāku pradāna hoile paṇḍu ye nr̥pati | 85 |
kointāṅkara tahuṁ ye upujile tini putra
nakuḷa sahadeba tāhāṅkara beni kumara jāṇi | 87 |
ẏe pañchu pāṇḍabe mahā mahā baḷiṣṭha
candra kiraṇa jāṇi ẏehāra hr̥de hāra | 89 |
chāri kṣauṇī baḷa gheni sabhāre ārambhā | 91 |
kāṭhara garuḍa caṛhi bulai biṣṇura sabhāba | 94 |
kāṭhara benibhmaja kari śaṅkha catra bahai
bolai jighnasenī go na pāḍa ẏehāra kathā
ẏe saṅsāra yāka lo aṭai biṣṇu maẏe
asura aṁśa loka jagannāthaṅku nindā | kaẏe | 97 |

div.note: jībana ẏehāra go ghaḍiẏe nuhai gaṇita
asura aṁśa loke biṣṇu nindanti nirbhaẏe
asura aṁśa loke biṣṇuṅku na karanti bhaẏe |
padara bhāba–tāhāra jībana br̥thā aṭe | tāhāra samasta jībana goṭiẏe dina madhya nuhe |

lg.l: baḍa bidyābanta guṇabanta śāntaśīḷa rājā susvabhāba | 98 |
śākalya deśara rājā śālu ye nr̥pati
daśa sahasra ratha gheni se calai śūnyagati | 99 |
sāta kṣauṇī baḷa gheni caḷai maharāja | 100 |
śārddoḷa bāhāne rājā mukuṭa bandhā yoddhā daśalakṣa | 101 |
yamunā pura rāja go aṭai jamāgoṣṭha
ruṇeiśa padma sanya tule caḷai nr̥paśreṣṭha | 103 |
ẏehāra mahimā sakhī go debaṅku durllabha
dakṣiṇa kāṇi aṅguṣṭhire acchi ẏehāra jīra | 104 |
nāma dhri lihi pocchile huai beni khaṇḍa
dharma kathāuṁ ẏehāra āne nāhiṁ bāñcchā
ẏekai caraṇa saburi chāri chāri bhmaja | 110 |
nimiṣake jiṇi pāranti ẏe madhya bhmabane | 112 |
aśī koṭi sanya tule ẏehu mahārathī | 113 |
tohora prati āśe se kale gabani | 115 |
taba āśe ailā go dropada duhita | 119 |
naba sāgara rathī gheni go bijaẏe dropatī | 121 |

div.note: aśikoṭi sainya pāñcha koti ye rathī |
yāhā karme yaśathiga bhmañjiba se puṇi |

lg.l: cauda kṣauṇī baḷa gheni go bijaẏe saẏambara | 124 |
aṣṭadaśa kṣauṇī sanya gheni ailā rājana | 127 |
naba sāgara sanya tule bije daṇḍadhārī | 128 |
pāñcha kṣauṇī baḷa gheni ẏehāra tula | 129 |
tohora āśe gosāmaṇī chaḍilā nija rājya | 130 |
raṇe ajaẏa biradhū sāṁgrāme na leuṭi | 132 |
aneka dūruṁa gosāmaṇī ailā tora pāśa | 133 |
padmeka ratha ẏehāra chāri padma hastī | 135 |
daśa padma turaṅgama pañchāśa padma saini
bahuta dūru ailā ẏethaku sanya gheni | 136 |
tohora āśe ṭhākurāṇī ailā baḷa gheni | 139 |
dhr̥ba maṇḍaḷa boli go uttara diga ante
pāñcha sāgara yoghā sabonge byāghra bāhāna
tuleṇa āṇilā se ye pāñcha koṭi ratha | 144 |
maruta deśaa rājā go māna arajuna
tulena sanya āṇilā chaḍa ye sāgara | 146 |
bāāna lakṣa sanya aṭai ẏehāra thāṭe | 147 |
baiḍuryyamaṇi go ẏehāra rajye hoẏe jāta | 148 |
tuleṇa āṇiacchi ratha tera ye sāgara | 152 |
tera sāgara sanya gheni saẏeṁbare caḷi | 153 |
ṣoḷa lakṣa ratha gheni bijaẏe rājana | 154 |
biṁjhamāḷa deśara go rājā jārā śabara
amanātya mantrī tule sanya tera sagara | 156 |
tuleṇa acchi tāra tini padma sanya | 160 |
mukuṭa bandha yoddhā tule tera sāgara sanya | 162 |
chokhāra śveta aśva tule cauda marbhmata | 164 |
aśīpadma sanya gheni saṁsāra dahai ẏekā | 165 |
pañcha padma sanya gheni go bijaẏe raṇaraṅka | 166 |
ahibrteka nāba gheni ailā rājā ẏethi | 167 |
naba lakṣa nāba gheni go ailā bhuapati | 168 |
koṭiẏe nāba gheni go bijaẏe kala ẏethi | 169 |
tiriśa sahasra nāba gheni go bijaẏe kalā ẏethi | 170 |
lakṣeka nāba gheni bije kalā ẏethi | 172 |
aśi sahasra nāba gheni āsilā saẏembara | 173 |

div.note: naba sahasra nāba gheni bijaẏe kalā ẏethi |

lg.l: aśī sahasra nāba gheni bijaẏe daṇḍadhārī | 174 |
parārddheka nāba gheni bajaẏe kalā ẏethi | 175 |
daśa lakṣa nāba gheni tora saẏambara āẏe | 176 |
jambodvīpara madhyeṇa naba sahasra nabaśara śatāṇoi pāṭaṇā
ẏehāṅka thāṭhaku pr̥thvī na diai go ṭhāba | 180 |
pabana na bahai go ẏehāṅkara pura | 181 |
śate sahasra baḷa ẏehāra śateka kumara | 182 |
caurāśī kṣauṇī sanya ẏehāra sahasrebhmaja matta | 184 |
birāḷa bhmabane rājā kumbha ye nikumbha
beni aṅkuśa baḷa gheni ailāka bhrami | 187 |
dekha dekha sakhīre uttara kośaḷara madhye
kāḷikā dāḍha dile tāhāra dakṣiṇa hasteṇa | 189 |
dekha dekha sakhī ẏeta aṭe daradasena
baḍāi śakatā, ke sāṅgrāme nohai samāna | 190 |
kr̥tanteka baḷa anta na yāi go māẏe
basile dānaba baḷa go tohora sabhāẏe | 191 |
samasteheṁ baśya gale ye tohora bākya kari | 192 |
śatr̥ maitra samaste chanti priẏa bhābe | 193 |
sehi mahābhāku go tuhi se aṭu śaśī
ude hoilu go bhājilā darpa niśi | 195 |
badanti agasti śuṇa ho manu puruṣa
ẏebe kaha keśinī rājya maṇḍaḷa bidhāna | 197 |
bāra rāṣṭra chatiśa maṇḍaḷa kahibi biroḷi | 198 |
kaḷiṅga oḍaṅga baṅga ye telaṅga deśa
khāñjaṇa trihuta bhoṭa ghoṭa karṇṇāṭa deśa | 199 |
lg.note: samaste baśa hoile tote dekhi kari |
lg.l: mandāra kāuṁrī ḍāhāḷa belāḷa khecara deśa
kubuja gāndhāra kanāuja kṣetra bikṣetra biśeṣa | 201 |
naiṣadha meḷecha mañcheśvara kāśī padmadaḷa hiraṇa | 204 |
pāṇi maṇḍaḷa uḍaṅga maṇḍaḷa bhāskara maṇḍaḷa | 205 |
ude maṇḍaḷa nakṣatra maṇḍaḷa candra maṇḍaḷa
māhendra maṇḍaḷa subeḷa maṇḍaḷa biṣṇu maṇḍaḷa | 106 |
rudra maṇḍaḷa jānu maṇḍaḷa bhānu maṇḍaḷa
brahmā maṇḍaḷa karasthaḷa maṇḍaḷa bhadra ye maṇḍaḷa | 207 |
yamna maṇḍaḷa kaustubha maṇḍaḷa kaṇaẏa maṇḍaḷa
kośaḷa maṇḍaḷa padma maṇḍaḷa bāruṇā maṇḍaḷa | 208 |
indrapraśasta maṇḍaḷa bajragiri maṇḍaḷa śoṇita maṇḍaḷa
meru maṇḍaḷa maḷaẏa maṇḍaḷa ye mandāra maṇḍaḷa | 209 |
amara maṇḍaḷa kuñjagaḷa maṇḍaḷa dhr̥bādi maṇḍaḷa
madhubana maṇḍḷa sura maṇḍaḷa ye yojana maṇḍaḷa | 210 |
ẏemante keśinī kahai chatiśa maṇḍaḷa nāma dhari

lg.note: caṇḍī, mahācaṇḍī, upāṅga adhikā deśa pāṭhamānaṅkare adhikā acchi |

gata, ahi, bedi, śrīkhaṇḍa, turaṅga, sānu, bikāśa, chokhāra, śr̥ti, dhr̥ti,<lb/>ākāśa, pātāḷa, śūnya, kamaḷa, siṁha, acaḷa o pataṅga prabhr̥ti maṇḍaḷa-<lb/>mānaṅkara nāma pothimānaṅkare miḷe | bahu pothire meḷa hebā 36<lb/>maṇḍaḷara nāma gr̥hīta helā |

lg.l: oḍa rṣṭra anupāma rāṣṭra ye jaẏa rāṣṭra
ẏe bidhi bārarāṣṭra ye kaśinī kahilā
yāja nagra bhairoba nagra ye ujāṇi nagra
kāñchī purī yamunā purī mathuga pura
padmadaḷa nagra biṣṇu nagra kañchanapura nagra
anubhaba nagra khaḍagapura nagra māhendra nagra
hiraṇa nagra kauśika nagra beda nagra
pāṭoḷi nagra māḷatī nagraī gaurī nagra sauda ṇagra | 220 |
keśinī boilā ye pura ādhipati māne
bhratha khaṇḍa labaṇa khaṇḍa pracaṇḍa khaṇḍa
udaẏa khaṇḍa kaustubha khaṇḍa kāśī khaṇḍa | 222 |
kr̥tāntaka khaṇḍa kauśika khaṇḍa maṇḍaḷa khaṇḍa rājā
yabana baḷa kr̥tānteka baḷa ye br̥ndāraka baḷa | 225 |
somasūryya baṁśa yadu baṁśa bhoja baṁśa
kuru baṁśa andhaka baṁśa haihaẏa baṁśa | 226 |
cuhāṇa baṁśa br̥ṣṇika baṁśa gopāḷa ye baṁśa
kukkura baṁśa br̥ndāraka baṁśa dakṣa baṁśa | 227 |
choḷa chālukya phuluki gaṅga bhopāḷa baṁśa
ẏe rūpe sakhī go achanti aṣṭādaśa baṁśa | 228 |
aṣṭādaśa baṁśara madhye sakhī chāri ruṇā lakṣeka nr̥pati
tohora pratiāśe sabhāre bije kariṇa achanti | 229 |
muhiṁ sañchapi kari kahi paribi keteka | 230 |
prastāpa bākye muhiṁ ẏeteke go bañchāili
uñcha uñcha rājāmānanta go thokāẏe kahili | 231 |
ẏeka ẏeka rājāgku palama śate śate bhāra | 233 |
muṇohi sāriṇa rāẏe āchobana karanti yetebeḷe
se ratna yogāḍamāna nei pakānti agāda jaḷe | 234 |
āreka dine puṇa rājaẏe karanti muṇohi | 235 |
śuṇilā nahiṁ ta go ẏesaneka saẏaṁbara | 237 |
lg.note: dhana bhaṇḍāra bidhvaṁsilā rājā tohora nimante |

lg.l: annachatra bastrachatra ye māganti yete bhaḷi | 239 |
koṭiẏe padme sāgare kṣauṇī ye kāhāku yeboli | 240 |
padmeka kete sakhi go sāgareka kete
praṇapatya hoiṇa ye kahai keśinī mudusulī
śuṇa sabadhāne gosāmaṇī kṣauṇīẏe kete bli | 242 |
ratha pañchaṣaṭhi sahasra gaja pañchaṣaṭhi sahasra
aśva pañchaṣaṭhi sahasra pādānti pañchaṣaṭhi shasra | 243 |
chatra pañchaṣaṭhi sahasra ālamba bilamba pañchaṣaṭhi shasra | 244 |
udaṇḍa pañchaṣaṭhi sahasra pañchaṣaṭhi sahasra maẏūra jhālapakṣī
sūpakāra pañchaṣaṭhi sahasra poili pañchaṣaṭhi sahasra ye lekhi | 245 |
ẏete sanyaku ṭhākurāṇī go ahibrateka boli | 248 |
daśa br̥nde ye ẏeka nakṣatra kahili | 252 |
daśa nakṣatra mūḷe manu mukhe jāṇi
daśa manu mukhe hoẏe ẏekai kṣauṇī | 253 |
puṇa keśinī boilā śuṇa go māheśvarī
gocara na galā go sañchapi nuāri | 254 |
śuṇimā sābadhāne debī kahai muhiṁ tote | 255 |
daśa daśa ẏeka śaẏeka boli jāṇa
daśa śaẏe go sahasre aṭe puṇa | 256 |
daśa marbhmate go mebacche boliṭi yugata | 259 |
daśa br̥nde go khabongeka jāṇa sadhya | 260 |
daśa khabongeṇa go nikhabongeka boli jāṇi
daśa śaṅkhe go padmeka jāṇa boli
ẏeteka gocara hoila āna na jāṇai citte | 263 |
ẏethe prabeśa hele go tohora saẏeṁbareṇa | 268 |
ẏeheneka yābata lekhā go saini ṭhākurāṇī | 269 |
bho muni kathāẏe ye mote kahibāka pheḍi
taba mukhuṁ śuṇile ye pāteka apahari | 272 |
boila ye dropatīṅka āge cihnāi diai keśinī
kemante jāṇilā se nagrapura maṇḍaḷa rājāṅkara nāma gheni | 273 |
ẏe kathā mote saṅśaẏa lāgilā mahāmuni
keśinī aṭai jāta mānaba ye yoni | 274 |
badaẏanti agasti śuṇa manu ye dhārmika
ẏe kathā sañchapi śuṇibāku tuhi se bebeka | 275 |
kahanti agasti ye pūbongra ẏe kathā
ẏṇu se keśinī ye hoilā mahāgyāṁtā | 276 |
ākāśa gaṅgāre snāna ye karanti nārada munibara
tāhāṅkara tapasnāna beḷe ẏe ye miḷilā chamura | 277 |
ruṣi boile go kisa kāryya kahani tohori | 278 |
keśinī boilā tumbhe ye sabonggyaṁ puruṣa
tumbhara hetu dr̥śya mote hoiba gata ye āgatara | 280 |
ẏehā śuṇi muni ye kāḍhile kalīdhokaḍiru añjana
ẏehā naẏane gheni chāhiṁle tote hoiba dr̥śyamāna | 281 |
ẏehā paḍhi ghenile tote diśiba ẏe tini jagata | 282 |
se mantra añjana guṇḍi keśinī ghenilā naẏane
teṇu se samasta tāku ye hoilā dr̥śyamāne | 283 |
teṇu se dropatīki cihnāi diai samasta
śuṇiluki rājā keśinīra aṭai ẏesaneka carita | 284 |
manu pucchā kale agasti mahā munye
ẏethuṁ kisa hoilā ye lākhara bidhāne | 285 |
dropatī boile go mora manda bhrātha beni
anamitte barile kimpā ẏete rājāra saini | 286 |
ẏe sabhāra madhye ke mote hoibāka bara | 287 |
keśinī boilā go kahibāka sarūpa tote
ke tohora bara boli na jāṇai nirutānte | 288 |
ye lākha binddhaba, tu tāhāra manara hiāḷī | 290 |
karapatra yoḍiṇa bolai dhr̥ṣṭa ye dr̥mane
ye lākha binddhaba kanyā tāhāku parāpata | 293 |

div.note: yājñasenī sthānare jighnasenī pāṭha sabu pothire dekhāyāe |

lg.l: śubha yoge bijekale chapanakoṭi yadubongśa gheni | 294 |
śrī baḷarāme bije kale tāḷadhvaja rathe
śrībhmaje bajra āropaṇa ārohaṇa airābrata piṭhi
hastī beni pāruśe khaṭanti bidyādharī cauṣaṭhi koṭi | 302 |
indra gobinda ẏekatva hoi rahile śūnya ye ākāśe | 303 |
br̥ṣabha ārohi bije kale deba ye īśāna
dekhi praṇipatya śrī jagannātha deba haḷī | 306 |
saẏambara dekhi praśaṁsā kale deba nāraẏaṇe | 309 |
sabonge bichāranti ho bije kael debarāje | 311 |
puṣpabr̥ṣṭi uttāre ye kaṇaẏa hoilā br̥ṣṭi
dvādaśa yojana pariyante jane sukheṇa sāuṁṭi | 312 |
sanaka sanātana sananda an sanatakumāra brahmaruṣi chāri
ahibrateka śiṣa gheni saẏambare bije kari | 320 |
sabhāre bije kale tuleṇa śiṣa ahibrate | 321 |
ẏe tini ahibrata śiṣya gheni bijaẏe samīpā | 322 |
śāẏa ntanu pāreśvara biśvāmitra sabong ruṣi
śuka muni jaimini baiśampāẏana achanti pāśe | 324 |
kr̥ṣṇāñjana chala gotiẏe goṭiẏe dilāka sabunti
sampādi thilā se sabu dropadeśvara nr̥pati | 327 |
ruṣimāne boile taba bāñcchā hou ye parāpata | 328 |
chāri bhaṇḍāra dhana se brāhmaṇaku dāna diẏe | 329 |
kete dhenu dohana kale kahib biśeṣi | 331 |
śateka goṣṭhare ye hoẏe ẏeka pallī | 332 |
apāda śānti nimante dropada ẏete gāī dohana karāi | 335 |
poḍhua meṣa chagaḷa lakṣe lakṣe baḷi | 339 |
ruka yaju sāma athabong chāri bedī
śutra śaniścara ye rāhu ketu graha sthaiti | 343 |
tithi bāra nakṣatra yoga kahanti grahaputre
ye yeteke triuti abicchanne dianti dāna | 345 |
beḍhiṇa jaḷanti hīrā jaḍita dīpa śaẏe | 348 |
śate śate dīpa jaḷanti markata jaḍita sambhare | 349 |
puṇi thāpile asipatra goṭāẏe paḷaka goṭāẏe
mukutā jaḍita tahiṁ jaḷanti dīpa śaẏe | 350 |
niḷā jaḍita tahiṁ jaḷanti dīpa śaẏe | 351 |
netara candrātapa upare kaneka puṣpamāḷa khañji

div.note: dāsīneta...sambhare-ehi pada sthānare anya pāṭha acchi –
dāsīneta patanī dhana kuḍha kuḍha apramita
nānā upahāra ye na yāi tadanta |
ratna jaḍi kari ẏemāna thoilā saẏambara sabhāra |
bicitra maṇi thambara neta basra bhūṣaṇa

lg.l: ẏehimati sambhabonge sampādi acchi lakṣeka rājāṅku
kobera bhmabana nuheṁ ye paṭāntara debāku | 354 |
ẏe ye durlabha lakheka pātilā dropate
ẏe lākha binddhabāku svāmī ke acchi sāmarathe | 347 |
dr̥ṣṭibhedī aṭai ye rādheba suta karṇṇa | 358 |
aśakya agocara ho ẏe aṭai ānaku
ẏesaneka bichāra ye diśai āmbhara manaku | 360 |
dropada rājā ye byāsakūṭa lākha pātilā
taḷaku dr̥ṣṭi kale diśao chaẏā mīna
yebaṇa nārāja binddhabe bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa

div.note: puṣpaśayyā goṭiẏe goṭiẏe dle ẏe bidhi lakṣe rājāmānaṅku |

lg.l: ẏe sapata rathī ādi kari bhūrisabongā mahābīra
yete nārāja binddhabe tohoṭhāre bāji paḍibe bhumira | 368 |
kāhākaiṁ dr̥śya nāhiṁ catrakūṭa kale deba hari | 370 |
catrakūṭa hari boli brahmā nāma dile | 371 |
mañcheṇa byāse dekhile bhuta bhabiṣya gyāṁtā | 373 |
tini jaṇahuṁ chāri jaṇaṅku nāhiṁ na gocar | 374 |
brahmā dekhi ye aneka stuti kale

jaẏa tu mādhaba hr̥de byāsa kūṭa bhaṅgī | 380 |
