śudramuni sāroḷa dāsa śate sahasra daṇḍa pariṇāma | 385-9977 |

div.head: {@lyakhabindha@}

lg.l: kahita śakya nohai dropada lākha bidhāna | 2 |
ye pāra gosāiṁ lākha ye binddhabā | 3 |
tahiṁki kāraṇa svāmī karibā nā mote | 4 |

div.note: lākhara caritra mote kahibā muni he |

lg.l: karṇṇa boilā tumbhe ati māne mānagobinda
dropada boilā tumbhe rājāmāne lākha bindha | 10 |
rājāmāne tumbhe āga lakha binddhaba pratakṣe
tumbhemāne binddha nuārile āmbhe binddhabu ye pache | 12 |
pāra ki na pāra binddhaba nā yugate
tumbhara na binddhale ābara ke binddhaba kemante | 13 |
bābu mahimā se ye dhr̥tarāṣṭara tanaẏe
caurāśi guṇa lakṣaṇe ẏe nr̥pati dhr̥tarāṣṭi | 19 |
kebaṇa deśara sakhī ẏe aṭai rājā
amara svarga teji ki bijaẏe kale biḍojā | 21 |
kuṅkuma candana lepana asaraḷa sutā barabeśī
pitā mātā ādi kari kahāku nāhiṁ namaskāra | 24 |
sarūpa diśai go taruṇa ādityara prāẏe | 25 |
ẏe pañchu kaṭakura rājā ẏe jambudīpaku dhāraṇā | 26 |
pāṇḍabnta nāśa kalā ẏe jatura ghara bhiāi
upāẏe catrabratī ẏehāku sarisama kehi nāhiṁ | 27 |
ẏete beḷahuṁ ẏe hatyā bibādī mahāpāpa | 28 |
pathara ghare lāi nāśa kalā gāndharasenara bongśa
jau sajaḷasa ghara bhiāi ẏe pāṇḍabanta kalā nāśa | 29 |
chatrīṅka mahimā jāṇi śatr̥ku jiṇai yebe raṇe
ẏehāra samāne sakhī nāhiṁ nā manda doṣī
ẏete pāpiṣṭhaku kimpe sbhāre dile basi | 31 |
biṣa mauṣadhi sakhī go mantrara upāẏe
ẏemanta bāgeṇa ye prāṇīṅka nāśa kaẏe | 32 |
iha loke tāhāra badana na chāhiṁ
rauraba narke paḍai punarapi janma nāhiṁ | 33 |
beda śāsra purāṇamānanta mithyā ye hoiba | 34 |
lākhara taḷe prabeśa driyodhana mahāteja gheni | 35 |
kaha lākha binddhabāra kebaṇa carita bidhāna | 36 |
sāta tāḷa ucce acchi kanakara mīna
tahiṁ taḷe rādhācatra bule ghana ghana | 38 |
upara paṭāre acchi dhanu ẏeka lakṣya
se dhanu dhari paṭāre uṭhiba pratakṣa | 40 |
machara bāma cakṣure bāṇa binddhabāka yāi | 42 |
ḍāhāṇa cakṣu bāṭe rahiba nikiḷi śara
tebe se labhibu rājā dropatī āmbhara | 43 |
dropatīra badana chāhiṁlā māna ye gobinda
madane bebhaḷa hoilā cachu thāuṁ andha | 45 |
lākhara taḷe rājā ye darāṇḍai dhanuku | 46 |
paḷā yā paḷā yā boliṇa dle tāku peli | 48 |
dhr̥tarāṣṭa parāẏe hoilā ki tohora cachu
cachu thāuṁ thāuṁ tu andha hou achu | 49 |
dhanu jaḷaghaṭa tu yebe nuārilu bāri
tu kisa binddhabu lākha yāa ya bāhuḍi | 50 |
barabeśa hoi tu re saṅsāra jana bhaṇḍi | 51 |
lākhara taḷe ubhā hoilā magadheśvara nāthe
huḷeka toḷi ye nuārilā guṇa dei
mukuṭa pakāi yāi se basilā sabhāẏe | 55 |
śiśupāḷa kumāra ye bāhāra hoilā jhāti | 56 |
nāsikā bāṭe rodhira paḍe tāra gaḷi | 58 |

div.note: hasta paśilā yāi subarṇṇa ghaṭa bhitara |
tu kisa binddhabu lākha yāa yā apasari |

lg.l: gaḷathā deiṇa ye sabhku nelā jhāti | 59 |
re re kāra kariṇa sabhāru bāhāra tatakṣaṇa | 60 |
bhumiru dhanuku se chaḍāi na parilā | 61 |
paḷā yā boliṇ aaneka jhiṅghāsa boli
sabhāre lāja pāi basilā rukmaṇa mahāchatrī
dhanu toḷi se guṇa dei nuārilā | 64 |
sabhāku āsi ta se nuārai mahārāja | 65 |
dhāiṁ yāiṇa dhanu ye dhailā ātreṣi
śikhaṇḍī tāhāku bege dhari tahuṁ nelā
paḷā yā boli peli dila dropadara tanu | 71 |
pr̥thīra rājā hoi sāṅgrāme tāku nāhiṁ sama | 75 |
ākāśa kampilā tāhāra garjana nāda śuṇi | 76 |
bhmajeṇa dhanu dhri ubhā hoilā rāẏe
kopeṇa garjai se matta nāga prāẏe | 77 |
guṇa debāku bāma bhmaje dhanu toḷi
ākraṣaṇa ghāẏe mukhuṁ rodhira tāhāra paḍilā nikiḷi | 78 |
sabhāru bāhāra kehi nohile asura rājana | 83 |
kehi chāḷi nuārile śibara dhanu goṭi | 84 |
re re kāra śabada kari sabhāru hoilā bāhāra | 85 |
bāma bhmaje dhanu dhari rurddha gate toḷilā | 86 |
huḷe guṇa dei nuārai se basudhāra tanu | 87 |
lobheṇa nārakā dhanu na chaḍe hātharu
śikhaṇḍī boilā ābara thāi kisa karu | 88 |
pāḷā yā sabhāku boli boilā dhr̥ṣṭa ye dr̥mana
ẏe kathāku kehi na karibā abhimāna | 92 |
chatrī hoi kari kehu acha sāmaratha
ye lokha binddhaba kanyā debai ẏe mora satya | 95 |
ẏe bacana śuṇi ye ādityara suta | 97 |
dhārmika bibeka se sundara lohita barṇṇa | 8 |
bāḷa arka jāta hoilā ki ẏe pañcha bhmabana | 99 |
dropatī boile ẏe kebaṇa deśara nr̥pamaṇi | 100 |
keśinī boilā tu go śuṇasi pāñchāḷī
ādityara bīryye jāta ẏe karṇṇa mahābaḷī
abibhāita kāḷe bidyā parīkṣa kale bhojara dulāḷī | 102 |
lāje debī garbhe na dhaile ādityaṅka bīryya
karṇṇe jāta hoilā karṇṇa ẏehāra nāma
gāḍhe chālante ye basudhā mukharu rudhira bahi
ḍareṇa nityāpati śate bhāra subarṇṇa lāñcha diai | 105 |
dāne śūrabantā māne śūrabantā baḷeṇa baḷabantā
lākhara taḷe yāiṁ prabeśa bīra karṇṇa
tumbhara bacana mithyā hoiba ki svāmī | 109 |
bāma kare dhanu toḷī dhailā tatakṣaṇānti | 110 |
huḷe pāda dei māḍilā bege dhanu
sādhu sādhu karṇṇ aboli sabhāẏe dhuniẏe śubhilā | 112 |
lākhara carita kaha tora keuṁṇa bidhāna | 113 |
śūnyeṇa bhramai se karāḷa catra ākāra | 115 |
se rūpa niropibu jaḷa ghaṭai chāhiṁ | 116 |
catra nikiḷi māchara phuṭiba bāma ākhi
lākha paṭā upare yāi uṭhile tatakṣaṇānti | 119 |
koḍā āmañchana kalā guṇa ṭaṅkāra śabada

div.note: pinākī dhanu–pināka dhanu | pināka arthare pinākī oṛiẏāre

lg.l: taḷaku kari dr̥ṣṭi paṭā uparaku muṣṭi | 126 |
sudriśena catre bāji nārāja paḍilāka dūru | 127 |
guṇa ṭāṅkāra kari kare dhaileka dhanu | 129 |
benikhaṇḍi hoile nārāja bhūmire paḍai bhāji | 131 |
ātraṣaṇa kari ghenile śiba chāpa bega | 133 |
āmbhe yebe lākha binddhabu dharma baḷe | 134 |
āmbhe lākha binddhale kanyā driyodhanaku debu | 135 |
śikhaṇḍī boile bindha ye tohora āgyāṁ
driyodhana boilā tāta bāhuḍila kisa arthe
bhīṣme boile ho kaṣāṇa paḍilāka mote | 138 |
dhanu bāma kare dhari kale guṇa ghoṣa | 140 |
taḷaku dr̥ṣṭi upraku muṣṭi kari binddhale niṭhāi | 141 |
āḍho āḍho boli yāiṁ dhanuku dhaile
sabongṇa nārāja ye uṭhilā tāḷa tini
dekhi kari samaste hoile byāja gyāja
re re kāra kari paṭāre uṭhile
lakṣe baḷa dhanu dhari hastare āmañchile | 149 |
nohilā nohilā boli boile samasta raja debā
tahuṁ lāja pāi āstāne basile bhurisabongā | 152 |
taḷaku dr̥ṣṭi ye uparaku kalā muṣṭi | 154 |
muhaṁ māḍi taḷe paḍilā nr̥pati jadyaratha
paḷā yā boli kari peli dilā śikhaṇḍī
puṇa thokāẏe dūre paḍilā muhaṁ māḍi | 158 |
paṭā upare uṭhi koḍā āmañchana kalā | 160 |
dui hāthe dhanu dhari hr̥daru tāra kāḍhi
lākha binddha na pāri abhimāne basile | 163 |
tabada hoi sabhāre basile samasta nr̥pati
lakha binddhabāku kāhāra na baḷai mati | 164 |
bho dea rājāgaṇamāne kimpe hoila mauna | 165 |
ẏeḍe ārddoḷi muṁ sahili yahiṁra paiṁ | 166 |
puṇa puṇa pachārai se dropadara bachā
lākha binddhabāku kāhāra nāhiṁ nā icchā | 168 |
kāhiṁ tora catra kāhiṁ tora matsa
adr̥ṣṭiku nārāja ho binddhata ki pāri
lyakha binddhabāku rājā kehi nohile bāhāra | 173 |
keśinī boilā baḍa baḍa rājamāne binddha nuārile
dropatī boile ẏe yetebeḷe ārambhile saẏambara
muhiṁ bili ẏe lākha debaṅku agocara | 175 |
kemante dr̥ṣṭi pāiba aṭai nā baḍa occha | 178 |
se catra puṇa na thai sthira hoi
anubarate bhramuthāi kurāḷa catra prāẏe hoi | 181 |
catra uparaku ye binddhaba nā pratakṣa | 182 |
tāhā na kari go puṇa mācheka bhiāilā
se māchara dehaku kimpe lākha go na kalā | 183 |
se māchara puṇa kalā bāma ākhi
tāhā na kari paṭāẏeka kaṇṭilā tāḷeka upara | 185 |
muṇḍa bulāi paḍanti aḷaku dr̥ṣṭi dile | 186 |
ye yāhāra dhanu tāhāku se kaḷa
tāhā chaḍi śibadhanu kalā lakṣeka baḷa | 187 |
ābara biparīta dekha uparaku thiba muṣṭi aḷaku thiba dr̥ṣṭi
catra bhedi māchara bāma cakṣu yiba phuti | 189 |
ẏeḍe saẏaṁbara sakhī go niṣphaḷa hoilā
mohora buddhaẏeka karibu ki go māẏe
ye tohora icchā baribu ki rājā goṭiẏe | 192 |
lg.note: ẏemante birīpata go chāriyuge nāhiṁ dekhi |

lg.l: tohora bicharu ẏethu rājā ẏeka bara
ẏe mohora bākya debī nirādhāra kara | 200 |
dropatī boile go yāhā boilu e sata
ẏe rājāmānaṅku kāhākaiṁ nabḷai mohora citta | 201 |
sehi se jāṇanti sakhī āśā ye mohora | 202 |
lg.note: tā icchare sehi sabhā madhyare bācchilā
naghoṣa, raghu narapati prabhr̥ti prāmādika pāṭha pothimānaṅkare<lb/>dekhāyāe |
padamāḷaba dohitā, catramādhaba dohitā, candra mādhaba duhitā,<lb/>prabhr̥ti pāṭha keteka pothire acchi–apapāṭha |

lg.l: śaṅkha catra gadā padma śāraṅga dhanu dhar | 204 |
chela bābala konta nārāja kare dhari | 205 |
śūḷa śakati amoha śakati bajra śakati
hima asra sūryyaasra anaḷa teja kānti | 207 |
abhaẏā kāntānī mātāṅgī māra ghora khaṇḍaṇī | 208 |
nārāẏaṇa śahasra mohanā śahasra bajra śahasra ubhāri | 209 |
ananta nāga bhūṣaṇī go caraṇe gagana kṣepā | 210 |
bongśī mandirā ghargharā bāje puṇi puṇi

lg.note: bharahara rase bhabānī pañchama tāḷa khaṭi
lg.l: bhoḷa rase matuāḷī suraṅga rasa saṅgitā
sabong bhaẏa bhañjanī go bhagata janacintā | 216 |
araṣṭi apāda go pātaka mora khaṇḍi
para dukhe kātarā go candrikā cūḷa maṇḍi | 217 |
amārga mārga yāhāra trailikya ẏeka khaṇḍa
prasanne abhaẏa bara deu go sabongmaṅgaḷā | 221 |
ẏe kaḷikāḷa pātaka tuhi pāru khaṇḍi
śūdramuni saroḷa dāsaku prasanna hoibā siddha sāroḷa caṇḍī | 222 |
āge dr̥śya hoilā śaṅkhacila bhadaḷiā pakṣī | 224 |
bāma naẏana debīra ye ghana ghana phuri
kathāẏe pucchā karibā śuṇa he puruṣottama | 226 |
lākha binddha na parile rājagaṇa br̥nda | 227 |
tumbhe ye boila karṇṇa mahālākha binddhaba | 229 |
teṇu bichārilu abā karṇṇa pāre lakha binddha | 229 |
ẏe lākha binddhabāku hari ke acchi sāmaratha
tini bhmabane bindhantā deba tinijaṇa acchi | 232 |
sarūpa kaha kinā ke binddhaba mahālākha | 233 |
jagannāthe boile ākāśe binddha pārai surapati
tailokyara madhye sabonge achanti jaṇa tini | 235 |
haḷī boile indra debatā lākha binddha pārai yebe
ẏe kathā kahile jagannāthe baḷadebaṅka āge
indra debatāṅkara kuḷabadhū se aṭai temante | 242 |
indrakai ayogya boli boile nīḷāmbaraṅka āgara | 243 |
tu yebe lākha binddha paribu banamāḷī
dvārikāku abiṣekī ẏe ta yogāi pāñchāḷī | 245 |
muhiṁ kāhiṁ binddhabi mote dropatī aprāpate | 247 |
manabhedī nārāja ta mohora tahiṁ nahiṁ
jadura ghare dahana hele pañchu ye pāṇḍaba | 250 |
ābara ẏetheṁ kimpā thibāka dukha paḍi
kharā kāklara kuhuḍi śītare kimpāiṁ paḍithibā | 252 |
śrī jagannātha boile svāmī rahibā ājaka
kāli abaśya deba binddhaba jaṇe lākha | 253 |
baḷarāma boile mote kahu kinā kahnāi
āpaṇe bindhabu yebe ābra kimpā āmbhanta luchāi | 254 |
ātmā ucchargilā prāẏe birasa deba haḷapāṇi | 256 |
dibase kr̥ṣṇa tuhi ki dekhilu svapana | 257 |
pāṇḍabe dahana hou achanti pratakṣe dekhilu | 258 |
dahana hoilaṭhāre ye dekhilu barṇṇa cihna | 259 |
sañchaẏe yebe pāṇḍaṅkara hoantā nā mr̥tu
mote kāmapāḷa svāmī kahiṁ tu dekhantu | 265 |
chaḍa jaṇa āmbhe utapatti hoichu ẏe bhmabanara madhya | 266 |
muṁ tora sodara hari mote tora māẏā
āmbhanta luchāi pāṇḍabaṅku tohora ẏeḍe daẏā | 268 |
pāṇi darśane ye mote gheni galu
aneka bāge tote muhiṁ kali samārjana
ẏeḍe kathā hari kāhiṁki tora galā
kāḷe āsi puṇa bābu ẏemanta hoilā | 271 |
mote hari hiāre tohora ẏeḍe kaitaba kathā
tohora saṅgare hari na thāi sarbathā | 272 |
ẏete boli baḷarāme rāge uṭhi gale
muhaṁ tora na chāhiṁbi boliṇa boile | 273 |
thokāẏe dūra yāi bhāḷanti śānti mr̥ti | 274 |
āmbhe yebe ẏethu rāge yibā āja
sate heṁ ki pāṇḍabe achanti nā brati | 277 |
jadura ghare āna ke ke hoile ye dahi | 278 |
pāṇḍabaṇḍa māribā nimante bhiāile jadura ghara | 279 |
mahā baraṣaṇa kalāka deba ati ghora | 280 |
ajara nāmeṇa deba ye ẏekai kirāta
se kirāta nāśa galā bajrara bighāte
kirātuṇī paḷilā tule gheni pañchagoṭi putre | 282 |
lg.note: ẏeḍeka parapañcha rañchanā kathā kāhiṁ hari tora thilā |

lg.l: jaẏantā nāma śuṇi kointāẏe kaleka pīrati | 283 |
pañchagoṭi putra gheni rahilā jadura ghare
sehi rāti pañchu pāṇḍabe bāhāra hoigale
bhīmasena pura dahilā samasteheṁ nāśa gale | 285 |
kumbhīra datya māilā bhīmasena jaḷara bhitare | 286 |
ẏe sāteheṁ jadura ghare hoileka dahi | 287 |
bidura buddhire pāṇḍabe gale bimbare gaḷi
sura nadīre nāba caḍhi hoileka pāti | 289 |
kambhīri daitaku bhīma māilā sura nadī bhitare
kointā ādi kari tahuṁ caḷigale khare | 290 |
chāṇḍāḷa baḷa māri biṣṇukaraku rājya dile | 293 |
ẏe brāhmaṇa sabhāre achanti yujheṣṭhi ṭhākura | 295 |
lg.note: ẏe brāhmaṇa sabhāre achanti pāṇḍabe pañcha bīra |

lg.l: kuśaḷe brati thāntu yujheṣṭhi nakuḷa sahadeba arjuna | 296 |
ẏekā marantā yebe bhīmā baḍa manda
āmbhara tule se kari loḍe dvanda | 297 |
āmbhaṅku dekhile se na oṭhai basai piṭhi kari
tāhāku mātra mora hr̥de kintu aṭai murāri | 298 |
gobinde boile svāmī yebe bhīma nāśa yiba
pr̥thibīra bhārā āne ke uśvāsa kariba | 299 |
ẏemāne ye basichanti mahā mahā bīrā
svāmī pr̥thī na sahai ẏehāṅkara bhārā | 300 |
niścaẏe nāśa gale gāndhārī śate poẏe | 302 |
arjuna kimpā ẏebe nuāsai lākha binddha | 303 |
arjuna kāhuṁ āsiba yudhiṣṭhiraṅka āgyāṁ nāhiṁ | 304 |
kimpāi āgyāṁ tāku na dianti dharmasuta
gobinda boile kāhuṁ āgyāṁ se debe yujheṣṭhi ṭhākura
rājāẏe lākha bindha boli boile dr̥padeśvara | 306 |
se gheni yujheṣṭhi arjunaku na dianti bāki | 307 |
lg.note: tāhāku mātra hr̥de rāga acchi āmbhari |
lg.l: yetebeḷe dropada boliba āsani brāhmaṇa chāṇḍāḷa ādi ye brati
ye lākha binddhaba tāku debi dropatī duhitī | 308 |
sabhāra madhye bijaẏe kale dr̥pada nr̥patye
boile gosāiṁ rājamāne lākha binddhaba nā yugate | 311 |
ẏe mora bacana satya satya nirādhāri | 313 |
debaiṁ pāñchāḷī ẏe mohora satye satye | 314 |
ādihuṁ āsani chāṇḍāḷa brāhmaṇa ādi kari
ye lākha binddhaba dabi duhitā mohori | 316 |
dhatikāre uṭhilā svāmīṅka dibya āgyāṁ gheni | 318 |

lg.note: dropada yetebeḷe āgyāṁ deba brāhmaṇa chāṇḍāḷa pariyante
ye lākha binddhaba abaśya debai dropatye |

lg.l: toho sādriśe bābu re nāhiṁnā nillaja | 321 |
lg.note: brāhmaṇa biśeṣe āmbhara aṭai kuśa kāiṁśa

lg.l: lākha binddha na pāribu paḷāibu jhāti
brāhmaṇaku māra boile ye māribe sabunti | 323 |
aneka dūruṁ ye ailu kariachu āśā
brāhmaṇa kuḷaku kaṇṭaka hoilu re bābu
dānahiṁ na pāibu ābara prāṇe nāśa yibu | 325 |
dadarā chatā cīrā paṇoi ābar aharigobinda muṇi
tiniki pakāi tu ye uṭhilu śira jhuṇi | 326 |
ādi chatrī bipre ye aṭanti nā yugate | 329 |

div.note: toho sadriśe nāhiṁnā nillaja–ehā pare duiṭi pothire<lb/>adhikā pāṭha |
paṇḍā bhaṭṭa miśra ye ābara bājapeẏī

lg.l: tambā pātī gaḍu thoi samasta bipra dhāiṁ
brata karāibā āmbhe bibhā ye karāi ||
brāhmaṇa lokara āśā aṭai kisa bhāṣā
sehi se ẏekoiśabāra nichatrī kalā pr̥thī | 330 |
kebaṇa mahātmā abā se achai gupate
brāhmaṇa sabhāku chāhiṁ bolai dropada nr̥patye | 331 |
gosāiṁ yāhāra guṇa bidyā achai śarīre
lakha binddhabā hou dropatīki debaiṁ tāhāre | 332 |
bāhānāda kari se sabhāru uṭhilā bibaccha | 333 |
baḍāi nillaja prakr̥ti tu re bahilu kesane | 334 |
brāhmaṇa hoi tora kimpe ẏeḍeka bharasā
āho paṇḍāẏe ẏe tumbhara kisa ye huanti
yujheṣṭhi boile āmbhara kaniṣṭha bhrātha seṭi | 338 |
ẏe yebe paṇḍāẏe bhrātha aṭanti tumbhara
aneka dūruṁa ye ailu dāna āśe
yujheṣṭhi debe boile raha raha dvijabare
lakha binddhalā lokahiṁ se lāja pāibānā mabhāre | 341 |
ye lākha binddha na galā na pāilā kicchi | lāja
tumbhe kimpe brāhmaṇe nirodha kara āja | 342 |

div.note: tumbhe kimpe brāhmaṇe ghañchāḷa kara āja |

lg.l: sādhana na thile se ki yāi pārai sidhā | 343 |
ẏe paṇḍāẏe kimpe na gale lākha binddhabāku | 344 |
dekha ho beni bhmaje phaḷiacchi guṇaghr̥ṣṭi | 345 |
yāa he paṇḍāẏe sukhe lākha bindha
sabhiẏe kalyāṇa kara na kara niṣedha | 346 |
samasta brāhmaṇa tahiṁ kalyāṇa dhuni bhāṣi
lākha bindha tote prāpata hou śubhrakeśī | 347 |
śatr̥ māri ubhāhua naśu to araṣṭi | 349 |
prāṇara sakhā arjunaku muṁ naẏane dekhili | 352 |
yisa abā duṣkr̥ta śarīre mohora thilā
tohora mukha chāhānte sabong kṣaẏa galā | 353 |
durjuẏe boilā ho samaste khaṇḍā ghena
driyodhana boilā re rha raha dhuśāsana
se brāhmaṇa gotiki na dhara āna mana | 362 |
lākha bindhu ẏebe se brāhmaṇa goṭi
rājakanyā kisa kariba bhikṣāśī brāhmaṇa seṭi | 363 |
dhana guḍāẏe āmbhe ye ẏehākaiṁ debā
kanyā goṭi gheni āmbhe hastināku yibā | 364 |
samaste boile ho brāhmaṇa lākha bindha | 365 |
cihni parila ṭaki ẏe brāhmaṇa goṭikai | 366 |

div.note: lākha bindhabāku ẏe ailā ji bichāri |

lg.l: droṇe boile āmbhe barayātrīmāne achu basi
mahā sānande bhīṣmaṅku kahile droṇa mahārathī
nāśa gale boli boile ye pāṇḍabe chanti brati | 368 |
kimbhūta māẏā ye na jāṇilu tathye | 371 |
bhīṣme boile droṇe thira hoi thibā
daridra hoiṇa yebe āsai lākha binddhabaku
bīra hoi yebe lakha binddha āsiba
konta gadā mudugara khaḍaga dhanu āmañchiba | 376 |
chatrī hoi yebe āsai lākha binddha
dhanu dhari āmañchiba se nicaẏe baḍa yodhī | 377 |
purāṇa pusta laẏe kari se bakhāṇiba lākha binddhabā tadanta | 378 |

div.note: jadura ghare dahana hoile dekhilu mr̥tu śaba |

lg.l: arjuna se ṭhāare hoile ye parabeśa
dhanu goṭi dekhi dhailā bāma hasta | 381 |
purāṇa pustaka gheni niropai mane mane guṇi | 384 |
āgo ẏetebeḷe bara ailā āumāne barayātrī | 386 |
sakhī ẏehi brāhmaṇa goṭi hāde lākha binddhaba
ẏehi se nicaẏe aṭai mohora ballabha | 387 |
keśinī boilā go yehne tora karma
kehenne pāpa lakṣaṇe go hoilu tu janma | 388 |
ẏe lakṣe rājā ye mr̥dhunā abiṣekī
iccā na baḷilā tora ẏemānanta dekhi | 389 |
rājānta chaḍi ẏehāra hoibu ye nārī | 390 |
pañchuśara gheni ki sate bijaẏe anaṅga
sehi sarūpe mote hiśilā ẏehāra aṅga | 392 |
kāma śaraghāte mote ye pīḍilā madana | 393 |
āgo pratakṣe śaṅkuna ye sthira kari dekha
pūbongeṇa muiṁ yebe achai tapa kari
brāhmaṇara hohitā muṁ brāhmaṇara hoibi manohārī | 395 |
tu debī bijaẏe go kara ẏāra kandhu
lākhara taḷe ubhā tāku kehi ye na cihni | 398 |
kṣīṇa dubongḷa dekhi upahāsya karanti samaste
dhātikāre arjuna dhanu dhailā bāma haste | 399 |
sādhu sādhu bipra boli sabhāre uṭhilāka dhuni | 400 |
arjuna pachārai lākhara carita kahani kemanta | 401 |
se catra aṭai ye sahasreka dhāra
pacanuṁ bege bhramai kurāla catra ākāra | 405 |

div.note: sumarai kātyāẏanī anādi śakati pare adhikā pāṭha–
tu debī kātyāẏanī go parama māheśvarī

lg.l: manara mānasī go suphaḷa karasi mohori |
dutī pinākī jāṇa dhanu baḷa ẏekalakṣa | 406 |
tahiṁra taḷe acchi tīrtha jaḷa ghaṭa goṭi | 407 |
taḷaku kariba dr̥ṣṭi uparaku kariba muṣṭi
jaḷa ghaṭe chaẏā niropiba mīnara dr̥sṭi | 408 |
catra bhedi māchara bāma cachu piba phuṭi
ẏete surūpe lākha binddhale nema kanyā goṭi | 409 |
arjuna boilā muṁ yebe lākha binddhabi
baḷa dubongḷa paḍile muṁ kemante karibi | 410 |
na puṇa duṣṭa rājā baḷātkāra karanti nā mote | 411 |
śikhaṇḍī boilā dvija na bhāḷa tumbhe ẏehā
sāta kṣauṇī baḷa gheni muṁ tote hoibi ye sāhā | 412 |
ye pārantu lākha bindhantu āsi āja
brāhmaṇa bindhante na puṇa rājāmāne pāa baḍa lāja | 414 |
paścānte kopa mote kari ta na yogāi
ẏehā śuṇi śikhaṇḍī ye bege caḷi galā
ye pāriba lākha āsi bindha rājāgaṇa

lg.note: na puṇ duṣṭa rājāẏe goḷa karanti anamitte |
lg.l: na śuṇilā prāẏa rājā kicchi na kahile
śikhaṇḍī pheri yāi brāhmaṇa arjunaṅku kahile | 418 |
ẏe dhanure guṇa dei achai bīra karṇṇa | 419 |
guṇa dilā chatrīṅki adheka acchi bhāga
bāma pāda dilā pātha ḍāhāṇa jānu upare
kiñchita mātre dhanu dhailā bāma kare | 421 |
bāma kare dr̥ḍha muṣṭi kari dhanuru guṇa ye olhāi | 422 |
mānabe ta gocara nohai ẏesaneka kr̥ti | 423 |
guṇa ulhāi pātha bhūmire dhanuhuḷa dei
dhanu saḷakhilā bāma āṇṭhu ye pelāi | 424 |
ḍāhāṇa āṇṭha upare bāma pāda dilā
abanīḷe bāsabi ye dhanure guṇa caḍhāilā | 426 |
lākha bindhantā nohilā kehi yahuṁ madhya ẏe bhmabane | 428 |
gopya rūpe abā bije kale aṁśumāḷī | 429 |

lg.note: abaheḷe bāsabi ye dhanure guṇa basāilā |
lg.l: baḍa mate se yebe nohiba sahasra yoni
indra debatā nohile ki ẏe aṭai kubera | 432 |
namaskāra karante na puṇi samasteheṁ jāṇanti | 434 |
nārāja pūroi pātha ye bhūmiḷi binddhalā
droṇaṅkara nāma dhari se mathāre hātha dilā | 435 |
bidyālābha hou tote kanyā prāpata hou
yesne bāñcchā tohora sehu siddha hou | 437 |
āmbhara āṣya gheni brata śatr̥ nipāti
pañchu kaṭaka maḍi tumbhe hoasi ẏekachatrī | 438 |
dekhi āśiṣa ye bāñcchā kale purandare
bidyālābha hou kanyā prāpata hou ye tohore | 440 |
śrījagannāthaṅka nāma dhari se karai daini | 442 |
tumbhe tāhāku deba kalyāṇa bāñcchā kara
bāñcchā siddha svāmī hou ye tāhāra | 444 |
gobindaṅkara bhaẏe se boile kalyāṇa tote hou
tu lyakha bindha re bābu kanyā āna neu | 446 |
baḷarāmaṅkara kintu mana ye jāṇile jagamohana
bidyālābha hou kanyā ye prāpata tote hou
śatr̥ māri ubhā hoa bairi bhasma yāu | 448 |
pr̥thī bhārā uśvāsa kara samasta rājānta nipāti
se lākhabindhā paṇā goṭiki hoibā sābadhāne | 451 |
mana bāñcchā siddha hou boliṇa boile | 453 |
bidyālābha hou kanyā hou tore prāpate
ẏesaneka āgyāṁ yahuṁ dile brāhmaṇa sabhā
jyeṣṭhi bhrāthamānaṅku mane dhari karai sebā | 455 |
mārakaṇḍe boile byāse se lākhabindhā brāhmaṇa
ke ṭi tumbhe tāku jāṇa ki na jāṇa | 457 |
byāse boile āgata kahita ki pāri
gupata kathānta pheḍi loke na bistāri | 458 |
yāhāku kāma artha kalāka dr̥pada nr̥pati
kāḷe pailā se debī ye dropatī | 459 |
arjuna boilā lakṣe rājāra yeteka saini
ẏe mahāsabhāre mohora sabunti daini sebā
ẏebeheṁ ye pāra gosaiṁ lākha ye binddhabā | 462 |
sahi na pāri droṇe boile paṇḍā ho lākha bindha bahana
poḍantā ghāā upare kete deuacha ho cuna | 463 |
sādhu sādhu jaẏe jaẏe lakṣe rājāṅkara mukhe
ẏeka laẏe kari dekhanti ẏekā arjunara badana | 475 |
ẏe mahā sabhāku mohora śate sahasrabāra daṇḍabata sebā
bindhu acchi lākha svāmī āgyāṁ mote debā | 466 |
mahā sabhāra madhye uthilā ghora dhuni
sabuṅkari bāñcchā, tote prāpata hou yighnasenī | 467 |
teṇu semāne karanti jana manaṅkara maṅgaḷa abhyāsa | 468 |
duṣṭa rājāmāne bindha boli maṅgaḷa abhyāsi
daridra brāhmaṇakai dhana dei nemā śubhrakeśī | 469 |
lg.note: “ẏeteka...garu dhuni” – ehā pare duiṭi pothira adhikā pāṭha–
sabhāre yete baḍa baḍa loka thile
sabuṅkari kalyāṇa tote prāpata hou yighnasenī |
lg.l: kauṁ duṣṭa rājā bichāranti kanyā nemā baḷe
brāhmaṇa lākha bindhu boli bhāṣanti sakaḷe | 470 |
indra debatākai sumari manabhedī nārāja māgilā | 473 |
nārāja pūroi pātha ubhā ṭhiā ṭhāṇa
bābu mora āṣya gheni brata boli boile guru droṇa | 475 |
śūra bīra pratagyāṁ dekha arjunara ṭhiā ṭhāṇi mūrtti | 476 |
ḍāhāṇaku aṅga sāridei ye taḷaku kalā dr̥ṣṭi | 477 |
yete dūre abā acchi lākha mīna
yāiṁ bheda tāhāra bāma ye naẏana | 480 |
kauṁkṣaṇe ẏe bidyā pāilā guru kahanti bhīṣmaṅku | 482 |
sata uttara sate śiṣyaṅkara hoilu āmbhe guru
puṇi kāhākaiṁ śakya nāhiṁ ẏehāra dhanu dharu | 483 |
āmbha pitā putraṅkara kampai beni bhmaja
bhīṣmaṅkara śira kampai karṇṇara kampai jānu
desaneka kṣaṇe bidhātā nibongāṇa kalāka tote
ẏeheneka bichāra karante bhīṣma droṇa beni
byāsa droṇa sapakṣa rudra ye sapakṣa | 490 |
śatr̥ mitra mukhe bhāṣanti śuda dhuni
lakṣe rājāra madhye arjuna ẏekā yodhī
re re kāra śabada kari arjuna lākha bindhi | 492 |
āho bahuta kāḷu ye dhailā nāhiṁ dhanu
bichāri niropile lākha arddha ye ākāśa | 494 |
rādhā catra bhedi māchara bāma cachu gaḷi
ḍāhāṇa cachu bāṭe śara hoilā nikiḷi | 495 |
lg.note: rādhācatra.....nikiḷi sthānare duiṭi pothira adhika pāṭha–
lg.l: bāhāra hoi nārāja gala bege uṭhi ||
bāhāra hoi nārāja galā ati bege
chaḍa lakṣa yojane biśrāmilā amara svarge | 496 |
samasta rājāgaṇe kale sādhu sādhu dhuni
se māchara bāma cachure ye puṣya mālāẏe bandhāthilā
se puṣya māja cchiḍiṇa sabhā madhyare paḍilā | 498 |
śrājagannāthe bādya kale pañchajanya śaṅkha goṭi | 499 |
pañchajanya śaṅkha śabadara gaha gaha ghoṣa bāṇī
duṣṭa rājāmānaṅkara hr̥daẏa kampilā kambu śabada śuṇi | 500 |
boile jagannāthe bijaẏe kāhiṁ karichanti ẏethi | 501 |
asura rājāmāne kehi na rahile bhaẏe
sañchaẏe bije kale ki pināka gheni triẏambake | 504 |
āgahuṁ brāhmaṇaku na dia baraṇa ye māḷi | 505 |

div.note: chaḍa lakṣa yojana ākāśaku uṭhigalā nārāja

lg.note: ākaśa mārgaku boli nārāja caḷī galā

lg.l: cachure na bājiṇa ye pāruśe lāgi galā | 507 |
tāhā se sarūpa boli bolai yugate
cihna barṇṇa nāhiṁ kanyā neba ho kemante | 509 |
dropade boile yebe dijabara lākha na binddhalā
māchara bāma cachuru kimpā puṣyamāḷi cchiḍiṇa paḍilā | 510 |
ākāśuṁ puṣya br̥ṣṭi helā ke ẏehā karipāriba micha | 512 |
brāhmaṇa lākha na binddhalā kemante ariba dropatī | 513 |
jarāsandha boilā tumbhe kicchihiṁ na jāṇa
nanda gauḍa pua kr̥ṣṇa ati hīna | 515 |
gauḍa kuḷe janma se aṭai baḍa manda | 516 |
agyāna gauḍa se gyāna tāra nāhiṁ
se yebe nārāẏaṇa āsuni mora āge
aṣṭādaśa beḷa dhāḍi deli juāiṁra rāge | 518 |
tāhā chara kathā kimpe ẏe sabhāreṇa kahi | 520 |
bhīṣme boile tu kimpe nindu nārāẏaṇa
pare marāibeṭi tote na māribe āpaṇa | 521 |
arjuna lakha binddhabāra ta niṣphaḷa hoilā | 522 |
mahā goḷa śabada ye śubhilā sabhāre
gobinda boile deba hasila kisa arthe
ki tote pāṇḍabe āṇile dhana dei
lākha na bindhu śaṅkha bāu tu kisa pāiṁ | 528 |
punarapi lākha bindhiba se bīra phālagunye | 530 |
duṣṭa rājāmāne goḷa ye karibe śatebāra
bhagata macchaḷī go khaṇḍu kinā asada apacaẏe | 534 |
tohora parasanne muṁ labhibi nija pati
arjuna boile go raha raha yighnasenī
anamite trodha kimpe karu re māninī | 538 |
yadyapi duṣṭe go karibe āja goḷa
ẏe mahālākha go binddhabi śate beḷa | 539 |
aneka haraṣa bāḷī hoilā tāra hr̥de | 540 |
ẏe ghānti ārabeḷe go binddhabi mahālākha
dhr̥ṣṭadr̥mana se ye kahanti puṇa puṇi | 545 |
thira hoi tumbhe lākhaku karibā naẏana
ẏeghānti lākha ye bindhu achai brāhmaṇa | 546 |
kareṇa dhanu dhari bīra arjuna āmañchi
bichārai bāsabi dhanure baḷa nāhiṁ kicchi | 548 |
baḷahāne yebe muṁ sumaribi mora dhanu
ẏe dhanu baḷahīna hoilā binddhabi ṭiki āne | 551 |
dhr̥ṣṭadr̥mana boilā abā muṁ karibi sanamata
ẏete boli dhr̥ṣṭadr̥mana sabhā madhye kahi
ẏe dhanure baḷa nāhiṁ āreka dhanure
ẏehā śuṇi arjuna bichāre mane guṇi
dusaha saṅkaṭa mote nārāẏaṇa bihileka āṇi | 556 |
lg.note: tohara āna sinā hoiba satyabrata” – ehāpae goṭie pothira<lb/>adhikā pāṭha –
ẏe kathā śuṇi arjuna bichārai mane

lg.l: bho pitā gāṇḍīma dhanu mote debā | 557 |
antarīche gāṇḍīma āṇi dile arjunara kara | 558 |
arjuna boilā ẏe dhanu thoibaiṁ kahiṁ
rājāẏe puṇa goḷa karibe ẏehā chāhiṁ | 560 |
ātreṣi arjuna ye dhailā beni dhanu | 561 |
arjuna binoẏi bhagata hoi śahasraku bandi | 563 |
catra bhedi machara bāma naẏane gaḷibu
dui dhanure arjuna dui śahasra dhari
talaku kalā dr̥ṣṭi uparaku kalā muṣṭi
dui lakṣa baḷi aṭai ye se beni dhanura | 569 |
sabhāra abhimāne arjuna kope śara sanddha
ḍāhāṇa cachu bāṭe nikiḷi rahigalā śara
āgyāṁ pramāṇe rahilā māchara bāma cachura | 572 |
āho paśupatra nārāja ye galā pachakati
mācha gheni rādhācatra bhūmire paḍai cchiḍi
āstāna sannidhye rājāṅka tchamureṇa yāiṁ paḍi | 574 |
tu ye nāsti kari bābu pātilu mahāgoḷa
bhīṣma droṇa ādi kari dekha he sakaḷa | 576 |
kareṇa ghenile śikhaṇḍī dhr̥ṣṭa ye dr̥mana
duje dekhāile nei jārāsandha rājara sannidhāna | 577 |
manabhedī nārāja māchara bāma cachure bhediacchi |
dekhi rājāgaṇamānaṅkara kicchi na phurai bāci | 578 |
trailokya kampilā pañchajanya śaṅkha śabadare kari | 579 |
miku baraṇa na kara go yighnasenī | 581 |
dhana āśe brāhmaṇa na ghenilā baraṇamāḷa | 583 |
debā yeteka se ratna karai mane bāñcchā | 585 |
sādhu dhanya brāhmaṇa ho jībana tohori | 587 |
yebaṇa lākha binddha na pārile trailokye
tu tāha jaẏa kalu lakṣe rājāra sanamukhe | 588 |
kuñjagaḷa ādhipati rājā māna ye gobinda
tāhāra sannidhaku āsibu tote āgyāṁ deicchi sānanda | 589 |
tu ta brāhmaṇa ho aṭu bhikṣābāsī
tohora tahuṁ kanyā yibeṭi baḷe gheni | 591 |
yete dhana icchā tote tete dhana debā
beherā māhāpātra paṇe tote debā śāḍhī
tuhi se pañcha kaṭake hoibu adhikārī | 593 |
ẏe kathāmāna mora na paśai karṇṇa | 594 |
āho mantrī śaṅkani tohora sabu kathā micha
muṁ pañcharājye adhikārī ẏe kathā pratyakṣa | 595 |
āja abaśya tumbhe āmbhara tule dvanda ye kariba
sāṅgrāma kale kehi jaṇe āja brati ye na yiba | 596 |
ẏesana kari tumbhaṅku nibongāṇa kalā bidhātā
pañchāḷa rājye ho tumbhara mr̥tyu samāgatā | 597 |
ābara dhanakai icchā yebe baḷilā tumbhara
bhānumatīki āna kāhāku dei dhana kāmya kara | 598 |
ẏesaneka bacana yahuṁ brāhmaṇa boilā ucca svare
bhūrisabongā gāṅgabe hasile nāsāre dei kare | 599 |
kṣatrī hoi sahibā ki ẏesaneka abhimāna | 600 |
samodra laṅgile ki rakṣa huai kūḷa
meru ṭaḷile ki pr̥thīki kāhiṁ thaḷa | 601 |
leñchanta gauroba kale ẏemanta kathā hoẏe | 602 |
ẏe chara bhikṣāśīki kimpe āmbhe dhana debā
brāhmaṇaku hābokā māri kanyā gheni yibā | 603 |
cauṣaṭhī bhāra gadā gheni dhāmaiṁ gāndhārīra tanu | 604 |
pratagyāṁ sāmaratha re re kāra kari mūrtti
dropatīki gheni ho yāa āmbha pura | 609 |
aśī sahasra yoddhā yaiṁ āborile tāhāku | 610 |
muhiṁ tora apāda ghenaiṁ kinā bābu
apasari yāa bābu ẏethe thile nāśa yibu | 612 |
bhāi mohora na sahibe ẏehikṣaṇi hoiba dvanda | 614 |
bhāimāne bhāñjibeṭi saṅge thibu tu ẏekā | 616 |
śarīra nāśa na kara muhiṁ anāstinī pāiṁ | 617 |
svāmī ẏekā prākarme kāhiṁ dhari hoai pr̥thī
ẏekā kaibrata ki samodra hoẏe manthi | 618 |
pabongta ṭaḷai ki ẏekā jaṇakara baḷe
bahuta kṣaẏa yāi ki ẏekā jaṇakara kopa kale | 619 |
ẏekā jaṇakara thile tīrtha nohe lekhā | 620 |
nāśayibu nā svāmī kāryya nohiba kacchi
kareṇa śahasra dhaile dhr̥ṣṭa ye dr̥mana | 622 |
mā go driyodhana pāmara ta satyaku na pāḷi | 623 |
satya na pāḷi ye laṁghucha pāpiṣṭha | 624 |
lg.note: ẏekā sarajananta–jaṇe hoi sr̥ṣṭahebā byaktiku kāhñre<lb/>gaṇanta nāhiñ |
lg.l: muhiṁ ye trodhe ta houacchi baikula
ẏe mohora lua tumbhagku hoiba ki bhala | 625 |
ẏe mohora śāpya pratakṣe tumbhaṅku paḍu
ẏehu svāmīṅkara hāthare kaurobanta kandha cchiḍu | 628 |
śuṇiṇa bāsabi ye paile mane trāsa
na puṇa dropatī bole tumbhara bongśa yāu nāśa | 629 |
ẏe mahāsatīra śāpa na yiba meṇṭaṇa
arjuna boile debī mohora bākya śuṇa | 631 |
tu ye boilu debī muku ẏekā
nidāgha baḷa dhaṁsilāṭi ẏekā nārāẏaṇa mr̥ti | 633 |
dhaṁsilā nāgabaḷa na kalā kicchi śaṅkā | 634 |
ẏekāẏe ākāśa gaṅgā āṇi buhāilā pr̥thī | 635 |
pherure dhailā acchi nabadīpa sindhu sāta | 636 |
ẏekā agasti ruṣi bāḷa binoda kheḍe
tu mote saṅghātuṇī na golani ẏekā
gabhīra samodre kāhiṁ deu kāṭhi yokhā | 640 |
pabaan gati yoddhāẏe aja aśvanta maṇḍi | 642 |
chokhāra turaṅga tule yoddhāẏe pāñcha lakṣa
haste dhanu dhari guṇa ṭaṅkāra kari
saturi saturi bhāra beni gada haste
yoddhā amanātya māne basile yāi rathe | 647 |
gaja ratha aśva yoddhā na yāi parikaḷi
paśupatra gadā mudugara chela catra kāti
dhāmare dhāmare māra bega bega sāji
re re kāra śabade uṭhile samasta rājāgaṇa | 652 |
anamitte dvanda tumbhe na kara brahmaṇaku
sāmanya prāẏeka tumbhe na maṇa tāhāku | 654 |
brāhmaṇa nohai se nārāẏaṇa bije kalā | 655 |
tumbhe tāhāku dūṣita kara kouṇasi mate | 656 |
ye se apaṇḍita mūrkha duṣṭa ye prakr̥ti
paṇḍitaṅka kathā se śrabaṇe na śuṇanti | 657 |
driyodhana boilā tuẏe na jāṇa ho kicchi
ākāśara jana yebe sarūpa kāhiṁ acchi | 658 |
sehu yehu biṣṇu śaṅkha catra gada kāhiṁ
hr̥dare ẏehāra ye śrībatsa cihna nāhiṁ | 659 |
gope janma hoi nanda suta bolāile | 660 |
jārāsandha ḍare paḷāi paśile dvārikā bhmabane | 663 |
kāhāra darpe ẏethu kanyā neu āja | 664 |
kete sāṁgrāma kariba ẏe brāhmaṇa baḷabantā
mohora chamuru kanyā kehu re niantā | 665 |
ẏete boli kopa kalā gāndhārīra suta
ẏeteka rājāmāne sāṁgrāmaku kara abā bhaẏe
oprodha gheni tumbhe caḷa sabong rāẏe | 668 |
dekhuṁ dekhuṁ baṇā kimpā andha parakāra | 669 |
dadarā chatā khaṇḍiā pāṇo{?}i harigobinda muṇi
tāhā charaku bola tumbhe kebaṇa digapāḷe | 671 |
dhara dhara māra māra paḍuacchi bobi
ratha gaja aśva pādānti kaḷanā na yāi
bherī mahurī tāḷa kaṁsāḷa muraja bājai | 674 |
śabada śabhilā śūnye thāṭha sāja sāja | 675 |
bhīma nakuḷa ye sahadeba achanti basi
āmbhara pratagyāṁ bhraṣṭa kari loḍai ke re | 678 |
kehu gaḍu kaporā ghenile bāma kare | 679 |
śr̥ba ḍāṅga prokṣaṇī ke bulāi kopabhare
khaṇantā karayaṣṭi gheni bipre bege dhāiṁ | 681 |
re re kāra kari brāhmaṇe māḍi paḍile tahiṁ | 682 |
śarīra kampante ye yujheṣṭhi debe chāhiṁ
kemanta he paṇḍāẏe tumbhe loḍa kinā yāi | 684 |

div.note: “māra māra boli dhāiṁle dvijabare” pādānta pare chapābahira<lb/>adhikā pāṭha–
anyāẏa kari kanyāku nebe yebe āja
kāḷe kāḷe āmbhemāne pāibā nā lāja |
māḍi paḍile brāhmaṇe dhari chatā bāḍi |
re re kāra kari ḍeiṁ paḍile brahmaṇe
kṣatriẏa kuḷare ambhe na rakhibā jaṇe |
kautuke dekhibā nā āmbhe ẏethe thāi |
kanyā neu jiṇi āji kṣatrīẏa kuḷaku |
bhīma kampai bātare rambhā patra jāṇi |

lg.l: yāiṁ loḍa ki bointe dhāiṁlā bhīmasene | 685 |
āgeṇa dekhilā ye tentuḷi beni br̥kṣa
baḷarāme boile tu dekha dekha jagannātha
gobinde boile svāmī dekha ho baḷarāma
beni br̥kṣa bulāi raṇe bije kalā bīra bhīma | 688 |
nr̥siṁha mūrati yehne hiraṇya bidāraṇa kāḷe
tambācatra jaṇi bhīmara bhramai beni ḍoḷe | 690 |
āre āre boli bhīma raḍiẏe chaḍilā
madhya bhmabana ki hāde leuṭi paḍalā | 692 |
pāñcha lakṣa yojana ye sagyamanī pura
āsana tejiṇa ye trāsile deba nāśakra | 693 |
kr̥ṣṇa boile yebaṇa br̥kṣa kare upāḍilā bhīma
se br̥kṣa ājhuṁ hoilā pāṇḍaba taru nāma | 694 |

div.note: punaśca kiñchita āgyāṁku bhīma loḍuthilā mane
yāa boluṁ uṭhi dhāiṁ gala tatakṣaṇe |
brāhmaṇe boile dvija ẏe kisa tumbhara
bipre boile marantu duṣṭa kṣatrī mūḍha |

lg.l: lalāṭe tāḍile nei beni kara goṭi | 695 |
śarīra kampante boile loḍu kere yāi
ẏetaka mātrake dhāiṁlā garjana nāda dei | 696 |
ābara āścaryya dekha kareṇa beni br̥kṣa
bhāinta māriba mora se rāga sumari | 698 |
bābu nakuḷa re yāa bega hoi
moho āna pāḍi bhīmaku yāi āṇa bāhuḍāi | 699 |
dhamaiṁ nakuḷa ye svāmīra gheni āgyāṁ
sehi puṇi beni br̥kṣa upāḍi dhāmaiṁ ati bega | 701 |
pratakṣe diśanti se ketu maṅgaḷara prāẏe | 702 |
yujheṣṭhi biṣāda hoile kapoḷe dei nija hasta
ẏekaru hoile dui duiru hoile tini
mañchaẏe buḍilā driyodhana āja yiba ki deha gheni | 704 |
andharājā goṭi mora āja anāsta hoiba | 705 |
bābu ẏe kathā na yogāi re mohora manaku
stirī chara pāiṁ kimpā māribā sodaraṅku | 706 |
bābu nohu nohu dropatī re āmbhara teṇe kāryya nāhiṁ
tu yāi sahadeba ẏe sabunti āṇa bāhuḍāi | 707 |
bābu tu ta dhārmika bhigyaṁbanta paṇḍita mantrī cūḍāmaṇi
sahodra māri ki bābu āṇimā ramaṇī | 708 |
nohai kinā se re stirī mātra chara
āmbhara śapata bābu re bege gheni āsa yāi
yujheṣṭhi bichāranti ẏe bāhuḍāi āṇima ẏehikṣaṇi | 711 |
ẏehāra bacana āmbhe na laṅghu bhāi chāri | 712 |
bhīma nakuḷa sahadeba dhaiṁle ati bege | 713 |
yujheṣṭhi boile ẏekā mbhe mandakr̥tya kalu
ẏekuṁ dui duiru tini tiniru hoile chāri
candra yehne līna yāi rāhura teja dekhi
śikhaṇḍī dhr̥ṣṭadr̥mana ye arjuna paruśe thile
na rahani paṇḍā he ghuñchiṇa bege āsa | 721 |
samodra potā hoi ki mūḷi pakāile
pabongta bhāñjanti ki ṭeḷā ye māile | 722 |
arjuna boile tumbhe rājāra kumara aṭa
rājya bhoga acchi pāiba kimpe kaṣṭa | 723 |
tumbhe ta rājakumara āmbhe aṭu brāhmaṇa jana
bhikṣāśī brāhmaṇa āmbhe jībanaku kisa āśa
pāilu ṣāṁgrāma āmbhe raṇe debuṁ jhāsa | 725 |
āre āre brāhmaṇa tora ẏeḍeka sāhasa
hatyā na bichāri muṇḍa moḍibi ẏehikṣaṇa | 729 |
lg.note: “maleheṁ jiṇimā nā bhmabana sañjībanī” pādānta pare chapā bahire<lb/>adhikā pāṭha–
dhr̥ṣṭādr̥mana boile go āsa yibā bege
kariba ki tumbhe satya bacana laṅghana |
ye binddhalā lākha jāṇa sehi mora bara
ehi mo jībana dhana mum dāsī tāhāra |
se male tāhāra saṅga maraṇa mohora
āu kāhim pāiṁ muhiṁ hibi tumbha ghara |
ẏe duṣṭa rājāẏe niki bāhānti puraku
mahiṁ kebe na chaḍibi ẏe dvijabaraku |

lg.l: re re kāra kari pache prabeśa pabanara tanaẏe | 730 |
dhuśāsanara gyāna nāhiṁ brāhmaṇa kati boli
āre are boli beni br̥kṣe bulāilā bhīme
piṭhi kati dhuśāsanaku piṭila garu tame | 732 |
yāiṇa prabeśa hoilā bhīma arjunara kati
dropatī boile gosāiṁ tumbhe śuṇimā paṇḍāẏe
ẏe paṇḍāẏe tumbhara kisa hoanti mahāpracaṇḍa kāẏe | 735 |
ẏe āmbhara jyeṣṭha bhrātha śuṇasi yighnasenī | 736 |

bipadara kāḷe āmbhanta ṭhāba dilā catrī
mukata hoiba nā āmbhara bibhā dekhi | 205 |
sabhiẏeṁ ẏeka hoi leuṭanti boli bāṭa nirodhile | 207 |
dohitā goṭi dei samarpi hoilā āmbhaṅku | 208 |
chālachāla svāmi āmbhe nija bhmabanakai yibā
pāñchāḷa deśa rājāra doṣa na dharibā | 211 |
yujheṣṭhi boile āmbhe āṭu ye bhikhārī
āmbhanta deba boliki dropada sañchile kumārī | 213 |
keśainī boilā muṁ jāṇai ẏethira bhāba
tmbhanta bujhai muhiṁ pañchu ye pāṇḍaba | 214 |
dropada rājāku yebe droṇe dhari nele
dropada boile mote debā dohitā ẏeka goṭi | 217 |
kanyā goṭiẏe tumbhe upujāiṁ dia dropadaṅku | 219 |
śikhaṇḍī dhr̥ṣṭadr̥mana se jāta hoile āga | 220 |
pāṇḍabe jadura ghare dahana hoile śubhilāka dhuni | 221 |
byāsaṅku pachārile yesane kale kathā phuṭa
ẏe lākha ye binddhaba debaiṁ tāhāre dohitā | 223 |
yāhā bāñcchilā dropada tāhā se pailā | 225 |
āmbhe pāṇḍabe boli tu jāṇilu kemante | 226 |
ketukā nāma ẏehāra ādi satya yugare | 227 |
janme janme muṁ ẏehār aparibārī aṭai
tr̥tīẏa janame ẏe aṭai śacī debī
muhiṁ se priẏambadā ẏehāra caraṇe sebi | 231 |
caturtha janame ẏe dropatī rūpe abatari
keśinī nāma mohora muṁ janme janme bhr̥tyakārī | 232 |
tumbhe pāñchaindra sinā aṭa ẏeka mūrati
muṁ tmbhanta jāṇi acchini tmbhe janme janme pati | 233 |
aneka janmara katha yahuṁ kahilā keśinī
yujheṣṭhi boile tu ta pūjāku yogya māni | 234 |
kanyāku gheni se paṇḍu pañchu putre
se kanyā dekhi bichāranti deba dharme
lākha bnddhalā arjuna bari na dilā jyeṣṭha anutrame | 237 |
bhīmasena bichārai arjuna abā lākha binddhalā
muṁ yebe sāṅgrāma na kari hoanti tunī
arjuna chara darpe ki ānantā yighnasenī | 241 |
arjuna ẏe kathā abā laṅghiba kemante | 242 |
yugate yebe mote na debe kumārī
sāṁgrāme chāriheṁ ta nohanti mote sari
pāñchāḷīki gheni rahiri pache hiḍimbikī bana purī | 244 |
mote se niśce bariba śarada candramukhī | 245 |
mote se prāpata hoiba ye dropada dulaṇī | 246 |
yujheṣṭhi boile āmbhe lobha karibṁ kesane | 247 |
āmbhara lobha kale hoiba bahuta manda
sodare kaḷaṅka lāgiba hoiba baḍa dvanda | 248 |
saẏaṁbara kanyā gheni prabeśa kurāḷaśāḷa dvāra | 250 |
mā go pāṇi kaḷasāẏe debā pāda śauca karibā
kointāẏe boile kisa prapata hoilā re bābā | 251 |
yujheṣṭhi boile tumbhe śuṇasi go maẏe
prāpata hoilā baḍa susañcha phaḷa goṭāẏe | 252 |
mātā boile yebe prāpata ẏeka phaḷa goṭi
pāñcha bhāi yāka tumbhe bhmañja bābu bāṇṭi | 253 |
yesaneke āgyāṁ dile se parama aparṇṇā
tumbhara āgyāṁ āmbhanta pāṣāṇa rekha sinā | 254 |
bhīmasena boilā mā go se sate nohai phaḷa
lākha binddha āṇilu go dropada dulāḷa | 255 |
tumbhe sādhu putra mora bacana na kara āna | 256 |
yujheṣṭhi boile mā go ẏehi se yugati
kemante bulanti go bhikṣā pātra gheni | 259 |
keśinī boila gosāmaṇī jāṇili ẏehāṅkara basā
rājāra agrate mum bārata karaiṁ yāiṁ
dropada bhmadanaku se bahana hoiṁ caḷi | 263 |
kumbhāra śāḷare pāuṁśa śeyyā goṭiẏeka kale
tāhāṅkara pādataḷe pauṁśa śeyyā goṭiẏe pāḍi
tahiṁra upare yujheṣṭhi deba ye pahuḍi | 265 |
tāhāṅkara padtaḷe pāuṁśa śeyyā chāri goṭi
tahiṁra upare pahuḍile bhīma nakuḷa sahadeba kibīṭī | 266 |
kointāẏe boile go sehiṭhare śoa dropatī | 267 |
chāra śeyyā dekhi se dropadara dohita
bho daiba boli se kapāḷe dilā hātha | 268 |
kointāẏe boile go bhikṣāśī mohora poẏe
tohora karame ẏehānta pāilu go māẏe | 269 |
yāhā araji mātā tāhā snā bhmañji
sampada bipada mā go saṅsārara majhi | 270 |
bho daiba puruṣa mohora kapāḷe ẏehā se acchu lekhi | 271 |
tahiṁre upare karpūra guṇḍi sebatī pākhuḍi | 273 |
kemante śoibi muṁ pāuṁśa śeyyā upara | 274 |
bho daiba puruṣa mote ẏehā kalu āṇi | 276 |
ẏe chara pāuṁśa uḍi paḍile dinakara sukr̥ta yāi
ẏehā māḍi gale āsya śrīhāni hoai | 277 |
muhim parama māheśvarī śarīre gyāna thāuṁ thāuṁ
ẏe bhasma śeyyāre śoibi muṁ āra kāhuṁ | 278 |
boila dropatī go na śua kāhiṁpāiṁ | 279 |
ẏe duṣṭa brāhmaṇa goṭi na puṇa mote māri | 280 |
dekhi catra bhāra ye tamyā kaporā
urā gaḍu pīḍhā ye sīmasthāne sabu ḍerā | 282 |
dadarā chatā cirā pāṇo{?}i harigobinda muṇi
bho daiba puruṣa tu pāpa puṇya na bichāru
stirī boli kari janama kimpe karu | 286 |
āna rājā hoi yebe mote pāāntā
mathāra upare basai mote ghare niantā | 287 |
anteṇa hoili muṁ ẏehāṅkara padataḷaku yogī | 288 |
lg.note: na chāhuṁ dropatī go na śua kāhiṁ pāi–dropadī na chāhuṁ, na chāhānte<lb/>bhīma boilā, he dropatī | tumbhe kāhiñki śounāhañ | epari<lb/>pāṭha acchi |
lg.l: dropatīra śocanā hāde kahia ki pāri
rājāra nandinī se biśeṣe bāḷuta kumārī | 289 |
bikaḷe pahuḍilā se bhīmare trāsa kari
puṇa puṇa dropatī nārāẏaṇa nārāẏaṇa sumari | 290–21120 |
lg.head: {@dropadīra pūbongjanma kathā@}

lg.l: kāryya na paili dhaṁsi hoi mali | 2 |
pratyakṣe lākha binddhale se brāhmaṇa goṭi
yebaṇa goḷa se kale duṣṭa rājāẏe
mohora kalā kr̥ta ābara kāhāku doṣa diẏe | 4 |
ke keṇe māilā se brāhmaṇa goṭiki
aneka rodana karai se bhūmireṇa paḍi | 7 |
mā go kāḷaka praṭipaḷi tote muṁ ẏebe hoili biarthī | 8 |
ke prāṇe māilā kebā keṇiki gheni galā
poḍu mora deha mote kimpe maraṇa nohilā | 9 |
loḍa ki nā bābu āre brāhmaṇaṅkara barṇṇa cihna | 10 |
goḷabeḷe abā se keṇe thānti luci
bhaẏe paḷāiluṁ āmbhe na galā bipra ghuñchi | 11 |
tāhāra tule kinā raṇa yagyaṁ na kalu
dropatīra pāiṁ kimpe sabhiẏe na maluṁ | 12 |
dekhile aneka rājā yoddhā chanti pāḍi | 14 |
rakate tripaṇḍa hoi paḍichanti raṇa thāṭe | 15 |
brahmāṇḍa uchuḷu acchi ḍāki ḍambaru nāde | 17 |
ke byāghra ke siṁha ke śārddoḷa bāhinī
mahā niśā kāḷe rakata māẏeṁse bheḷā
to rūpa talaẏe mā go uddhara sabongmaṅgaḷā | 23 |
se naba koṭi kāntānī caraṇe mora sebā
kebaṇa ṭhābe abā goye thānti basi | 27 |
āstāna ādi kari caubiṁśa yojana pariyante | 28 |
loḍi na pāile se dropadara chāṭe
śikhaṇḍī boilā ẏe aṭai aṇauhāḍa thāna
śatr̥ marddi suste niścinte acchi śoi | 32 |
dvādaśa tāḷa uparaku sañchā chaḍi uḍai | 33 |
śikhaṇḍī boilā bābu na yibā tahiṁra pāśa
bhaẏeṇa kumāre na gale tāhāṅkara kati
bho tāta aneka dūra galu āmbhe gami
dropatī brāhmaṇaṅkara ye nāhiṁ barṇṇa cihna
mā go adāra ayoni jāta agnikumārī
mora hr̥dara kathā kahibi kāhā āga
śarīra bisarjibi go na heu śoka yoga | 41 |
laramto rodana se purara samasta kāminī
samaste thira hoi bolanti ẏeta thilā saṅgatare | 43 |
keśinī boilā tumbhe chaḍa śoka cintā | 44 |
tāhanta goḷa yahuṁa kale kuru bīre
beni br̥kṣa upāḍi dhariacchi beni hāthe
br̥kṣa bulāi pabana gati kari piṭi
ratha gaja aśva paḍile bhumi loṭi | 49 |
br̥kṣe br̥kṣe se kare chanti gheni | 50 |
se trāse pāḷāilā ẏe aile tāhāra ratha gheni | 51 |
aneka ratna ye maṇḍilā acchi rathe
lakṣe rājākai se brāhmaṇa chāri jaṇe
tahanta nāhiṁ deba paḍile yete raṇe | 54 |
yetebeḷe sāṅgrāma kale rukmaṇa bāṇāsura saambara bajralābha
rathe rathe gaje gaje piṭile deba dhari
ẏekā ghāntike kachāḍanti aśva chāri chāri | 56 |
bhāji paḷāile rājāẏe na rahile kehi
pañchadaśa yojana pariyante rudhira nadī bahi | 57 |
lakṣe rājā darpa se marddile chārijaṇe | 58 |
ẏehāṅkara sanya deba asaṅkṣepa kari māri
ẏe pañcha rājānta deba āṇile keśa dhari | 60 |
sehi basithile deba dakṣiṇa pañchu maṇḍoāẏe | 61 |
se chāri paṇḍāẏe ye gaḍaghāli śoi | 62 |
baḍa dhārmika bibeka se baḍa daẏābanta
boile chaḍidia māri kisa arjibā ẏehānta | 63 |
lg.note: sehi basithile deba dakṣiṇa jagatī chaẏā maṇḍoāẏe |

lg.l: āgyāṁ pramāṇe deba chaḍi dile tāhānta | 64 |
beni jānu taḷare deba dile tāhānta gaḷai
samasta rājāṅku ẏe śāsti kahaṇā na yāi | 65 |
tu mohora mātā go tohora apāda ghenai muhiṁ
ẏebe tu semānanta go chaḍi ailu kāiṁ | 67 |
ẏe mohora bacana deba śuṇimā sābadhāna | 68 |
āmbhanta ghenigale se brāhmaṇa pāñcha bīre
svāmī aneka binoẏi muṁ kahili tāhāṅku
icchā kale deba trailokya pāranti se gami
icchā na kale deba se meruhuṁ acaḷa svāmī | 71 |
bho deba gosāmaṇī mote āgyāṁ dileka rāi
boile pitāṅku mohora gheniāsa bege yāiṁ | 72 |
na puṇ adekhi na pāri se caḷanti śūnya pathe | 73 |
śikhaṇḍī boilā deba brāhmaṇa tahiṁ nāhiṁ
kebaṇa dānabe deba achanti tahiṁ śoi | 74 |
sannidhaku na galu deba rākṣasaṅka bhaẏe | 75 |
antara hoi dekhiba se brāhmaṇa ki daite | 77 |
bhaẏeṇa dūra hoi rahile beni bhāi | 79 |
tunī kari hākārilā dekha ho brāhmaṇe | 81 |
tāhāṅkara pāda taḷe brāhmaṇeka śaẏana kari | 82 |
tāhāṅkara pāda taḷe śoichanti brāhmaṇa chāri goṭi
pāuṁśa guḍaẏe pāḍi śoichanti nāhiṁ karpaṭi | 83 |
mā go kebaṇa pataka kalu pauchu ẏeḍe śāst | 84 |
ratna beluri khaṭa netara supāti jāti pākhuḍi
tahiṁ tohora kāẏā goṭi hoai ragaḍi | 85 |
se śayyāra upare tāhā siñchanti tini oḷi | 86 |
bhikṣāśī brāhmaṇa ki ẏe asura kamarūpī
keśinī boilā tumbhara ẏe maribāra buddhi
pabongta paḍi cūra huatni ẏehāṅkara kāẏe
chāla ho gheni āsibā yāiṁ dropada rājāṅku
dropada āsi dehintu tāhāṅkra duhitā kaṣṭaiṁ | 93 |
kanyā goṭi gheni ẏe paḷāi āsile gaḷi
ẏethe luci rahile uhaḍa thāna boli | 94 |
dadarā chatā cchiṇḍā pāṇo{?}i harigobinda muṇi
janmeṇa pātaka kariacchi ẏe mora bhaẏeṇī | 95 |
baḍaku nindā kale āpaṇāku hoai sala | 96 |
pādeṇa lakṣmī tumbhe palāa kisa arthe
maribāra buddhi ye pātile beni bhrāthe | 97 |
debatānta nindā kale narke hoai jāta
brāhma nindā kale bongśa hoai nipāta | 98 |
tapī nindā kale śarīra hoẏe kṣati
napuṁsaka hoi puruṣa nindā kale satī | 99 |
mātā pitā nindā kale paḍai paramāda | 100 |
pāṭha guru nindā kale prāpata nohai bindyā
bātuḷa hoi bulai ye nindai yogasiddhā | 101 |
na jāṇi nindā karanti ye baida yogī
janme janmeṇa se hoithāi sadā rogī | 102 |
kṣatrīṅki nindā ye karai na jāṇi
rāja daṇḍe aprādhi se abaśya hoai hāṇi | 103 |
śahasra nindā kale na miḷai kṣatrībidhi
śāhāsra nindā kale huai gaḷita koṣṭha byādhi | 104 |
lakṣmī nindā kale daridra huai janme janme
bhāratī nindā kale gajamūrkha janma anutrame | 105 |
ouṣadha nindā kale roga hoai apāra | 106 |
goru nindā kael hāni hoaiṭi kr̥ṣi
putra nindā kale ye huanti niaṁśī | 107 |
tumbhe ye mahata ẏe brāhmaṇa śasradhārī
gyānabanta hoi kimpe pare nindā kari | 109 |
tumbhe ye paḷāila muhiṁ dehili beni cachu
kumare prabeśa āsi hoile pitāṅka chamura | 112 |
janme daridra bhikṣāśī brāhmaṇa pāñcha bāpuḍā
ẏe māghamāsa śīta pāuṁśa śayyā pāḍita nāhiṁ bāsa
tu mahā saẏambara deba karāilu abā
tāhāra karma goṭi ke āna karibā | 116 |
lg.note: dhānya nindā kale na upujai kr̥ṣi |
niaṁśī–niraṁśī, bongśahīna abasthā | 111|1 saṅbujhāiṇa–samyak bhābe<lb/>bujhāibā | 114|2 dhūsurā–pāṁśūbarṇṇa, maḷina, dhūsarabarṇṇa |

lg.l: māā rāṇḍeka śoiacchi deba kumbhāra pāuṁśara
kanyā goṭi gheni se ḍare yāiṁ luciṇa achanti | 121 |
ẏe moḍhī keśinī ye baḍa anāchārī
dhana kicchi ẏehāku yebe leñcha loka deba
dropada boile re śuṇa putra beni
tumbhe kimpe nindā kala re mudusulī keśinī | 124 |
āre ana rājā hoi yebe mo duhitāku pāāntā
tāhāṅkara pādataḷaku yebe yogya mohora kumārī
dropatīra bhāgya mohora bongśara baḍa puṇya
bābu dekhi mukata hoilā re rājya jana mohora
bahana kari mora pure ucchaba kara | 128 |
lg.note: pādānta pare pothi biśeṣare adhikā pāṭha –
ābara saṅgate achanti putra beni | (abaśiṣṭa para pr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: puanta tumbhara go toḷa kinā māẏe
āpaṇe bije kari āsanti dropadeśvara rāẏe | 132 |
kointāẏe yujheṣṭhi bhīma arjuna nakuḷa sahadebaṅku toḷi
se catrī bhāriyā dropatīṅki snāhāna karāi | 135 |

lg.note: maṅgaḷa dhuni kari caḷai sabong thāṭha
āsa ho dhāti kāre muṁ karibi baraṇa |

lg.l: aṣṭapāṭabongśī nāẏikānta āṇile yujheṣṭhiṅka bibhā dekhibā nimante | 140 |
garuḍa na sahai ye baḷadebaṅkara bhāra | 141 |
chapana koṭi yadu yādaba bīra tule
bhīma arjuna nakuḷa sahadeba chāri praḷambita śrīpuruṣaṅka uttame | 144 |
ṣāṭhiẏe sahasra śiṣya gheni bijaẏe byāsa maharuṣi | 146 |
lakṣe śiṣya gheni uddāḷaka sumantaka baśiṣṭha biśvāmitre
sahasre bālakhilyā gheni mārakaṇḍa bālamika lomaśa sahite | 148 |
yujheṣṭhiṅka bibāha ucchabe āsi prabeśa yāganike | 149 |
samasta ruṣimāna gheni nārāẏaṇa bije kale yahuṁ

lg.note: hr̥ṣi keśī sthānare ruṣikeśī pāṭha dekhāyāe |

lg.l: kubera aneka rutna aḷaṅkāra kāḍhilā bhaṇḍāru | 153 |
samaste bije kale ye kurāḷaśāḷa pāśe | 154 |
tahiṁ ratna bhmabana goti sañchile debatāẏe
agasti boile śuṇa ho manu puruṣa
yetebeḷe dropata saẏambara bidhāna kalā prakāśa | 157 |
lakṣe rājāṅku se lakṣe bhmabana kalā
pāṇḍabaṅkara nāma se sabhāre na paḍilā | 158 |
dropata rājya antareṇa tribeṇī nadī sannidhāna | 160 |
se bhmabana rakṣā karai karuṇākara bidyādhara
asura bhaẏe hoile tahiṁ lucai purandara | 161 |
ākāśaku adr̥śya se antarīcha bhmabana aṭai
purandara agyāṁẏe tahiṁ nīḷā ratna ghaṭai | 162 |
amara biḷāsuṇī ẏe ẏehāra nāma ruṣitā
jāḷa agni hāṇḍi tu ẏemāna thibu satchi
amara bhmabanaku ẏe nitye dyanti dhāḍi | 167 |
se bārasvatī bhmabana diśai kurāḷaśāḷa praẏe | 171 |
mukutā cūri tahiṁ karpūra guṇḍi siñchi
se ratna karpūra guṇḍi diśai kumbhāra pāuṁśa parāẏe | 173 |
tāhāṅkara gopya sarilā se udita hoile | 175 |
byāse pucchākale svāmī śuṇimā śrī bāsudebe
dropatīki pradāna hoibe pañchu ye pāṇḍabe | 177 |
dropada kisa bolibe se ẏehāṅka bacana śuṇi
ratnabāsa aḷaṅkāra gheni ailā dropatīṅki alekha tiḷaka kariba boli | 293 |
sūtrakāra mānanta rāi āgyāṁ dile nr̥para
dakṣiṇa dvāruṁ kurāḷaśāḷaku boli chāẏāmaṇḍopa kara | 184 |
sabong sañchita rājā ye aṭai dropada
dekhilā deba sabhā prāẏe diśai pūrichaiṁ saini | 187 |
dropatī boile tu śuṇa go keśinī
mohora pitā mātāra lo jībana dhani dhani | 188 |
kaṇaẏa nirmāṇa lo aṭai ẏe bhmabana
dropadara mana biḍibāku ẏehiṭhāre gopya hoile | 191 |
lg.note: sehi madhya gopya hele kehi na cihnanti |
lg.l: pāuṁśa yeuṁṇa bho se karpūrara guṇḍi
ẏehu khaṇḍa khaṇḍa ye diśuacchi khaparā
ẏemāne sabu hāde go subarṇṇa kaporā | 193 |
pitāra āgre mora kaha yāiṁ dhāti
brāhmaṇa prāẏe bujhi na puṇa bolai anīti | 194 |
keśinī boilā mote ẏemāna kimpe kahu
ẏete ṭhāba thāuṁ ẏetheṁ kimpe ye rahile
manda ṭhāba boli saẏambara kāḷe kehi ẏethaku naile | 198 |
bāhāre thāi ḍāka dianti dropadeśvara rāẏe
bābhiẏe bāhāra hoi ās kinā lakha bindhā paṇḍāẏe | 200 |
garuhaṁsī paṇe na śuṇanti dropada rājāra bola
yoddhāẏe bolanti ẏe bipre aṭanti abā kāla | 201 |
rājāra chāra gaṇe aṭanti baḍa duṣṭa

lg.note: ẏete ṭhāba thāuṁ kimpe kurāḷaśāḷe śuanti |
bāhāra dvāre thāiṁ bhāḷanti dropada rājana |
bābhiẏe–śvaśurara jāmātā prati o jāmātāra śvaśura prati sammāna sūcaka sambhodhana |

lg.l: bākya śuṇa kinā kisa bolanti dropadeśvara rāẏe | 204 |
arjuna boile svāmī muṁ yibaiṁ keuṁṇa mate
gale dropadeśvara abaśya baraṇa kariba mote | 205 |
sābadhāne śuṇimā se ājñā diai ki ki
yujheṣṭhi boile se rāile lākhabindhā paṇḍāku
āmbhe kisa uttara ye kahibā tāhāṅku | 207 |
āmbhanta pachāriba tumbhe lākha binddhala ṭiki
hoi boli āsiba ki āmbhara mithyā bāki | 208 |
bhīmasena boilā tumbhe na yāa na yāu bīra pātha
ḍāka dei teṇe hoileni bimbhakha dropadeśvara nātha | 209 |
kisa bolai dropada śuṇaiṁ kinā bāki | 210 |
ẏeka mr̥tti hoi bāhāra hoile āgasari | 212 |
pādya arghya dei pūjā kalāka pādataḷa | 213 |
bābhiẏe keuṁṇa paṇḍāẏe tumbhe lākha binddhalaṭi
kāhāku pradāna karibi mohora duhitā goṭi | 214 |
yujheṣṭhi deba boile āmbhe pañcha bhrātha
pāñchaṅkari hoi āmbhara ẏeka ātmā goṭi | 216 |
dropada boile ẏe ye stirī ratnakānti
yujheṣṭhi deba boile āmbhara ẏemanta bebhāra
ẏekā dropatīki āmbhe pañcheheṁ aṭu bara | 219 |
kara he nr̥pati tora acchi yebe kāryya
ẏe pāñchaṅku ẏe kanyā pradāna karibu ye āja | 220 |
durddhaṁsa bacana boile dhr̥ṣṭa ye dr̥mana | 221 |
śikhaṇḍī boilā tumbhe bhikṣāsi jana aṭa
saṅcaẏe jāṇilu tumbhe janmahuṁ aṭa naṣṭa | 222 |
ẏeka puruṣaku ye yugate pañchu kanyā
lokita karmaku diśilā tumbhara bākya hīnā | 225 |
puruṣāmānaṅku ẏe kathā nuhai nā śakya | 226 |
beḷuṁ beḷa dropadeśvara kahuacchi bākya caḷi
śate sahasra daṇḍa praḷambita byāsaṅka padmapāẏe | 230 |
droapdeśvara boile tumbhara ye daẏā mote sabongkāḷe
jāṇiṇa aila svāmī mote kaṭāḷara beḷe | 231 |
āpaṇe tumbhe tule gheni daśa sahasra muni
ẏe brāhmaṇa goṭi lākha binddhalā abaraṇe
ṣāṭhiẏe lakṣa grantha kala ye nirjite
ẏekā stirīki kāhiṁ pañcha bhrathā acchi ki tohora śāsre yugate | 245 |
byāse boile bābu śuṇa ho dropata
tohora duhitāku pañchabhrathā acchi pūbongra likhita | 246 |
śuṇa sābadhane tote kahuṁ pūbongra ādi kathā | 237 |
ananta śayyāre bije deba tāhā aṅga | 239 |
nāhiṁ svarga nāhiṁ mañcha nāhiṁ ye pātāḷa
pr̥thī āpa teja bāẏu ākāśa nāhiṁ ye sakaḷa | 240 |
deba dānaba yakṣa kinnara ādi kari
nāgaloka ābara jaṅgama kīṭa pataṅga samasta praḷaẏadhārī | 241 |
nāhiṁ candra nāhiṁ sūryya nahiṁ ye pabana
nāhiṁ dibā nāhiṁ rātra nāhiṁ sandhyā abakāśamāna | 242 |
dakṣiṇaku śira kari mahāsarpa achai śoi
ẏete praḷaẏa pāṇi tāra garbhaku na aṇṭi | 243 |
se sarpa phaṇāre deba dei sīmathāna
anādi aparṇṇā se samasta jāta kari | 245 |
satyayuga satara lakṣa aṭhāisi sahasra baraṣa
runapāda ẏe chārilakṣa batiśa sahasra baraṣa | 246 |
tretaẏā yuga bāralakṣa chaẏāṇoi sahasra baraṣa
runapāda tini lakṣa cabiśa sahasra baraṣa | 247 |
dvāpara yuga āṭhalakṣa cauṣṭhi sahasra baraṣa
runapāda dui lakṣa ṣoḷa sahasra baraṣa | 248 |
kaḷiyuga chāri lakṣa batiśa sahasra baraṣa
ẏetekāḷa hoile indra debatā yāi nāśa | 251 |
indra nāśa gale pitāku hoai ẏeka dine
ẏehimate brahmāku aṣṭauttara śate baraṣa lekhane | 252 |
rudra nāśa gale ādityaṅku huai dine
aṣṭauttara śata baraṣe āditya hoẏe līne | 255 |
śateka āditya gale candraṅku huai dine
aṣṭauttara śata baraṣe candra huai nidhane | 256 |
ẏehi mate śate aṣṭauttara baraṣe candrahiṁ nāśayiba
candrahiṁ nāśagale biṣṇuṅku ẏeka dibasa hoiba | 257 |
pr̥thī āpa teja bāẏaba ākāśa samasta yāi kṣaẏe | 259 |
tāhāra nidrā gale kicchihiṁ na thāiṁ
dibasahiṁ yete kāḷa rātrahiṁ tete kāḷa hoi | 260 |
puṇi ude karābanti śrī nārāẏaṇa cachu beni | 261 |
pañchadaśa brahmā jaḷaru upujile śūnya bhedi | 263 |
puṇa ude karānti śrī nārāẏaṇara kāẏe
se dhātubādya puruṣaṅku hoilā jaḷa āṇṭhu āẏe | 264 |
se anādi nārī ye māgilā ādhāra
bākyadebī boile pañchadaśa brahmāṅku tu māra | 267 |
ke tu boḷi boileka yahuṁ ādinārī
cauda brahmā māilā cauda sahasra baraṣe
rudhira māẏeṁsa se āpyāna kalāka santoṣe | 270 |
śūdreka brahmāṅku dhari nuāri pache goḍāilā
paḷāi śūdreka bolai nārāẏaṇa trahi trāhi
biṣṇu nātha boile go raha raha āẏī | 274 |
ketukā boilā ẏe mohora nija bhakṣa
muhiṁ triputi hoibi tumbhe kimpe ẏehā rakha | 275 |
biṣṇu boile ābara brahmāmāne mohora gale kāhiṁ
dhabaḷāṅgī boile svāmī jībite kehi nāhiṁ | 276 |
mote ramite icchā kale tumbhera nidrākāḷe
rāge ketukā muṁ jāta kali beni ḍoḷe | 277 |
āgyāṁ deli ketukāẏe ẏehānta sabukui bhakṣa
ẏe moḍhā baḍāi duṣṭa ẏehānta kimpe rakha | 278 |
śrī nārāẏaṇe boile śaraṇa paśilā āmbhanta yebe
samaẏeka rakha ẏehāku bhakṣa dvāpara yuge | 279 |
satya antare hoiba tretaẏā yuga bhoga | 281 |
ẏe śūdraka brahmā dhuśāsana rūpe abatāra | 282 |
ẏe ketukā janma hoiba dropatī rupa hoi
ẏe ketukā helā yahum brahmāṅkara bairi
cauda brahmā khāilāni muṇḍa moḍi kari | 284 |
ẏe śūdraka brahmāra kopa ẏehāku sabongkāḷe
ẏehāra keśa dhari neba kauroba sabhātaḷe | 285 |
bhmaja opāḍi ẏehāra mathāre niuḍiba rudhira | 287 |
se rudhira pāna kariṇa hoiba triputi | 288 |
śuṇa ho dropadeśvara ẏe anādi siddhakathā
ẏe hāde dropatī ẏe hāde bhīmasena
ẏehā śuṇi dropada ye byāsaṅku pucchākalā
tretaẏā yuga ẏe puṇi kāhiṁ puhāilā | 291 |
byāse boile śuṇa ho dropada nr̥pati | 292 |
hemabanta taḷe māḷatī nāmeṇa ye nadī
se dine gāẏatirī āsanti gaṅgāku pāṇi heri
nirañjana pañchu ātmā pañchu ṣaṇu hoi
ẏekā gāīki goḍāi achanti pañchu ṣaṇu
pāñchakaiṁ āśā dekhāi karuacchi laṇḍa bhaṇḍa | 299 |
yebaśa ṣaṇuku tāra icchā ye hoiba
ẏe pāñchakaiṁ āśā acchi ye dekhāi
boile mātāra ẏe na yogāi yugati | 302 |
boile tu mane bikr̥ta dhailu go ẏekabaḷā | 304 |
bho īśvara dr̥ṣṭire dekhi bikr̥ti dhailu mane
tu ẏehāra bhrātha hoi janmibu dhr̥ṣṭa ye dr̥mane | 305 |
tu ye ẏekabaḷā mane dhailu bikr̥ti
dropatī rūpe jāta hua tora hou pañchupati | 306 |
tāhāra dr̥ṣṭi paḍile ye dahai saṅsāra | 309 |
ḍareṇa tāhāra kanyā diantā kehi nāhiṁ
daśalakṣa baraṣa se acchi abibhāi hoi | 310 |
āmbhara śaniścaraku debu tora dohitā kr̥ttikābatī | 312 |
debi mohora dohitā nirañjanaku satya manāilā | 313 |
svāmī ẏekabarṇṇi pāṭoḷi basra pañchāruna koṭi
duhitā ku ghoḍāuthibu na paḍiba tahiṁ śaniścara dr̥ṣṭi | 314 |
se basra teje śaniścaraṅka ātraṣaṇa hoibāka śānti
debaiṁ kanyā mohora hoilā sati sati | 315 |
dekhile ẏekabarṇṇa pāṭoḷi basra nāhiṁ anya ṭhābara | 316 |
pañchāruna koṭi pāṭoḷi basra māḍi basiacchi ẏekabaḷā pābongtī
āditya, ẏekabaḷā pābongtīṅki bahuta kale tusti
binaẏa dekhi prasanna hoile ẏekabaḷā pābongtī | 319 |
tu ye siddhadebī mora putraku karibu sadaẏe | 321 |
ẏeteka paile anaḷasena deba duhitā goṭi | 322 |
ẏe basre nārāẏaṇa acchi bahuta kāryya | 323 |
ẏe basra debi tohora kāṭāḷara beḷe | 324 |
se kāḷare basra deba māgibaiṁ tote | 327 |
chapana koṭi basra mote debu tu tulāi | 328 |
karatāra bo;ile hoilā mohora satya satya
māgi pañchāna koti basra nele dinakaranātha | 329 |
bibhāra kāḷe basra ghoḍāile kanyāra tahiṁ | 330 |
rakta basre dr̥ṣṭi dei śani hele śānti | 331 |
se basra saṁharile nei rathara upara | 332 |
śuṇa ho dropada bolanti muni byāse
tr̥tīẏa abatāre ẏe śacī rūpa dhari
indra debatāku pradāna kala sepuṣkara rājana
achaẏe pāṭabongśī basila se amara svargathāna | 335 |
daśa lakṣa baraṣa pariyante se bāsaba manohārī
śuṇa ho baibasua manu badaẏanti agasti
dāsarathara putra ye aṭai manuratha nāma
beda śāsra purāṇe jāṇi dutī brahma | 342 |
se dina tvaṣṭāratha amara svargaku gale
bāsaba debatā tāṅku basite na boile | 344 |
āre br̥ttra ! tu yāiṁ rudraṅku sebā kara
īśvara debatāṅku sebā kari basa amara svargapura | 346 |
tvaṣṭāra āgyāṁ pāi se br̥ttra mahāruṣi
kapoḷāsa kandaraku se bije bāḷa śiṣi | 347 |
āna kicchi na jāṇai se ye bāḷasuta
rātra beni ghaḍi thāuṁ yāithā ẏe gaḍi | 349 |
śiba śiba boli sumaru thāi anubrate
mahā garaḷa jvāḷā lāgi sehu bāḷa
umā boile svāmī śiba sebā ẏemanta
tumbhaṅku sebā kari nāśa galā ẏe bāḷuta | 356 |
ẏe putra goṭiki karibā svargapure rājā | 357 |
ẏe putra goṭi nia tu yaśobantapurī | 358 |
tohora tahuṁ bhalaṭhābe thoibu nei dhātā | 359 |
mr̥tupiṇḍa goṭi nei basāile mana pabana daṇḍe
putra gheni prabeśa hoile yaśobantī brahmāṇḍe | 360 |
sadāśiba āgyāṁ tote ẏehāku bhalaṭhābe thoasi | 361 |
mr̥tu piṇḍa goṭi ghenigale sr̥ṣṭi karatā
nija prāṇa dei jiāṁile deba dhātā | 362 |
mohora tahuṁ bhala ṭhābe amarapura sinā yugata | 363 |
br̥ttra maharuṣiṅki indra pade basāa nārada | 364 |
indraṅku kahile tohora tahuṁ hāde phiṭilā indrapada
indra daṇḍa chatra māna chaḍilā samasta
śacīki gheni ẏekā bāhāra hoile puruhūta | 368 |
indra debatā yetebeḷe śacīki chaḍi amara puruṁ gale
śate sahasra daṇḍa praḷamba nārāẏaṇaṅka pādataḷe | 375 |
svāṁī jambu datya māri sañchili amara
indra pade basili muṁ manu ye satara | 376 |
br̥ttra maharuṣiki dile ẏe mohora pada | 377 |
tohora prasāde deba muṁ pāibi kāraṇa | 378 |
br̥ttra maharuṣiṅki māri indrapada gheni ye tohora | 379 |
kisa gheniṇa muṁ samara karibi śahasra nāhiṁ mohora | hasta | 380 |
tu prāṇa chaḍa bābu bāsabara arthe
tohora asthi gheni māru ẏe ruṣi burttre | 382 |
tāhā kalā nei hāde abheda kapaca | 384 |
aṅguṣṭhi mānaṅku puṇa nārāja ye kalā
kopeṇa indra ye caḷai ati rāge
kṣaṇa mātre yāiṁ miḷilā amara svarge | 389 |
br̥ttra maharuṣira saṅge aneka yuddha kalā
ẏemante br̥tta maharuṣi hoilā dhūḷi pāṁśu | 392 |
tvaṣṭāẏe samasyā na dile yogalaẏe beḷe | 396 |
rāgeṇa bumiki māile dhari bāli muṭhāẏe
bāḷakhiḷā bāhāra hoile beni ye tanaẏe | 397 |
pitāra āgyāṁẏe se bani ye tanaẏe
bajra śare indra ruṣi kumāranta māilā | 403 |
aṅgārapannaṅga jaẏasena pracaṇḍābaḷī citrasena pāile jībita | 404 |
indra nāśa kalā tora putra duhiṅki | 405 |
kāḷānaḷa teje jāṇi āsai parama yogī | 406 |
indra debatāṅku rakṣā kariba kehu āja
brahmā biṣṇu maheśvara ke rakhantu debarāja | 407 |
manapabana daṇḍa caḍhi nārade dhātikāre aile
ruṣi putranta tu ye kalu prāṇe bhraṣṭa
manuanta mahātmā se kalpe kalpe tapī
brahnāra ẏuṣa sari yāhāra āẏuṣa byāpi | 410 |
tāhāra kopa karante ṭaḷai hāde meru
paḷāi samudre paśa yā āu ẏethe kisa karu | 411 |
samodra dahana hoiba tāhāra garu tāpe | 412 |
nārāẏaṇa ādi kari ke mote rakhiba | 413 |
tu mohora putraku nāśakalu re duṣṭa | 419 |
śarīra tohora bhasma hou boile ruṣi tvaṣṭa | 420 |
bichāri kopa karibā doṣa nāhiṁ mohora | 421 |
āpaṇe tvaṣṭāẏe ye basile indra pade
byāse boile ho śuṇa droapda nr̥pati
tāhāra bhāriyā ye aṭai debī śacī
uttarāṣāḍhā nakṣatra bhoga aṭai se dinara | 426 |
bije kari āsuachanti ākāśa gaṅgā tīra | 427 |
stirīẏe rodana karucchi anāsta baḍa dukhī | 428 |
sadaśiba boile stirī janma baḍa bāī
aprasanna jananta go chuiṁta na yogāi | 429 |
stirījanma goṭāku deba doṣa ye apāra | 430 |
ẏeka stirīẏe rodante āreka stirī ye ruhāiba
ẏehā bichāra na karanti yeuṁ stirījane
kāṭha beṅga kari tāhānta janma karai yame | 433 |
tumbhe kṣaṇeka biśrāma kara deba muṁ tāhāra trodha karai śānti | 434 |
na kānda āẏī boli mukhe hasta dile | 436 |
māga go mahātmāṇī mane yahā icchu
abaśya prāpata hoiba mane yāhā bāñcchu | 438 |
āmbhe se aṭu hāde śaṅkar girijā
mana kāmanā siddha hou tu nija puraku yā yā | 439 |
patiṁ dehi patiṁ dehi boli boile pāñchathara
toṣe hara pābongtī boile tora hou pañchubara | 440 |
śacī boile tumbhe hara ye pābongtī
īśvare boile mā go na bhāḷa bikaḷa
se pāñcha ātmā ye mañcheṇa abatari | 443 |
pabana teja gheni upujilā bīra bhīmā | 445 |
bāsabara teja gheni se arjuna upujilā | 446 |
aśva nī teja gheni nakuḷa kumāra seṭi | 447 |
beni satva bāji se sahadeba dhārmika | 448 |
pañchu pāṇḍabanta nei dia tora aṅge | 449 |
ẏete boliṇa hara pābongtī āgyāṁ dile

div.note: –beni saṁhare jāta sahadeba dhārmika (saṅhare-beniṅka śanti saṅgrahare)

lg.l: ẏe pañchu pāṇḍabe ẏekā ẏe dropatī
ẏe pañcha mūratiki tu na maṇa bhinnābhinna
ẏekalaẏe kariṇa tu pāṇḍabanta barṇṇa cihna | 453 |
satyabatī nandana tu bhūta bhabiṣya gyāṁtā
aṇākāra puruṣa tu bārilu barṇṇa cihna
ajapā laẏa kari tu ṭhuḷa kalu śūnya | 458 |
hema śiśirabasanta grīṣama baraṣā śarada chaḍarutu
dhātubāda puruṣa tu kalu samasta hetu | 459 |
śate praḷaẏa bañchilu tu nārāẏaṇa garbhare | 460 |
paramānanda puruṣa tu aṭu granthakai kabi
muhiṁ ki barṇṇanā tore karite pāribi | 461 |
na kahi biṅghasilu tu kaḷapa koṭi chāri | 462 |

div.note: mūrkha paṇḍita hoai śuṇi to bhāratī |

lg.l: jaẏa tu bhāratī bhāṣita tora bhāṣā
sabong dvanda parityāji muṁ baḷāili manīṣā | 465 |
nārāẏaṇa ballabhī go āgyāṁ mote debā
saṅsāra jana hite muṁ bañchāili adyāpi | 467–11587 |

div.head: {@dr̥padī pariṇaẏa@}

lg.l: nārāẏaṇa svāmī śuṇi citte parama sānanda | 1 |
dekhiṇa dropada ye aneka bhaẏa kalā
svāmī āpaṇe koḷa kari toḷi dhaile catradhara
ẏekā dropatī ye tārilā tora bongśa
sudolhitāẏe jātakalu tohora samaste hoiluṁ baśa | 5 |
koṭiẏe puruṣara tora dahija hoilā pātaka | 6 |
aneka praśaṁsā kale yahuṁ deba kr̥ṣṇa
mahata puruṣaṅku mora poẏe boile jhiṁghāsa
bho svāmī pāṇḍabe mora upekṣibā doṣa | 10 |
aśr̥jaḷa hoi dropade aneka tusti boli
muhiṁ agyāna deba doṣa mohora na ghenimā
aneka aparādha svāmī karibā mora kṣamā | 12 |
muhiṁ bhikṣuka prāẏe maṇithili sāṁsārikā dharme
puṇa puṇa dropada putranta gheni loṭi
parama sādhabī dohitā te hora yighnasenī | 15 |
aśvamedha yāga kalu tu dropada nr̥patya | 16 |
puṇyabanta dhārmika dekhi pradāna kariba jāṇi | 17 |
abichāre dile tahiṁ upujai aneka śāsti | 18 |
baḍāi durāpada na bichāri kāryya kale | 19 |
paṇḍita janamāne ẏehā bichāri kāryya kara | 20 |
abichāre kāryya kale sakaḷa dharma naṣṭa | 21 |
tīrthe citra lekhana kale utiṣṭha māṭhiā
anīti ṭhābe paḍile kehi na chuaiṁ | 23 |
yujheṣṭhi boile āmbhe na thilu ārambhe
chāḍilā bhaẏa māna bhagati bhābe bhaji | 25 |
ẏehā śuṇi agastiṅki bailbasuta manu boile
rāgeṇa tvaṣṭāẏe ye nāśa kale askanda
nāẏeka na paiṇa se sarase na khaṭi | 34 |
nityakarma sarante muniṅkara asta hoẏe beḷa
ye yāhāra ṭhābe thānti na caḷanti digapāḷa | 35 |
āmbhaṅku ẏe na yogāiṁ āmbhe thibu tapabaḷe | 37 |
amaraku āna jaṇe bhiāa sr̥ṣṭira karatā | 38 |
lg.note: ‘ye yāhāra ṭhābe thānti hoiṇa niścaḷa,’ ehi pāhānta pare<lb/>pothi biśeṣare adhikā pāṭha–
cauṣaṭhī koṭi nāẏi kāẏe hoi ẏekameḷi |
ye indra heba se āmbha saṅgate bihari |
ẏehā śuṇi tvaṣṭā ruṣi hele thambībhūta
jāṇi pitā bije kale amara bhmabane

lg.l: se pāuṁśa ghenile bhrahmā bege nija kare | 39 |
kamaṇḍaḷuṁ jaḷa siñchi tāhā kale loci
amr̥ta dr̥ṣṭi kari chāhiṁle jībanyāsa mantre
sehi askanda puruṣa hoilā pitāmaha gyānuṁ | 43 |
debatānta ādi kari brahmā baraṇa kalā
aṣṭakuḷā nāganta sabunti baraṇa kalā rājā | 49 |
prathama dibasa se bibhāra yogāḍa kari
ruṣimānanta se dile gaṇḍā māẏeṁsa bhoji
kandamūḷa dārākṣa ye hāhā pāre bhmañji | 51 |
amiẏa rasa bhojana rāmakr̥ṣṇa bhāi beni
br̥haspati bāra uttarā sāṅlaguni nakṣatra heṭi | 56 |
karkaṭa lagnare ye papagraha bheda nāhiṁ
bāḷaba nāme karaṇa uttāre kauḷaba bhoga tahiṁ | 58 |
tāra candra uttama ye śubha nāme yoga
makara saṅtrānti ṭhāru tini dina bhoga | 59 |
pāpa graha nāhiṁ boli anakūḷa kale tahuṁ | 61 |
ucchaba maṅgaḷa ye upujai baḍāi haraṣa | 66 |
nadīyāka diśilā ye kuṅkuma barṇṇa prāẏe | 68 |
debi debanta gandha puṣya bhuṣaṇa karāi | 70 |
āī pāṇḍabe ye achanti pāñcha mūrati
ẏe pāñchaṅkara madhye kāhāku baḷai to mati | 72 |
tumbhara chamure ke mithyā kahite paru | 74 |
pāñcheheṁ diśanti mote ẏekā indra prāẏe | 75 |
byāse boile ho dropada śuṇilaṭiki prtyaccha
āmbhara bacana tu ye karuthilu micha | 76 |
ke nindra kāriba tumbhara dibya kathā | 77 |
byāsaṅkara koḷe basile pāṇḍabe pañcha bhrāthe
kuṅkuma barṇṇa kari kāndhare bharile paitā | 84 |
graha pūjā kale graha śānti mantre
śutra śaniścara ye rāhu ketu sahite
āditya kāśyapa gotre soma ātreẏa gotre | 87 |

lg.note: niuḍanti–ḍhāḷanti | 83|1 sagotra sthanare saṅgotra pāṭha dekhāyae |
aṣāḍhuā sūtā, asaraḷā satā ẏepari lokamānaṅkara kathā |<lb/>paṣāḍha–asaraḷa |

lg.l: candradhvaja debasya prapautrī pr̥ṣata debasya pautrī
tāra bāra candra yoga karaṇa muhūrttakāṁśakeṣu
pāñchajanya śaṅkhadhvani śabada karanti āpaṇe jagannāthe | 99 |
huḷahuḷi śabede maṅgaḷa gīta gābanti abaḷā | 100 |
dropatī debīṅkara pañcha aṅguḷire pañchupāṇḍabaṅkara hātha
mahāmantre kuśa yoga kale dhaumya purohita | 109 |
jaẏa jaẏa śabada kale sabong muni
sabong aḷaṅkāre hoi aneka beśa ye beśane
huḷahuḷi dhuni ye kale sabong debī | 114 |
sādhu sādhu dhuni ye kale debastirī
bāsaba debatāṅkara bhariyā ye śacī mahāsatī
ādityaṅkara bhāriyā saṅgyā chaẏā beni rāṇī
siddha aparṇṇā se aṭanti sādhabī mahātmāṇī | 119 |
āgama puruṣaṅka bhāryyā medhā ye sumedhā | 120 |
yama debatāṅka bhāriyā kāḷī ye karāḷī
meghaṅkara bhāriyā kuṇḍaḷī ārdrābaḷī tāraḷī bijuḷī | 121 |
praḷaẏa śarīra ẏehāṅkara āṣya koṭi koṭi | 123 |
ẏemāne karanti samaste sādhu sādhu bāñcchā
bhārā nibariṇī go svārga mañcha kara rakṣā | 124 |
huḷahuḷi śabada śubhilā svarga ye bhmabane | 125 |
sādhu sādhu dropata boliṇa samaste boile | 126 |
svarga mañcha pātāḷa ẏe tini bhmabana
aneka maṅgaḷa dhuni sadhu sādhu bacana | 127 |
dhaumya purohite dile dropada hāthe nei | 128 |
yujheṣṭhi deba samarpaṇe bhīmasena deba samarpaṇe
arjuna nakuḷa sahadeba samarpaṇe mahāmantra dhuni uccāranti brāhmaṇe | 130 |
śrīhaste śaṅkhe ye ghenile dropadeśvara nr̥patye
pāñcha lakṣa dhenu dilā batsānta sahite | 131 |
aṣṭaratna pāṇidrabya dilā pañchu ye bhaṇḍāra | 132 |

div.note: basudhā, basumatī, sumati, kṣiti prabhr̥ti baruṇaṅka strī rūpe anya<lb/>pothimānaṅkare kathita |

lg.l: yoddhā ādi kari dilā pāñcha lakṣa ratha | 134 |
nighoḍa maṇḍaṇī kari dilā marbhmateka maẏematta hāthī | 135 |
chokhāra turaṅgama dila daśa lakṣa haẏe | 136 |
rudramaṇḍaḷa yamamaṇḍaḷa dilā beni rājya bhumi | 137 |
pañchaśata yojana āẏetana ye beni maṇḍaḷa
subarṇṇara palama dilā lakṣe lakse māḍhe | 140 |
yautuka dila rājā śrīhaste jaḷa gheni
samsta saja kari dilā beni lakṣa saini | 141 |
pāñcha lakṣa pāṭachatra ye ālaṭa udaṇḍa
pāñcha lakṣa ẏeka lakṣi majurajhāli khaṇḍa | 142 |
pāñcha lakṣa ālamba pāñcha lakṣa suāri
samasta yautuka dila binaẏa bhāba kari | 144 |
tāhāṅku yautuka debāku mohora śakya kisa
duhitā goṭiẏe dei samarpi hoili kṣamākaribāka daśa doṣa | 147 |
puṇa puṇa putranta gheni rājā gaḍaghāli śoẏe | 148 |
prarthanā bākya yahuṁ karāile dhaumya purohite
punarapi duhitā ye nohu nohu jāta | 151 |
bhr̥tyara bhr̥tya hoi se pare pradāna ye kale | 152 |
tāhā śuṇi boile ye byāsa maharuṣi
tāhāra tahuṁ ātayāta utpatti praḷaẏa sinā 156 |
ādi brahma aṁśe ẏe dakṣa prajāpati
śr̥ti mati dhr̥ti kanti kṣānti tanu bhānu medhā sumedhā śaradhā

div.note: śr̥ti dhr̥ti mati kīrtti śānti medhā sumedhā tanu śaradhā
ẏe daśa kanyā dharmaṅku nei dilā bibudhā |

lg.l: matira tahuṁ sambarttaka megha jāta helā | 161 |
śaradhāra tahuṁ hema śiśira basanta brīṣama baraṣā śarada chaḍarutu jāṇa | 164 |
śuṇa ho dropata śāhāsra ukata tote kahuṁ
ẏe śūnya puruṣe upujile daśa kanyaṅkara tahuṁ | 166 |
prajāpatiṅkara koṭiẏe puruṣa tārile sadāśibara bāmā | 167 |
kaśyapaṅku dile tera goti ye kumārī
diti aditi kadr̥ binatā kaḷā ariṣṭā
siṁhikā surabhi guhijā danu gandhabongā rukṣā ābara puruṣaśreṣṭhā | 169 |
ẏe tera kanyāṅka gharu utapatti yeuṁṇa yeuṁṇa
āho dropada rājā tu sābadhāne śuṇa | 170 |
aditi diti tahuṁ deba asura hāde
binatāra tahuṁ upujile aruṇa garuḍa pachībhage
rukṣāra tahuṁ upujile caupaẏā jībajantu yete
siṁgha śārddoḷi gaja aśva byāghra bhāluka markaṭa baḷaẏā sahite | 174 |
siṁhikā tahuṁ janamile rāhu ye rākṣase
surabhira tahuṁ jāta godhana rakāśe | 177 | guhijāru upujile guhyaka lokamāne
byāse boile bābu śuṇa ho dropta nr̥patya
dakṣara nandinī tahuṁ jāta hoile samasta | 179 |
bho muni kathāẏe pachāribi mote kopa na kariba | 180 |
kanyānta samarpi ẏebe yāa yā dropata nr̥patye | 182 |
caḷai dropada rājā nija ye āśrame
asaṅkṣepa yāga kale lājā homa āhuti
ghr̥ta āhuti amr̥ta dei triputi kale ye bahati | 184 |
utiṣṭa ghr̥ta dile bara kanyāṅkara hāthe
kanyāra hātha dhari pāraṇā kale pañchubhrāthe | 186 |
ghr̥ta pāraṇā kale debī ye dropatī
naṭa bhāṭa bhikṣāśī thileka yete jana
lakṣe stiri gheni bara kanyaṅkara śire arghya bandāpatni | 191 |
mā go āṣya dhan putra aneka smpada bāñcchā
abaśya phaḷa śr̥ti hoiba yāhā tohora icchā | 192 |
aṇa aprādha kaṣṭuṁ tara na lāgu yamadaṇḍa | 194 |
apāda bipada dukha keḷaśa samasta pāra yau
daridra doṣa tuṭu śatr̥ śānti hou | 195 |
rāja mukhe yaśa hou debī sabongmaṅgaḷe | 196 |
koṭiẏe pātaka harai yehne puṣkara snāhāne | 197 |
muhiṁ bāñcchā karai ẏe saṅsāra janaṅku
aẏiṣa dhana putra bāñcchā siddha hou | 200 |
tada darpa dhaṁsibāku śrī jagannāthe āgyāṁ dile muku | 201 |
na paḍhi paṇḍita muṁ āgyāṁ paramāṇe
grantha artha kali muṁ śrīcaṇḍī sāroḷā prasanne | 202 |
se yāhā kahai muṁ lihai sehimate
mūrkha hoi lekhana kali muṁ nohai paṇḍite | 203 |
ye abā bhrānti hoai mora mane
āpaṇe pūroi debī śrīhaste karanti lekhane | 204 |
sarūpe dekhāile mote āpaṇāra cihna barṇṇa
mote kāhiṁ sakhya hoiba ẏe dibya lekhana | 205 |
śata sahasra daṇḍa praḷamba mohora nitye | 206 |
ẏe mohor aśira luḷu tāhāṅka padma pāde

lg.head: {@pāṇḍabaṅka arddharājya dāna@}
lg.l: śuṇa ho rājana śikhaṇḍī dhr̥ṣṭa dr̥mana ye beni bhrāthe
śrī jagannāthaṅka ballabhī āṭhaẏekaśata ṣoḷasahasra bāḷī
pūbong janmeṇa muṁ karithili parama bhāgya
kanyā gheni yāa tumbhe pañchadaśa dine | 10 |
yujheṣṭhi boile svāmī bije kari yibā

lg.note: “yogānanda puruṣa mote daẏā karithibā” pādānta pare<lb/>2 ṭi pothira adhikā pāṭha–
kalyāṇa kale baḷadeba hoiṇa parama śānti |

lg.l: huḷahuḷi dhuni karanti nagra narī jana | 16 |
nija purakara āsite kāhāra na baḷai mana | 17 |
nāma dhaile yāhāra mukati gati pāi
dropatīra prasāde chāhiṁlu cachu ye pūroi | 18 |
sādhu sādhu jībana tāhā ye susteṇa pratipaḷi | 19 |
muṇohiṁ yugate kanyā gheni bije baramāne | 22 |
candraśāḷā pure yāiṁ niścinte śaẏana bhaji | 23 |
ye bidhi kāryya sārile nagra ghaṭi | 26 |
kehu kuṅkuma gheni ye hoanti marāmari
sapatama dibase indra ucchaba ye kari
aṣṭa dibase aṣṭamaṅkaḷā bidhi ye sāri | 30 |
sehi kurāḷaśāḷe rahile ye kointāṅkara tanu | 31 |
āmbhe yibā hāde hastinā nagra bāṭe
bije nārāẏaṇa ye hastinā nagra purī | 35 |
śuṇiṇa āstāna tejyā kari uṭhilā andharājā
rāmakr̥ṣṇa padma pāde kalāka dibya pajā | 37 |
aneka puṇya arajili uddharibā deba svāmī | 38 |
pāṇḍabe male ye jadura ghare paśi
arjunaku debi boliṇa se lākhaka pātilā | 45 |
samasta rājāẏe dhaṁsi hoile se lākhara | 46 |
bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa śalya ābara driyodhana
tadaante prabeśa hoile pāṇḍaba pañcha bhrātha
preta kāryya karākila āpaṇe tumbhe thāi
ābara pāṇḍabe deba achanti abā kāhiṁ | 51 |
kointā ādi kari dekhilu sehi ṭhāba | 54 |
ẏekā dropatīki bibhā hoile pāñcha bhāi
dhumya purohite byāsa muni thile tahiṁ | 55 |
indra debatā ye bijaẏe sehi thāna | 56 |
śāẏentanu aṭanti ye tahāṅkara paṇa ajā | 57 |
dhana dhānya godhana gaja aśva ratha | 58 |
bhasma āṅkorilā muṁ na jāṇai tathya | 60 |
yebaṇa dine dahana hoile giri bāruṇābanta | 62 |
rātre bāhāra hoi jadura ghanu paḷāilu
aneka deśa rājā paḍile aneka saini | 69 |
tāḷeka uccharge se bahilā rakata nadī
ẏe pañchaṅkara keśa dhari nelā bhīmasena | 71 |
ẏete kaṣṭe kopa na base śarīra | 72 |
jānu taḷe gaḷāi bhīma yāa re yā boile | 73 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭa boilā mote kahibā bākya satyi
bahuta dūra chāli na pāranti bāṭa | 77 |
teṇu se biḷamba hoi āsuachai kurusāiṁ | 78 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭe boile tumbhe kahila yete kr̥tye
ābara ki poẏe mora achanti jībite | 79 |
ẏete kaṣṭeheṁ daẏā na chaḍilā adyāpi | 80 |
ẏehi dinā chārire puanta pau sinā bheṭa | 82 |
puanta gheni tora caḷa pañchāḷa deśe
dhr̥tirāṣṭa boilā deba hari rahibā dinā chāri
pañchāḷa deśe thilu saẏambara dekhibā nimante | 86 |
dvārakā bhmabane aneka haraṣa ucchaba badhāi
ye yāhāra bhmabane rahile sabonge yāiṁ | 91 |
rebatī nakṣatra ye bhoga se dinara | 92 |
hastinā bhmabane se yāiṁ kaleka bijaẏe | 93 |

lg.note: dhr̥tarāṣṭra sthānare dhr̥tirāṣṭa pda sabu pothire pāṭha |
lg.l: aṭhara kṣauṇī baḷa sanya gheni galā
sāta kṣauṇī paḍilā ẏegāra kṣauṇī gheniṇa ailā | 95 |
braṇahīna hoi deba jaṇe kehi nādiṁ
ẏemanteheṁ nistarili muṁ puanta pāilaiṁ bheṭa | 97 |
bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa kr̥pa aśastamā bhūrisabongā
ye yāhāra anarūpe mānya bhagati sebā | 98 |
aneśata putra sutile dhr̥tirāṣṭaku praṇapatya hoi
rājyare śubhai ye aneka trodha dhuni | 100 |
boilā pāṇḍabaṅkara tule paḍilāṭiki tumbha bheṭa | 101 |
bidure boile tumbhe śuṇa jyeṣṭha bhrātha
dropadaku dharāi āṇile ye guru droṇe
bhīṣma droṇa jiṇimi boli dropada bara ye māgilā | 105 |
īśvare boile tohore nohai re sādhi

lg.note: sabu putre śoile daṇḍa praṇāma kari

lg.l: mahāyāgyuṁ jāta kari diasi dropadaku ẏekai kumārī | 107 |
kaurobanta jhiṁghāsa karāu se arjunara hātha | 108 |
sadāśibaṅka bacane rāja caḷilā nija pure
mahayāga nr̥pati ārambha karāilā aneka sambhare | 109 |
pāṇḍabe nāśa yahuṁ śuṇilā jadughara dahane | 111 |
arjuna na pāi rājā saẏambara kalā
durlabha lākha pātil kāhākuhiṁ śakya ye nohilā | 112 |
uparaku muṣṭi taḷaku dr̥ṣṭi pāṇi ghaṭa nirekhi | 114 |
ẏeheneka asambhaba kari durlabha lākha sañchi
mānabe śakya nohilā dhanu nuārile kehi āmañchi | 115 |
rādhācatra phuṭilā paḍi nārāja māchara bāma cachura | 117 |
kaicchā jagajjeṭhī se lākha puṇihiṁ binddhalā | 118 |
māchara bāma cachure huṭi ḍāhāṇa cachure nikiḷi
pua tora driyodhana anamite goḷa kalā | 120 |
sāṁgrāmaku bhaẏe na kalā paṇḍita bidujana | 121 |
āreka brāhmaṇa goṭāẏe dui br̥kṣa upāḍi
gaja yūtha dekhi yehne dhāmaiṁ keśarī | 122 |
ghāẏe nandana tohora paḍilā mahī loṭi 123 |
dui rātra dui dibasa hoilā samara
lakṣe rājā bhājile dekhi na phurai mohora kicchi | 128 |
saṅcaẏe kari śuṇīlu ẏe paṇḍura nandane | 130 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭa boilā muṁ pāili dibya gyāna
niścaẏe pāṇḍabe se paṇḍura pāñcha nāna | 131 |
muhiṁ abā andha hoili tumbhara bongśe
cachu thāuṁ kimpe tumbhaṅku hoilā adr̥śye | 132 |
pañchu pāṇḍabe pradāna hoile ẏekā yighnasenī | 134 |
aneka dhana bhaṇḍāra ratha gaja sanyabaḷa
ẏeheneka sandeśa bārata svāmī pāila kemante | 136 |
caturtha dibasa hoilā bije kale ẏethiki | 138 |
bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa śalya śaṅkuni driyodhana basāiṁ
mūrkha bhābe bābu tu marāilu saini
dhr̥tirāṣṭa boile bābu pañchāḷa deśaku yibā
tebe se bongśaku mora lajjā upujantā | 145 |
cihnu cihnu pāṇḍabe mote kale ẏeḍe śāsti | 147 |
muṁ abā tāhānta na cihni kalai samara
ẏethira pāiṁ mote na bola rājadeba
bhīṣme boile ẏehā na bola akaraṇe
sehi se rakhiḷeṭi āmbhara baḍa paṇe | 151 |
jaṇe kehi uburi āsante ki nija pura | 152 |
gauraba kari āṇile upujiba bahuta yaśa | 154 |
tu yadyapi tāhānta nuāṇibu kururāja deba
dinā daśa susta kalā nija sanyabaḷa
bhīṣma droṇaṅkara mūḷe samasta rathī mahārathī | 158 |
arkabāra se dina nakṣatra bhoga svātī | 159 |
bāṇijya nāme karaṇa harṣa nāme yoga
kumbha saṅkarāntiki ye satāiśa dina bhoga |160 |
lg.note: teṇu kari pāṇḍabe mote kale apahāra |
lg.l: rātra benidaṇḍa thāuṁ kumbha lagna beḷā
hastināru bāhāra hoilā thāṭha ye cāḷāi | 162 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭa boilā deba mohora bacane karibā
āreka dina rājā galā thāṭha baḍhi
padmadaḷa deśe rahilā śate yojana māḍi | 172 |
āra dina rājā thāṭha galā gheni
āstāna deśāure bāratā karanti ghana ghana | 176 |
śuṇiṇa pāñchāḷa deśara rājā āsai āstānu uṭhi
bāratā jaṇāile yaiṁ dharma ye yujheṣṭhi | 178 |
bhīṣma dropaṇa driyodhana karṇṇa rāma kr̥ṣṇa | 179 |
ratha gaja aśva sabu bahana āṇa maṇḍi | 180 |
apaṇe bije kale dhr̥tirāṣṭa rāma kr̥ṣṇe
pāgcheṭi yibā āmbhe thokāẏe dūra bāṭe | 181 |
ratha gaja aśva saini baḷa maṇḍi | 182 |
aneka ratne se maṇḍile śveta hāthī
lakṣe mukuṭabandhā yodhā gheni āgiāṇi hoẏe | 185 |
benilakṣa mukuṭabandhā yodhā gheni yujheṣthiṅka ḍāhāṇa pakhāẏe | 186 |
lg.note: śrīkhaṇḍi, śrīkhaṇḍī, śikhaṇḍī pāṭha bibhinna schānare dekhāyāe |

lg.l: chārilakṣa mukuṭabaṇdhā yoddhā gheniṇa mantrī cūḍāmaṇi
sahasreka yoddhā gheni dhr̥ṣṭa ye dr̥mana
bidura boilā svāmī pāpa kalu pūbonge
chāmara chatra ālamba gheni śikhaṇḍī dhrṣṭadr̥mana benibhrāthe | 198 |
driyodhana śatebhāi karṇṇa kr̥pa śalya aśastamā
pitr̥kāryya karibi ta muṁ pāntabanta gheni | 203 |
se pabongta taḷe hoile bheṭā bheṭi
saini beni bhāge hoile yujheṣṭhinta dekhi
tahuṁ namaskāra kale yāi rājā dhr̥tarāṣṭi | 208 |
samaste bāñcchā kale āmbhara āṣya gheni brata | 210 |
śatr̥ māri ubhā hua bāñcchā hou siddha
rājya prāpata hou kahilu tote siddha | 211 |
ye bidhi pūjā kalā jyeṣṭha anutramaṅku | 213 |
sabong kuśaḷa kahanti ye yāhāra ānande
heṭha mātha hoi basilā māna ye gobinde | 215 |
śaṅkuni boilā ho tumbhe ye hua baḍa duṣṭa
hāribā jiṇimā kṣatrībr̥tti aṭai parama ye kaṣṭa | 217 |
samārji dropate ye nile nija pure
bhīṣma droṇa bhurisabongā karṇṇa śalya aśastamā
bābu tumbhanta paramāda śuṇi muṁ duguṇe nirimākhi | 224 |
svāmī jadura ghara yetebeḷe hoilā dahana

lg.note: samasta kuśaḷa kahanti ye yāhāra anutrame
bābu tumbhanta parābhaba śuṇi muṁ duguṇe nirimākhi |
lg.l: bahuta durgame ye paśilu amārga mārge
banajība jantu dekhi trīḍilu aneka raṅge | 227 |
medinī sahu na thilā tahāṅkara bhārā | 228 |
chāri datya māilā deba bhīmasena ẏekā | 229 |
pūjā kalā bidyādhara bahuta śasra gheni | 230 |
karmeṇa deba lākha binddhalā bīra pātha
duṣṭa rājāẏe miḷi ẏethaku kaleka anartha | 233 |
sugandha taiḷa gheni gaṅgāre snāhāna ye kale | 236 |
śāka muga byañjana ābara brīhi baḍā
āmiṣa ni rāmiṣa ye āmbiḷa alekha kāñji
biśāśate meñjana gheni samaste triputi hoi bhmañji | 243 |
ghr̥ta madhure se amr̥ta rasa sari | 244 |
subāsita nīra dile sambhabong ye kari | 246 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭe boile dropata mahimā tora sādhu sādhu
dhani dhani mahimā tohora duhitā ye āmbhar akuḷabadhū | 248 |
ẏehi sadibhāba tohora puaṅku mora thāu sabongkāḷa | 249 |
bho tāta āmbhara ẏeka rājyara kisa sanya | 250 |
lakṣe rājā sanya gheni rahile ṣoḷadina pariyante
sādhu sādhu dropata mahimā tora dhani dhani
ẏeḍe mahimā karibāku nāhiṁ nā medinī | 252 |
putranta gheni rājā hastināku saja kalā sabong | 254 |
aneka sambhabonge rāja thāṭha ye palāṇi
anteśvare thāi uttara dile kontabhojara dulaṇī | 255 |
puanta gheni mohora yibe ẏebe hastināku
kāḷe sambhāḷi nuāribe ẏe mohora putraṅku | 256 |
ghareka bhiāile jau sajaḷasa guā ghr̥ta chaṇapaṭa | 257 |
paraku hiṁsā kari se āpaṇe naśa galā | 258 |
puanta gheni muhiṁ tahiṁ rātre nāśa yāithānti | 259 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭa boilā mā go nadhara semāna
ye ẏehā sañchilā se hoilā naśapāna | 260 |
dharmahim se barddhuta mā go chari yuge
dharmathilā prāṇī pāri huanti śubha yoge | 261 |
pāñchāḷī gheni mā go rathe bije kara
mūrkha puaṅkara mā go doṣa ye na dhara | 262 |
yujheṣṭhi boile mā go dhr̥tirāṣṭa thibā yāẏe
ye yāhā bolai se sehi kathāre baśa | 264 |
śubha maṅgaḷa yoge mā go bimāneṇa basa | 265 |
mā go pratakse nirañjanī mānuṣa abatāra
ẏekā duhitā koṭiẏe puruṣa mukata kalu mohora | 268 |
cauda lakṣa ālamba dropata dilā lekhi | 272 |
mahī hāndoḷai ghora bajaṇā śabada bāji | 273 |
lakṣe gāī dilā duhāṁḷa batsā dhenu
śaurībāra svātī nakṣatra beḷa beni ghaṭi | 276 |
lg.note: “ẏekā duhitā kotiẏe puruṣa mukata kalu mohora” pādānta<lb/>pare adhikā pāṭha–
ẏekā duhitā mora koṭiẏe puruṣa uddhari |

lg.l: haraṣaṇa nāme yoga karaṇa bāṇijya hoilā | 277 |
mīna lagne tahiṁ pāpa graha kicchi nāhiṁ
amr̥ta lagna beḷe caḷile thāṭha goṭi
bho samudhi gata doṣamāna na dharibu mohora putraṅku | 283 |
doṣa na dhariba mohora mūrkha ye tanaẏe | 286 |
tahuṁ teṇiki bhmañjibe ye yāhāra likhite | 287 |
sabonggyaṁ satī se tāhāku kisa mum tiāri | 288 |
tuleṇa yāāntu tora beni ye ātmaje | 289 |
jaṇe kaṇe tiārai saburi hātha dhari | 290 |
rohiṇī nāma nakṣatra bhoga se dinara | 292 |
rohiṇī nakṣatre candra chāri daṇḍe bhoga | 293 |
br̥ṣa lagne nāhiṁ pāpa graha kaḷā | 294 |
hastinā rājye prabeśa śubha maṅgaḷa beḷe | 295 |
yujheṣthi boile tāta āmbhe bāruṇābante thāuṁ
parimaḷa bhūmire ye āmbhe ẏethi rahuṁ | 297 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭa boile bābu na gola ẏemanta
ẏekaātmā hoithiba pañcha uttara śate bhrātha | 298 |
dahana bāratā śuṇi aneka bikaḷa hoiluṁ | 299 |
purajanamāne kale hā hā kāra dhuni
kāhiṁ gopya hoithile ẏe kāẏāmāna gheni | 302 |
aneka maṅgaḷa jaẏa jaẏa dhuni toḷi

lg.note: kāminī gaṇamāne dianti “huḷahuḷi” pādanta pare adhikāpāṭhi :–
āreka bolai debastirī āmbhe dekhibā kāhiṁ
mahālākha binddhale ẏe lakṣe rājā kaleka bhaṅgāṇa |
lg.l: ẏehāhuṁ sodara tote nāhiṁṭi āna jaṇa
sodara sambhāḷile apaṇāra aneka hoi puṇya | 310 |
tu yebe pāṇḍabaṅku na sambhāḷibu nr̥pati
driyodhana boilā svāmī śuṇa deba hari
tohora ājñā bhraṣṭa kale niśceṁ sehu mari | 313 |
kaṇṭhe garagaḍamāḷi karṇṇeṇa sphatika kuṇḍaḷa beni | 4 |
maẏura puccha bāhā śobhita beni hāthe | 6 |
lohita barṇṇa cachu juḷujuḷā poka citā
mattāḷa nāṭa deba gho gho śabade
rīḍanti bihaḍanti debī kiḷikiḷā brata nāde | 9 |
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa śrīkr̥ṣṇa caraṇe śaraṇa | 14–12127 |
lg.note: lohita barṇṇa cachu ḍhuḷa ḍhaḷa śobhitā
lalāṭe kiṁśuka puṣya koili sūtā paitā |
lg.head: {@harijanma brata@}

lg.l: mātā ādi niścinte rahile sapta jaṇa
kathāẏe pucchibi he kahibāka brahma bāki | 4 |
pannaṅgānā rāẏaṇa se ye aṭai mānagobinda
lakṣmī kebaṇa bāge bije kale tāhāṅkara kandha | 5 |
ẏe kathā muni mote kahibā bistāri
taba mukhuṁ śuṇile ye dustaru hebi pāri | 6 |
śuṇa he manu puruṣa badaẏanti agasti
ẏe kathā śuṇimāku tuhi se śakati | 7 |
siṁghamāsa kr̥ṣṇa pakṣa aṣṭamī ye tithi
br̥ṣa ghare śaśadhara bhoga ye karanti | 9 |
sehi dna hastinā sabhā ye āstānare
